name: Old Driftwood
description: An old weathered piece of driftwood, covered in a few spots of moss.
examine_text: An aged piece of driftwood has been washed ashore, its once vibrant color dulled by time and water. It has become rough and jagged in places, obviously worn down by the constant lashing of the waves. A layer of green moss has begun to creep along its side, indicating it has been here a while.

name: Water Jug
description: A ceramic jug used by the locals to fetch water.
examine_text: This jug looks fragile but strong. Its surface is mottled with a patchwork of varying shades of brown from years of use. Despite its appearance, it is actually quite sturdy and perfect for transporting water from the lake to the village. It's currently empty.

name: Shrub Berry
description: A small round red berry found on the shrubs nearby, a common food source.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the berry is a deep, juicy red. It is perfectly round and fits snugly in the palm of your hand. As you squeeze it gently, you find it firm yet yielding to pressure indicating it is ripe and ready for consumption.

name: Water God's Alter
description: A small stone alter that has been dedicated to the water gods. It is covered in various offerings and symbols.
examine_text: The alter is low and made up of stacked flat rocks. Carvings on the rocks depict sacred symbols of water, and small offerings, such as shells and pebbles, are spread out on its surface. Despite the seemingly ordinary appearance, a sense of reverence hangs around it.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A regular fishing rod with a reel and a line
examine_text: The fishing rod is light and flexible with a reel that looks well used. It's the perfect tool for fishermen.

name: Boat
description: A small wooden boat floating gently on the lake
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the boat seems sturdy and well-built. It has two oars inside and it can carry up to two people.

name: Shellfish
description: A cute little shellfish partially buried in the sand
examine_text: This shellfish has a shiny and colorful shell, protecting its soft and edible body inside.

name: Fish
description: A lively fish swimming happily in the clear waters of the lake
examine_text: When you look closer, you see it's a trout with beautiful, shining scales reflecting the sunlight.

name: Blessed Water
description: Crystal clear water believed to be blessed by the gods.
examine_text: The water sparkles in your hand, mesmerizing you with its beauty. Drinking it feels cold, refreshing, and oddly empowering.

name: Heavy Stone Jug
description: A jug made of stone used by villagers to carry water.
examine_text: The jug is heavy and sturdy. Clearly built to last, it has a large handle for carrying and a narrow neck to be stoppered closed to prevent spilling.

name: Rivetswood Staff
description: A sturdy wooden staff left leaning against a tree.
examine_text: The staff is as tall as you are and feels balanced in your hand. It is made from darkly hued Rivetswood with small knots giving it character but not affecting its strength.

name: Ancient Tree
description: One of the oldest trees near the lake, sturdy with a huge trunk.
examine_text: This tree is toweringly tall with an impressively wide trunk covered in rough, time-worn bark. Its gnarled branches are home to a vibrant ecosystem of mosses, lichens, insects, and chirping birds.

name: Old Fishing Rod
description: A worn yet still usable fishing rod left behind by fishermen
examine_text: A sturdy rod with a faded wooden handle. Despite its neglected appearance, the line is taut and functional. It has seen a lot of use but it can still reel in a worthy catch.

name: Wooden Bucket
description: A simple wooden bucket used by the local fishermen
examine_text: Made from a high-grade wood, this bucket has seen years of use. It’s encrusted with barnacles on its external surface from constantly being submerged in the lake waters, but it's reliable and holds water without any leaks.

name: Worn Hat
description: A faded hat perhaps forgotten by a fisherman
examine_text: A weather-beaten hat made of coarse straw. Despite its appearance, it seems to still serve its purpose in keeping the sun at bay.

name: Wooden Bucket
description: A simple wooden bucket with a strong rope attached to the handle.
examine_text: The wooden bucket is worn out from years of use. It's delicately crafted from oak wood, secured by iron rings around the body. A thick, sturdy rope is tied to its handle, allowing it to be easily lowered into the water.

name: Fishing Net
description: A fishing net made from sturdy twine fibers.
examine_text: The fishing net is designed for catching small fish and would not withstand the pull of larger aquatic life. Its fibers are tightly woven into a mesh pattern, creating numerous small loops for trapping fish.

name: Cluster of Berries
description: A small cluster of juicy red berries.
examine_text: There's a mixture of ripe and unripe huckleberries in this cluster. They have a sweet, tart taste and are a favorite among the local folks.

name: Rocks
description: A group of irregular shaped rocks.
examine_text: The rocks are rough to the touch and have a distinct grayish hue. Over the years, the elements have shaped them into irregular forms, making each one unique.

name: Laundry Clothing
description: A set of clothes left to be washed.
examine_text: They are simple clothes, worn by the locals. Stains and signs of wear tell tales of hard work and simple living.

name: Old Canoe
description: A worn out wooden canoe that has seen better days.
examine_text: The canoe is weathered and worn, with a patina of algae on the underside. Despite its obvious age, it remains sturdy and seaworthy, a testament to the craftsmanship of its maker.

name: Fishing Rod
description: An unattended fishing rod propped up on a stand beside the swimming hole.
examine_text: The fishing rod, with its line cast into the water, hums quietly with tension. Its reel is intricately carved and the pole, made from a sturdy oak, tells a story of a seasoned fisherman.

name: Picnic Basket
description: A picnic basket abandoned in the rush to the water.
examine_text: The basket, made from woven reeds, is filled with delicious food. You see sandwiches, apples, and a bottle of red wine nested among a neatly folded gingham towel.

name: Swim Trunks
description: A pair of neon swim trunks left on the shoreline.
examine_text: The swim trunks are fluorescents yellow in color and wet as if just taken off. They look ordinary, except for the old school video game character print on them.

name: Skipping Stone
description: A perfect skipping stone lying on the water's edge.
examine_text: Examining the stone, you find its edges are smooth and rounded, ideal for skipping. It's cold to the touch and light enough to carry.

name: Mossy Rock
description: A large boulder covered in green moss.
examine_text: The moss on the rock has a vibrant green color. It feels soft and spongy to the touch. There may be critters hiding underneath.

name: Driftwood
description: A piece of wood that has drifted ashore.
examine_text: This piece of driftwood is smooth from the weathering of the water. It seems sturdy and could be used for purposes other than burning.

name: Fruit Tree
description: A short tree bearing small fruits.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the fruits on the tree are ripe, with a sweet scent wafting in the air. If you are hungry, they would make a good meal.

name: Fresh Water
description: A small, clean puddle of fresh water.
examine_text: The water is clear and refreshing to the taste, without any impurities visible to the naked eye. It is safe to drink.

name: Abandoned Raft
description: A makeshift raft abandoned on the shore.
examine_text: The raft seems to be made from logs tied together. It might not be the most comfortable ride, but it is seaworthy and could carry you across the water if needed.

name: Humble Knight's Sword
description: A decorated metal sword.
examine_text: It's a knight's regal sword, beautifully decorated with gold and silver. The hilt is adorned with a dragon motif, reflecting bravery.

name: Lord's Crown
description: A shimmering golden crown
examine_text: This is a dazzling golden crown embedded with sparkling gemstones, symbolizing the Lord's power and wealth.

name: Goblet of Wine
description: A shiny silver goblet filled with red wine
examine_text: An exquisite goblet crafted with intricate designs, filled to the brim with the finest red wine.

name: Banquet Table
description: A large wooden table
examine_text: This sturdy wooden table is capacious enough to hold a royal banquet. Its surface is polished, reflecting the grandeur of the room.

name: Roast Venison
description: A savoury dish of roast venison
examine_text: This is a large, succulent piece of venison roast, smelling tantalizing. The aromas fills the air, making your mouth water.

name: Wooden Planks
description: Large wooden planks sitting on a downward slope.
examine_text: Scratches can be seen on the planks from many launches. Due to moist air, they're covered with a thin film of algae.

name: Bronze Lighthouse
description: Large, ornate bronze figure of a lighthouse on the sides.
examine_text: The lighthouse figure is well crafted, with meticulous details and it shows signs of extensive oxidation.

name: Stone Braces
description: Large stone braces on either side of the dock.
examine_text: Large boulders that are covered with moss and used for structural support. They’re cold to the touch and slightly damp.

name: Tethering Rope
description: A thick, sturdy rope used to anchor the ships.
examine_text: A thick rope made of braided hemp, frayed from use but still reliable. It has a distinct salty smell of the sea.

name: Old Wooden Bathtub
description: An old luxury, this large wooden tub is surprisingly well preserved.
examine_text: The tub is old, but very sturdy. You notice a faint glow around it, perhaps the charm of those who have used it before. It's large enough to accommodate two people comfortably. A network of small pipes and tubes are found underneath the tub, suggesting a system was set up for heating the water.

name: Clear Lake Water
description: A large body of water so pure it mirrors its surroundings.
examine_text: Taking a closer look, you see the water is crystal clear. You can see small fish darting underneath and occasional pebbles lining the waterbed. It seems quite deep, and you would probably not touch the bottom if you ventured out

name: Abandoned Homestead
description: An old abandoned house overlooking the lake.
examine_text: The house, though slightly crooked, stands firmly in its ground, as if waiting to welcome the couple back to their humble home. Paint peeled off from its wooden frames reveals a lifetime of stories. A silent witness to the years gone by, it's a quaint little residence that now serves as a monument to the past.

name: Old Rowboat
description: A lonely old rowboat, seemingly abandoned by the shore
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the rowboat appears very worn and damp. Moss patches have formed at the bottom and tiny holes are visible.

name: Lily Pad
description: A large green lily pad floating on the surface of the water
examine_text: The lily pad appears large and firm. Occasionally, a small frog hops onto it for a rest.

name: Moss
description: A patch of moss growing on a rock by the shore
examine_text: The moss is soft and spongy, damp with dew. It exudes a faint, earthy fragrance.

name: Murky Water
description: Dark and uninviting water of the Lagoon
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see that the water is so dark you can barely make out the bottom. Little eddies and currents cause it to shimmer slightly.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A sturdy fishing rod leaning against the shack wall.
examine_text: Examining the fishing rod closely, you find it's made of a well-worn but strong bamboo rod, neatly coiled fishing line, and a sharp metal hook.

name: Old Wooden Bucket
description: An old, splintered wooden bucket lies by the doorway.
examine_text: It’s a bit ragged around the edges but still sturdy. It smells slightly of fish and saltwater. It is usually used to carry fish or bait.

name: Weathered Boat
description: A weathered boat that has seen better days is tethered nearby.
examine_text: The boat's paint is peeling and it creaks a bit, but it seems stable. A couple of old fishing nets lay tangled at the bottom of it.

name: Fishing Net
description: A sturdy fishing net with a long wooden handle.
examine_text: This net is woven from strong cordage and is designed for catching fish. The wooden handle is long and finely crafted.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A reliable tool used for fishing.
examine_text: An ordinary looking wooden fishing rod, marred with several notches signifying past catches. It looks old but still sturdy.

name: Wooden Crate
description: An old, fragile-looking wooden crate.
examine_text: This aging wooden crate is weathered and beaten up from time and elements, but appears to be holding itself together for now. Hints of a cargo label can be seen faintly.

name: Silver Flask
description: An old flask possibly containing some drink
examine_text: This is a small, curved hip flask made from sliver. It is cool to the touch, and feels like it contains liquid inside

name: Wooden Stool
description: A small, basic piece of furniture
examine_text: A basic wooden stool, it is uneven, but sturdy enough to sit on. It's weathered from exposure.

name: Floppy Straw Hat
description: A worn out hat made of straw
examine_text: Time and wear has faded its original color, leaving it a vague beige. The hat appears to have been abandoned and forgotten.

name: Dirty Water
description: The water is murky and unclean.
examine_text: You see litter floating around in this water. It has a horrible smell, and it seems to be undefinable in color due to the mix of filth.

name: Rat
description: A big, filthy rat that's covered in grime.
examine_text: This rat is larger than any you've ever seen in the city. Its fur is slick with oil and garbage. You see fleas dancing on its skin.

name: Oil Can
description: A rusty oil can, disused and forgotten.
examine_text: The oil can is old and rusty. It's been discarded down here for a reason. Still, it may come to some use.

name: Princess' Bed
description: A soft, ornate bed
examine_text: Looking closer at the bed, it looks like it is very comfy with a lots of bedding. There are so many plush pillows and fragrant herbs folded in between layers of linen, a sign of great wealth.

name: Fire Place
description: A warm fire place
examine_text: The fire place is made of bricks, well swept and kept. The fire roars and illuminates deep into the room. The warmth of this fire place can be felt from everywhere in the room. The firelight plays across the stone, casting long shadows.

name: Rug
description: A large beautiful rug
examine_text: This rug is handmade, an impressive display of workmanship. The pattern is intricate and labyrinths across the entirety of it

name: Tapestry
description: A wall hanging tapestry
examine_text: The tapestry depicts a blooming garden scene under the shining sun. It's incredibly detailed and brings a sense of calm when looked upon.

name: Fresh Flowers
description: Freshly cut flowers in a small vase
examine_text: The flowers give off a fresh scent that makes the room even more pleasant. The bright petals and green stems contrast beautifully with the room's decor.

name: Window
description: A big window with heavy drapes
examine_text: On walking closer, you notice that the window opens up to a beautiful view of the castle grounds. The heavy drapes serve to keep out the cold during winter months.

name: Gold Candle Fixture
description: A candle fixture made of pure gold, standing on either side of the room.
examine_text: The smooth and shiny surface of the gold fixture reflects the light of the flickering candles, casting a warm glow around the room. The elegance of the design and the intricate details are a testament to the expert craftsmanship.

name: Gold Plated Table
description: A sturdy wooden table, plated with a thick layer of gold.
examine_text: The table, despite the layer of gold that covers it, is surprisingly sturdy. You can see the grains of the wood underneath the golden surface.

name: Gold Crown
description: A lustrous gold crown adorned with sparkling gem stones.
examine_text: The crown, a heavy piece of craftsmanship, gives off a royal aura. The intricate designs and the perfectly cut gemstones inserted at just the right places make it a beautiful sight to behold.

name: Crossbows
description: A set of crossbows hanging neatly on the wall.
examine_text: These are weapons of destruction, made with polished wood and imagery of war. They look powerful and itchy for a fight.

name: Swords
description: A collection of long, gleaming swords in an umbrella stand.
examine_text: Different styles and sizes of swords, some glinting with sharp edges, others big, heavy, and brooding with deadly intent.

name: Armour
description: Various sizes of amour stored in large bins.
examine_text: The armour pieces are tactile and robust, made for protection. They glimmer in the torchlight, showing off their dented glory from past fights.

name: Trebuchets
description: A row of intimidating trebuchets.
examine_text: These massive siege machines tower over you ominously, they've been used to deal devastating damage in battles.

name: Catapults
description: Few catapults stand impressively at one end of the arsenal.
examine_text: These are complex mechanical devices used for hurling ammunition over walls. Capable of tremendous destruction.

name: Spears
description: A large pile of spears. Simple, yet dangerous.
examine_text: Each spear has a long, polished wooden shaft and a carefully honed metal tip. They are light yet deadly.

name: Towels
description: A set of plush, ivory towels stacked neatly on a shelf.
examine_text: These towels look incredibly soft and absorbent, easily capable of enveloping you in a warm, comforting embrace after a nice bath.

name: Clawfoot Tub
description: A magnificent porcelain tub, supported by four gilded claws.
examine_text: The tub's pristine white surface is smooth and shiny, reflecting the gentle lighting of the room. It's quite big, easily capable of accommodating even the tallest people.

name: Mirror
description: A shiny mirror hanging on the wall.
examine_text: The mirror's surface is so polished you could almost see your soul in it. The frame is ornately decorated, hinting at the opulence of this place.

name: Rug
description: A lush, plush rug that graces the floor.
examine_text: This rug is incredibly soft, a small symbol of luxury in this hidden haven. It appears well-cared for and spotlessly clean.

name: Tub Jets
description: Powerful jets built into the tub, designed to massage your back and shoulders.
examine_text: The jets release a steady stream of water, carefully calibrated to provide a gentle yet effective massage. Sometimes the King uses it after a stressful day.

name: Book Shelf
description: A handy shelf right next to the tub, where the King can place his book or drink.
examine_text: The book shelf is made from shiny and polished stone. It is sturdy and shows very minimal signs of use. There are some water droplets present on the stone surface.

name: King's Book
description: A book that the king left on the shelf.
examine_text: A thick, old book with pages yellowed from age. The cover has royal symbols and writings. Looks like it's something very precious.

name: Rusty Bucket
description: A small, aged metal bucket with dried stains
examine_text: An old, grungy, rusty bucket. It's stained and somewhat twisted. You'd guess it serves as a makeshift toilet in this dreary setting.

name: Rigid Bench
description: A rugged, grimy wooden bench situated at the corner of the cell
examine_text: A bare, unyielding wooden bench. The wood is rough and has splinters. It's far from comfortable but it's the only thing to sit or sleep on.

name: Jail Bars
description: The set of heavy iron bars that serve as the cell's door
examine_text: Massive, cold iron bars forming the only doorway of the jail cell. No lock or key in sight. Their chilling presence alone is enough to crush any hope of escape.

name: Ethery Stone
description: A stone material used in the construction of the tower.
examine_text: Grey with hints of black tar, this stone is particularly hardy. This particular piece looks loose, maybe due to the cracks.

name: Weathered Telescope
description: A large, vintage brass telescope used for identifying threats in the distance.
examine_text: Its brass surface is mottled with the patina of age and exposure to the elements, but the glass appears to be still in perfect condition, perhaps due to meticulous upkeep.

name: Barbarian Assault: A Historical Record
description: A dusty book detailing the first Barbarian assault.
examine_text: A heavy tome filled with hand-drawn maps, meticulous notes and expressive illustrations narrating the surprise attack.

name: Old Dagger
description: A rusted but still sharp dagger, might be a relic from first Barbarian Assault.
examine_text: Despite the rust, the blade still feels sharp and has a deadly aura around it. The handle is wrapped in worn leather, hinting at many years of use.

name: Book Of Spells
description: An old, weathered book filled with spells
examine_text: The book is filled with spell incantations, scribbles and spells laid out in complicated diagrams. Some of the pages are worn and tearing at the edges

name: Potion Bottle
description: A small flask containing a bubbling, colorful liquid
examine_text: Upon closer look, the potion appears to be changing colors slowly, alternating between radiant hues of the rainbow. It emits a strange, magical glow

name: Wizard's Wand
description: A wand made of an unknown, dark material with an ethereal sheen
examine_text: This wand is intricately carved and lies perfectly balanced in the palm. It hums with a soft, silent energy when held

name: Ornate Chest
description: A large wooden chest with ornate carvings
examine_text: The chest is beautifully carved with intricate designs. It has a sturdy lock, but look a bit aged.

name: Marble Table
description: A large table made of pure marble
examine_text: This large table looks sturdy and cold to touch, the marble gleaming under the light.

name: Goblet of Wine
description: A golden goblet filled with red wine
examine_text: The goblet shimmers with the reflected light, the red liquid inside swirls gently.

name: Decorative Sword
description: A sword with decorative handle
examine_text: This sword is a decorative piece, yet it looks sharp enough to do damage.

name: Royal Crown
description: A magnificent royal crown studded with jewels
examine_text: The crown looks fit for a king or queen, it's jeweled surface glittering under the light.

name: Chains
description: Rusty chains Securely bolted to cold stone walls on a loop.
examine_text: The chains are heavy and cold, rusted from sweat and tears. Every link tells a tale of misery and endurance. They're bolted securely into the wall -- there's no way to remove them without tools.

name: Bowl of Slop
description: A large, soiled wooden bowl filled with insipid slop.
examine_text: One glance at the bowl of slop is enough to make you queasy. It consists of rotting vegetable scraps in a thin gruel. It's the only food the slaves get.

name: Tattered Garments
description: Flea-ridden ragged clothes, a uniform of degradation.
examine_text: The garments are stained and reek of filth. It's made of cheap, uncomfortable material and barely covers the body. Infested with fleas, it's undeniably a humiliation to wear.

name: King's Throne
description: A large, ornate throne meant for the king.
examine_text: The throne is beautifully crafted from a dark hardwood, encrusted with glistening jewels and precious metals. It exhibits intricate carvings of the kingdom's crest.

name: Royal Goblet
description: A richly adorned goblet from which the king drinks.
examine_text: The goblet is exquisitely made of solid gold with gemstones surrounding the rim. The kingdom's crest is elegantly etched on its side.

name: Feasting Table
description: A large dining table for feasting.
examine_text: The table is made of sturdy oak. Platters of assorted foods and tankards of various drinks cover the table. An exquisite tablecloth adds a final touch of refinement.

name: Ornate Knife
description: A small ornate knife used for cutting food.
examine_text: The knife is beautifully crafted with embellished handle and a shiny silver blade. The craftsmanship is clearly fit for royalty.

name: Royal Cloak
description: The king's formal attire.
examine_text: The cloak is woven from the finest velvet, dyed in the royal color. Gold threads form intricate patterns throughout.

name: Dusty Shackles
description: A pair of heavily rusted iron shackles hanging from the wall
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the shackles are heavily rusted due to age and neglect. The menacing iron ring of the shackles has left many a prisoner with deep, bruising wounds.

name: Tattered Rag
description: A worn-out rag lying in a corner
examine_text: This rag must've been used by the prisoners for various purposes - maybe as a makeshift pillow or a blanket. It stinks of desperation and fear.

name: Old Bread Crusts
description: Some stale bread crusts lying around
examine_text: These crusts are the last remnants of what must've been the prisoners' meals. They are moldy and unfit for consumption.

name: Sharp Stone
description: A sharp, jagged stone on the floor
examine_text: The stone, probably chipped off from the walls of the tower, is sharp and could serve as a makeshift weapon if needed.

name: Candle
description: A tall candle with melted wax on the sides.
examine_text: The candle, though it has been frequently used, still remains tall. The wax has melted and hardened in a haphazard manner around the edges. It gives off a faint, pleasant aroma.

name: Dinner Table
description: A large wooden table set with place mats.
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the wood is older, rich with a deep and enchanting grain. It's obviously been well cared for and has seen many gatherings.

name: Tapestry
description: A hanging tapestry depicting a historical event.
examine_text: This intricately weaved tapestry tells a story of lovers and kings, wars and peace. It's a visual testament to the tower's history.

name: Chair
description: An ornate wooden chair, slightly scuffed from use.
examine_text: The chair, though not new, is still sturdy. Carved into the headrest is an ornate design that gives a touch of elegance.

name: Stone Runes
description: Ancient carved symbols of protection.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, these runes seem to be blessed by the fair folk. Their magical glow emits a sense of security and strength. They are so finely carved into the stone, it's hard to believe they have endured the trials of time.

name: Guard's Quiver
description: A weathered quiver filled with arrows, left by a watchful guard.
examine_text: The quiver leather is worn from use and weather. The numerous arrows within are uniform, their fletchings a dark feather, and their heads sharpened to a deadly point.

name: Watcher's Goblet
description: A finely made silver goblet, often used by the watchmen during their long vigils.
examine_text: Despite being noticeably used, the goblet is still shiny, its silver gleaming in the ambient light. Some kind of insignia is etched into its side, possibly the seal of the ruling family.

name: Tower Lantern
description: A large lantern hanging from an iron hook, it lights up the whole tower.
examine_text: Rust spots indicate the age of the lantern, yet its flame is bright and unwavering, casting a welcoming, golden light across the stone surface of the tower.

name: Carved Stone Table
description: A sturdy table formed from the same stone as the tower itself.
examine_text: A closer inspection shows that the table is adorned with the same mysterious runes as the walls of the tower. It has a cold, yet comforting, touch.

name: Black powder gun
description: A vintage firearm from another era, designed for a time when slow, dangerous black powder was the only option.
examine_text: Twisted barrels, unusual firing components, and a design aesthetic that speaks to the excesses of a bygone era. There's a distinct smell of blackpowder about it.

name: Arrow quiver
description: A sturdy leather quiver filled with sharp arrows.
examine_text: The leather quiver is rough under your fingers, worn from use. The arrows contained within are sharp and of varying colors, markers of different archers perhaps.

name: Oil lamp
description: An old oil lamp hanging from the wall, providing dim light.
examine_text: The lamp, though old, has been polished to a nearly new shine. It emanates a soft, flickering glow and the smell of the burning oil is prevalent.

name: Gunpowder Keg
description: A sizable keg filled with black gunpowder.
examine_text: The keg is damp to the touch and has a subtle, rusty smell. It's filled with a coarse, black powder and is tightly sealed.

name: Spyglass
description: A shiny brass spyglass, left behind perhaps by a previous adventurer or watchman.
examine_text: The spyglass has a polished brass finish, with intricate engravings. Through the lens, you can see the far-off landmarks of the city.

name: Bird's Nest
description: A crow's nest, constructed in the spire's nook.
examine_text: A bundle of twigs, feathers, and other materials expertly put together. You spot tiny, blue speckled eggs inside.

name: Tower Spear
description: The very tip of the tower, a sharp, imposing architectural feature.
examine_text: The spear is cold to the touch, the metal beaten and weather worn. It points upwards, to the sky, as a challenge to the heavens.

name: Great King's Portrait
description: A large portrait of the Great King, notable for his stern gaze.
examine_text: The imposing portrait portrays the Great King in his regal attire. His eyes, fierce and knowing, are captured in an eternal stern gaze. The exquisite details in the painting make it feel as if he could step right out of the canvas.

name: Marble Throne
description: An ornately carved throne made of marble.
examine_text: The Great King's throne is made of the finest marble, its frame intricately decorated with mythical creatures and scenes of victorious battles. It exudes authority and grandeur, a testament to the King's rule.

name: Mosaic Stone Floor
description: The floor is a complex mosaic of quartz and jasper stones.
examine_text: Your gaze is drawn to the floor which is a vibrant mosaic of stones in various shades of reds, blues and whites. Patterns and designs from the past form a circuitous path around the hall conveying stories of the past.

name: Stone Staircase
description: An old smooth stone staircase spiraling towards different levels of the tower.
examine_text: The stone scenery of the staircase seems to tell the countless years of weary footsteps. The spiraling form of the staircase offers an indirect path toward the tower's top, each round exposing a new level of the tower. Despite the functionality, there's a certain gloomy aura around it, considering it's the only path for the slaves and prisoners.

name: Torch Holder
description: An iron holder fastened to the wall, holding a torch that lights the staircase.
examine_text: The torch holder is made from iron, aged and rusty but still holding firm. The torch within it flickers, casting a wavering light that dances upon the stone walls. Although weathered, it provides a modicum of security and vision in the otherwise dark environment.

name: Chains
description: A set of heavy-duty iron chains attached to the wall.
examine_text: There are thick chains stationed along the stairway wall. They're old and rusted, marking the passage of countless prisoners through these halls. The sight of the chains is chilling, a blunt reminder of the tower's somber history.

name: Empty Crate
description: A broken wooden crate that was probably used for storing goods.
examine_text: The crate is made of wooden boards nailed together, now rotted and crumbling. Old, faded markings barely visible suggest that it once contained some sort of goods.

name: Broken Ale Bottles
description: Pieces of shattered glass bottles strewn over the floor.
examine_text: These are fragments of what used to be ale bottles. Some still have labels, but most are too worn to read.

name: Dim Torch
description: An old torch, barely giving off any light.
examine_text: The torch is in a bad state. It seems like it's about to go out any moment now, the flame dancing weakly.

name: Rat's Nest
description: A rat's nest made up of various bits and pieces.
examine_text: Straw, rotten scraps of cloth, and various bits of junk. It's not very pleasant, but the rats seem to consider it home.

name: Iron Crest
description: A large iron crest hung above the door.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the crest looks old but well maintained, symbolizing the steadfast vigilance of the guards. The crest features intricate designs showcasing the town's emblem.

name: Bunk Beds
description: Rows of sturdy wooden bunk beds lined against the walls.
examine_text: Each bunk bed is designed to hold two people and they have clean white sheets neatly folded. The structure looks strong and can withstand a lot of weight.

name: Wooden Chest
description: Large wooden chests placed at the base of the bunk beds.
examine_text: The chests are made out of sturdy oak wood, with metal corners for reinforcement. They have large metal hinges and a lock to keep the contents safe.

name: Stone Windows
description: Stone cut outs are visible on opposite walls, functioning as windows.
examine_text: These are arched windows, cut out of the existing stones, giving a bare but effective passage for light to come in.

name: Torch
description: It's a wall-mounted torch made of iron, emitting a warm light.
examine_text: The torch flickers brightly against the cool stone of the tower. The handle was masterfully crafted out of iron into elaborate swirls. It provides light and a slight heat when you get close.

name: Granite Steps
description: They are the stone steps leading to the top of the tower.
examine_text: The granite steps are worn from countless feet traipsing up and down. Each one is precisely cut and meticulously positioned, evidence of the skilled craftsmanship that built this spiral staircase. It subtly sparkles under the torchlight.

name: Oak Handrail
description: A sleek handrail made from quality oak timber runs through the length of the stairs.
examine_text: This handrail, carved from a single piece of oak, streaks elegantly along the edge of the staircase. It’s polished smooth, worn over the years by the touch of countless hands. The varnish still retains its shine, glistening under the torchlight.

name: Skeleton
description: A creepy old skeleton that has been left here from a previous prisoner.
examine_text: You see an old skeleton with a scared face that is completely white. The bones are scattered about on the floor

name: Old bricks
description: Bricks from the wall of the prison room.
examine_text: Looking closely, you see the grey bricks are worn out and cracked. They are cold to the touch.

name: Chained shackles
description: Rusted shackles attached to the wall
examine_text: The chained shackles are old and rusty, a putrid smell comes from them. It seems they have been used on many prisoners before.

name: Golden Throne
description: A luxurious throne crafted from pure gold
examine_text: The throne is a masterpiece, encrusted with countless jewels and ornate designs that gleam in the sunlight. Sapphires, rubies, and diamonds adorn the armrests and back, creating a stunning spectacle of wealth and power.

name: Regal Red Carpet
description: A long, luxurious carpet of deep crimson, leading up to the throne
examine_text: The carpet is soft underfoot, with beautiful floral patterns woven into its crimson fabric. It leads elegantly from the entrance of the throne room up to the regal golden throne.

name: Ornate Crown
description: A stunning crown gleaming with rare jewels and gold
examine_text: The crown is a marvel of royal craftsmanship, set with radiant diamonds and sapphires. The gold is intricately shaped into a series of elegant, flowing designs that command respect and admiration.

name: Archer's Bow
description: A sturdy wood and string bow resting in the corner.
examine_text: A long, well polished yew bow. It's string is made from strong, twisted animal sinew. It looks like it could project an arrow with lethal force.

name: Rustic table
description: A plain, wooden table situated positioned near the hole.
examine_text: This old, worn table appears to be where archers store their arrows and other necessities during long sieges. It's stained with rings from mugs and smears of oil.

name: Quiver of arrows
description: A leather quiver filled with arrows, placed on the table.
examine_text: This is a full quiver of sharp, straight arrows, each fletched with dark feathers. They're lightweight, yet appear that they could penetrate armor.

name: Stone jug
description: A small, stone jug, probably used for drinking, kept on the table.
examine_text: This jug, made out of rough grey stone, is clearly meant for holding water or other liquids. At the moment, it's empty.

name: Torch
description: A torch, lightly burning, affixed to the wall.
examine_text: This torch provides the only source of light in the place, casting dramatic shadows around the tower. The wood is slightly charred, and the flame dances erratically.

name: Sword
description: A steel sword leaning against the wall.
examine_text: The sword is made of well-polished steel, its blade is sharp and unmarred. A lustrous ruby is embedded in the hilt.

name: Armor
description: A set of sturdy armor.
examine_text: The armor is made of layered steel plates, all expertly crafted and fitted. It looks heavy but wearable.

name: Arrow
description: A bunch of arrows in a quiver.
examine_text: The arrows are long and sleek with exceptionally sharp points. The feathers at the end are carefully fletched for accurate flight.

name: Lance
description: A long lance leaning in the corner.
examine_text: The lance looks heavy and difficult to manage, but in the hands of a skilled knight, deadly in a charge.

name: Treasure Chest
description: A large chest overflowing with jewelry and gold.
examine_text: The chest is made of dark wood with intricate carvings. Inside, it's filled with gold coins, jewels, goblets, and other treasures.

name: Ancient Tapestry
description: A faded tapestry depicting a legendary battle scene.
examine_text: This tapestry hangs on the wall radiating history. The threads, although time-worn and faded still hold the colors of the regiments that once took part in the legendary battle it depicts. There's a solemn aura around it, possibly from the millions of warriors it represents who fought bravely in the past.

name: Mossy Stone
description: A stone covered in moss
examine_text: The stones making up the tower structure are all covered in a layer of damp moss that gives the ancient structure a greenish tinge, in this weather-beaten mossy stone you can see the traces of natural processes that have been happening for centuries.

name: Sealed Room Door
description: A heavily barricaded door that leads to a mysterious room.
examine_text: The door is made of solid, aged oak. There are iron rods and heavy padlocks sealing it shut. It feels cold to the touch, emitting a sense of secrecy and forgotten tales. You wonder who put these barriers here and for what purpose.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword left behind from times gone by.
examine_text: The sword is heavily oxidized, its edge dulled through neglect rather than use. Yet, despite the patina of rust, the craftsmanship still shines through. A reminder of blood-letting it has seen in the past.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword that has seen better days.
examine_text: You see a rusty sword. Its edge is dull, and it clearly has not been cared for in a very long time.

name: Dusty Bow
description: A long bow covered in dust and cobwebs. It seems like it was not used for years.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the bowstring seems a bit frayed but it's still taut and usable.

name: Arrow Quiver
description: A quiver filled with arrows lies discarded on the closet floor.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the arrows seem to be in good condition, despite the dust.

name: Battle Axe
description: A heavy battle axe is leaning against the closet wall.
examine_text: The axe, though quite heavy, is in excellent condition and its blade is sharp. It could do some serious damage.

name: Elegant Wooden Table
description: A long, elegant wooden table that dominates the center of the dining hall.
examine_text: The wood of the table is rich, dark and glossy, and it has been carved with intricate patterns of leaves and vines. It has seen many meals and many conflicts.

name: Ornate Chair
description: An ornate chair, upholstered with plush velvet.
examine_text: The chair's back and arms are carved with motifs of roses and thorns. It gives off an air of power and luxury. This is where the sons had their last argument.

name: Rustic Silverware
description: A set of rustic silverware, laid out at each place setting.
examine_text: A complete set of silverware, including a knife, fork, and spoon, each piece ornately designed with a rustic touch. Despite its age, it's kept quite clean.

name: Gold Plate
description: A gold plate at each place setting.
examine_text: A solid gold plate with intricate engravings along the edge. Its presence adds a layer of opulence to the dining table.

name: Painting of Knights
description: A painting of knights in battle, hung on the wall.
examine_text: The painting is large and imposing, depicting a fierce battle scene. The knights in the painting are locked in combat, faces filled with grim determination.

name: Iron Fence
description: A high fence made of strong iron bars.
examine_text: The fence is exceptionally tall and formidable, a warning to any who would think to cross it. It’s topped with barbed wire, and the iron’s been worn with age, but not to a point of weakness, only serving to make the obstacle look all the more impenetrable.

name: Guard Tower
description: A tall tower with guards keeping a close watch on the vicinity.
examine_text: The guard tower is tall and grim, with a spotlight that constantly roves the yard. Guards armed with rifles are visible behind its fortified windows. It seems impossible to pass unnoticed.

name: Barbed Wire
description: A roll of sharp, pricking barbed wire surrounding the area.
examine_text: Sharp, menacing barbs protrude from a twisted wire which is wound maliciously around the fence. This isn’t a touch and go scenario; even the slightest brush could prove seriously harmful.

name: Guard
description: A stern, unfriendly guard watching diligently.
examine_text: Dressed in dark, uniform attire, their daunting presence suggests they are not to be messed with. Their eyes, sharp and alert, scan the area constantly, watching for any disturbance.

name: Old Wooden Door
description: An aged, hardwood door with worn metal details
examine_text: A heavy door made from old, hard wood that's darkened with age. The metal details, although worn, are still intricate and impressive. There's no visible lock, hinting at perhaps a push to open mechanism.

name: Ancient Sword
description: A rusted, ancient sword that somehow still manages to retain its sharp edge
examine_text: Despite the obvious age and rust spots staining its once gleaming surface, the sword could probably still serve as a formidable weapon in the right hands. The handle, wrapped long ago in leather now dry and cracked, still provides a secure grip.

name: Lone Arrow Slit
description: A thin arrow slit cut into the stone wall
examine_text: The arrow slit is just wide enough to allow a single streak of light to break the gloom of the hallway. It's positioned high on the wall, almost completely out of reach.

name: Broad Sword
description: A large, double-edged sword made of high-quality steel.
examine_text: The sword has a well-crafted hilt that's adorned with emeralds. The blade gleams as it catches the light, showing signs of meticulous care.

name: Chainmail Vest
description: A protective garment made from small metal rings linked together in a pattern to form a mesh.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the chainmail appears to be made out of thousands of tiny, interlinked rings. They seem to be still strong, providing excellent protection.

name: Shield
description: A large, round wooden shield, used for deflecting or bluntly striking.
examine_text: The shield is large and round, made from solid oak, reinforced by an inner ring of metal. The edges are worn from use, but it's still perfectly functional.

name: Helmet
description: A protective headgear made of metal
examine_text: The helmet is smooth, finished in a dull grey. It is lined with leather on the inside for comfort, and provides a narrow slit for vision.

name: Arrows
description: A bundle of usable arrows
examine_text: The arrows are sleek and light. Each arrow tip is wickedly sharp; perfect for piercing targets.

name: Alchemist's Table
description: A worn wooden table covered in various scientific equipment and strange concoctions.
examine_text: Looking closer, you see beakers, flasks, and tubes with colorful liquid inside them. Scratches and burn marks show the age and heavy use of the table.

name: Shelf of Ingredients
description: A tall, wooden shelf, filled with glass jars containing various mysterious substances.
examine_text: Each jar carries a different item, some are organics like leaves and animal parts, others are minerals or unknown substances.

name: Brewing Vat
description: A large vat containing a bubbling brew, it gives off a peculiar scent.
examine_text: It's steaming hot and the bubbles are a strange assortment of colors. It seems like some kind of magical brew.

name: Alchemist's Robe
description: A long, dusty robe, dark in color, laying on a hanger.
examine_text: Made of a rich brocade, embroidered with strange symbols. It seems to be imbued with powerful magic.

name: Iron Grate
description: A rusty iron grate that covers the sewer pipe.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, this stout iron grate appears to be rotting away with rust. It's laden with lots of slimy filth and refuse that is too big to escape through its bars into the dank sewers below.

name: Rusty Dagger
description: An old, rusty dagger, possibly left by a previous treasure seeker.
examine_text: You see an aged oxidized blade with a cracked wooden handle. It's rusty and stained with a hint of dried blood. While it doesn't look effective, it may still be good for self-defense against rats or worse.

name: Human Skeleton
description: The scattered bones of a human, likely once a eager treasure hunter.
examine_text: The bones are gnawed clean, pounded and sun-bleached, interspersed with tattered clothes and the rare small coin. The skull grins up at you, a permanent reminder of the tower's lethal history.

name: Stone oven
description: A large, circular stone oven that gives out a warmth
examine_text: The stone oven is massive, capable of baking several loaves of bread at once. It has an iron door with a small glass viewport. It's lit from within, and you can feel the heat pulsating from the oven.

name: Food basket
description: Various baskets of food ingredients arranged neatly
examine_text: These are woven baskets. Each one is filled with a specific type of fresh ingredient. One has freshly collected eggs, another has various kinds of bread, the third one has potatoes.

name: Cook's apron
description: An apron hanging beside the sacks of flour
examine_text: This is a well-cleaned professional chef's apron. The white fabric is neatly folded, it's been hanged with care. In the front are some pockets where you can put your cooking tools.

name: Cook's cap
description: A white, chef's cap
examine_text: The chef's cap is white as snow. It seems to have been ironed recently. The fabric is crisp and smells clean.

name: Knife
description: A kitchen knife with a wood handle and a shiny steel blade
examine_text: The knife's steel blade is polished to a shine. It's very sharp, and the handle feels good in your hand.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A large, iron cooking pot, suitable for soups and stews.
examine_text: The pot is slightly worn from years of use, but it's still sturdy. There are remnants of the previous meal clinging to the sides.

name: Chicken
description: A live chicken, squawking and flapping in a pen.
examine_text: The chicken is plump and has a healthy-looking coat of feathers, suggesting it's been well cared for to provide a good meal.

name: Table
description: A large, wooden table, covered in cooking ingredients and utensils.
examine_text: The table is solid and a little bit battered from years of chopping and meal preparations. Scattered atop are various cooking utensils and ingredients like spices, vegetables, and flour.

name: Knife
description: A sharp, chef's knife. Useful for both cooking and defending oneself.
examine_text: The blade gleams menacingly. It's been sharpened to a fine edge, clearly maintained with a lot of care.

name: Wooden Table
description: A stable wooden table located at the center of the room.
examine_text: The table is heavy and made from oak. There are scratches and stains that narrate countless meal times and meetings.

name: Brick Fireplace
description: An old brick fireplace warms up the room.
examine_text: The bricks of the fireplace are darkened by years of smoke and use. A comforting heat radiates from it.

name: Metal Door
description: A sturdy metal door, leading to another part of the tower.
examine_text: The door is made of strong iron, a testament to the defensive nature of the tower.

name: Guard Uniform
description: An official uniform of the tower guards.
examine_text: The uniform is made from sturdy material. A badge is stitched onto the breast, displaying the symbol of the tower's ruling house.

name: Loaf of Bread
description: A fresh loaf of bread, presumably for the guard's meal.
examine_text: It's a well-baked loaf, perfect for a hearty meal.

name: Throne
description: A large grandiose chair made from gold and silver
examine_text: The throne features intricate designs carved in gold and silver, with a plush red silk cushion on the seat. It looks like it is designed to fit the posterior of the Citadel's king.

name: Tapestries
description: Large purple and gold tapestries
examine_text: These beautifully woven wall hangings depict scenes of previous victories and royal coronations. They give the room a sense of rich history and illustrious lineage.

name: Paintings
description: Portraits of the previous ruling families' patriarchs
examine_text: Each frame contains the visage of a stern and dignified patriarch. Generations of leadership are represented here; men clad in royal robes and regalia, their eyes echoing the weight of their reign.

name: King's Crown
description: A shining golden crown encrusted with numerous precious gems.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the crown is not merely golden, but made of an alloy of gold and an unknown magical metal. The intricate designs convey its royal importance and the gems represent the different dominions of the king.

name: Sandalwood Incense
description: A stick of fragrant sandalwood incense, still smouldering.
examine_text: Up close, the sweet, woody smell of sandalwood is almost overpowering. The incense stick is placed in a delicate gold holder, the ash falling neatly into the base. A thin trail of smoke curls up from the tip, filling the room with its pleasing aroma.

name: Golden Fruit Bowl
description: A lavish golden bowl brimming with a variety of exotic fruits.
examine_text: This isn't just any fruit bowl-- it's a royal fruit bowl. Each piece of fruit in the bowl seems plumper, juicier, and more vibrant than the next. The golden bowl itself is adorned with intricate carvings depicting scenes of past royal feasts.

name: Old Bed
description: A small, worn-out bed.
examine_text: An old bed with a tattered mattress and threadbare sheets. The metal frame is rusty, and the whole thing creaks ominously if you so much as touch it. It's a depressing sight, and you wonder how long the princess had to sleep on such a thing.

name: Wooden Bucket
description: A dirty wooden bucket.
examine_text: The dark, worn wood of the bucket is stained and grimy from years of use. It's nearly falling apart and looks like it hasn't been cleaned in decades. There's an awful smell wafting from it.

name: Barred Window
description: A small window with iron bars.
examine_text: The window is just large enough to allow a glimpse of the outside world. Rusty iron bars are secured on it, through which is a view of the endless landscape. You can feel a brisk wind seeping in through the tiny gaps. The view is a cruel reminder of freedom that's only an arm's reach away.

name: copper beaker
description: A slightly tarnished copper beaker
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the beaker contains some kind of strangely colored liquid. It's a tad heavy and feels cold to the touch.

name: alembic
description: An ancient device for distillation
examine_text: This alembic appears to be made of glass and copper. It's used in alchemical processes, possibly for the distillation of magical potions.

name: forbidden book
description: A dusty old tome bound in dark leather
examine_text: The book's pages are filled with ancient runes and illicit knowledge. It's clear that whoever reads this will learn secrets they may not be prepared for.

name: purple stone
description: A tiny, glowing purple stone
examine_text: The small purple stone pulsates with a strange energy. It floats aimlessly inside a glass flask, an element of the Alchemist's greatest experiment.

name: Stone bench
description: A bench carved out of stone, serving as the only seat in the prison.
examine_text: The bench is cold and deformed because of the many prisoners who have sat on it. It is hard, uncomfortable, and worn out.

name: Old bucket
description: An old bucket, used by the prisoners for eliminating waste.
examine_text: The bucket is dirty and it smells terrible. It's made of old, rusty iron and shows signs of long-time use.

name: Prisoner's chains
description: Heavy iron chains, used to limit the prisoner's movements.
examine_text: These chains are solid and heavy, the rust on them revealing their age. They have a keyhole for opening but the key is nowhere to be found.

name: Rusty Chains
description: A set of cold, rusty chains hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: Upon examining the chains, you can see they're old and rusted. Some links are barely holding together. Bits of moss and lichen grow on the damper portions and the iron has a peculiar, bitter smell.

name: Iron Maiden
description: A tall, imposing iron maiden; its spike-filled interior visible
examine_text: With its old, rusted exterior and menacing interior filled with stiletto-sharp spikes, it's clear that the iron maiden is an instrument of torture. Dried blood stains splotch the spikes, reminding you of the victims that met their gruesome end inside.

name: Flickering Torch
description: A lone torch burns, casting jittery shadows on the moldy walls.
examine_text: The fire wanes, making the torch burn in an uneven manner. At times, the surrounding atmosphere feels soothing; other times, oppressively foreboding. It's secured firmly in a sconce attached to the wall - it's not portable, unfortunately.

name: Filthy Water
description: A pool of murky, grimy water that sits in the middle of Toad Hollow.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the muddied color of the water obscures anything below the surface. It's stagnant and gives off a foul smell that is reminiscent of old, rotting plants.

name: Lily Pads
description: Several damp lily pads float atop the grubby water, offering occasional breaks from the sodden scenery.
examine_text: Each lily pad is large with a slick surface. The undersides are a deep lavender, while the upper surface is a waxy, vivid green. Tiny droplets of water collect on the surface of the pads, balancing delicately.

name: Drainage Pipe
description: There are several rusty drainage pipes that form the entrance and exit of Toad Hollow.
examine_text: The pipe is cold, wet, and slimy, constructed from rusted metal. It appears large enough for a human to crawl through, albeit uncomfortably. Dark stains streak the inside of the pipe.

name: Giant Toad
description: Giant toads inhabit Toad Hollow, leaping from lily pad to lily pad.
examine_text: The toad's skin is a mottled blend of browns and greens, its eyes are luminescent, and it has a grotesquely large body. It seems unperturbed by your presence.

name: Golden Trident
description: A trident made of solid gold, glittering in the sparse light of the treasury.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, you can see aged symbols etched into the handle, telling a tale of ancient victories. It is remarkably light, although huge, and doing anything more than observing it seems to violate the sanctity of the weapon.

name: Jeweled Crown
description: A crown adorned with variety of precious gems.
examine_text: The crown exhibits perfect craftsmanship; each gem skillfully embedded into the gold frame, glinting with a unique brilliance. Pearls, ruby, emerald, sapphire... a true testament of the underwater kingdom's wealth.

name: Ancient Map
description: It appears to be a map made from a material you can't identify.
examine_text: You carefully unroll the map that remarkably has stood the test of time. It depicts the Aquapolis in its prime, with additional notes and symbols possibly indicating secret passages and treasure spots within the city.

name: Market Stand Sign
description: A brightly colored sign hanging from the top of a market stand
examine_text: The sign is made out of water-resistant material and covered with luminescent colors, ensuring it can be seen even in the dim underwater light. It appears to be for a business that sells rare crustaceans.

name: Sea Newspaper
description: A paper made of underwater plant fibers, filled with the daily news of the kingdom
examine_text: The paper is full of news and updates from different parts of the kingdom. It seems that the recent sightings of a giant squid have been causing a bit of a panic.

name: Aquatic Fruit
description: A luminous fruit with a vivid color, glistening under the underwater light
examine_text: The fruit appears to be similar to a pomegranate, sparking with a unique, fluorescent glow. Nobody in the surface world has ever seen this type of food. It seems to be incredibly fresh and delicious.

name: Underwater Robes
description: Beautifully crafted robes, made with exclusive underwater fabric
examine_text: Inspecting the robes closer, you see they are made of a strange, shimmering material. It has been designed with luminescent threads that create an ethereal glow under the water. They look soft, versatile and breathable, perfect for a comfortable swim.

name: Neptune's Throne
description: A giant throne made of seashells and corals.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the throne's armrests seem to be carved from a solid piece of mother of pearl. The seat is covered in layers of soft sea sponges, giving it a comfortable look.

name: Coral Table
description: A table made from intricately carved corals.
examine_text: It seems that each coral leg is sculpted to resemble ocean plants waving in the sea current. A closer look at the table top reveals a carved depiction of mermaids frolicking amongst the coral reefs.

name: Decorative Shell
description: A large conch shell used for decoration.
examine_text: The conch is of considerable size and shimmers under the light. It has been gently polished to reveal its natural beauty. It could also be used to call others if blown into.

name: Pressure Suit
description: A suit designed to protect the wearer from pressure changes and water damage.
examine_text: The pressure suit is designed to withstand the pressure changes when going to the outside water. It looks sturdy and appears to be able to protect the wearer from the crushing depths.

name: Diving Helmet
description: A big, bulbous helmet with glass window in front.
examine_text: The helmet is bulky, crafted from a dense metal and designed to keep the wearer's head safe and dry. The small, thick window allows only a minimum view but enough to navigate.

name: Tool Box
description: A small box containing various tools.
examine_text: This box is made of a tough, water-resistant material and locked tightly closed. It seems to rattle when you shake it - likely it's full of various tools for maintenance work.

name: Dry Dock Door
description: The main entrance to the dry dock.
examine_text: The massive metal door serves as the barrier sealing the aquapolis from the crushing depths of the sea. It can be opened only when the dry dock is filled with water, equalizing the pressure.

name: Coral Flask
description: A small, beautifully crafted bottle made entirely of coral.
examine_text: The flask is meticulously sculpted from peach-colored coral, with intricate swirls and patterns etched onto its surface. It has a small cork stopper and seems to be filled with a shimmering liquid.

name: Sea Silk Shawl
description: A soft, shimmering shawl woven from the finest kelp silk.
examine_text: The shawl is gossamer-thin and incredibly soft to the touch, its hues shifting between emerald and turquoise in the light. It's light, airy, and seems to flow like water when moved.

name: Pearl Dagger
description: A sharp dagger with a hilt carved from a single, large pearl.
examine_text: The dagger's blade shimmers with a dangerous light, while the intricate hilt seems to have been carved from a particularly large, lustrous pearl. Despite its beauty, one can tell it is more than just a decorative piece.

name: Sunlight Pendant
description: A pendant that contains a shining sun ray.
examine_text: Its seashell case reflects iridescent hues as it encases a fragment of an actual sun's ray, which forever shines inside it like an eternal flame.

name: Microscope
description: A high-powered microscope used for analyzing samples.
examine_text: You see a microscope built to analyze things at a molecular level. It is extremely advanced, much more so than any microscope you've seen topside.

name: Research notes
description: A stack of notes from the ongoing research.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see the notes detail various findings on marine biology, some of which are completely fringing on the unknown.

name: Lab Coat
description: A white lab coat made of special material to withstand the underwater environment.
examine_text: The lab coat is perfectly white and pristine. It has the emblem of the aquapolis stitched on it, showing the bearer as part of the science team.

name: Sample Container
description: A small, sterile container for collecting samples.
examine_text: The container is made of clear, high strength plastic with a air-tight seal to preserve any samples that are stored in it.

name: Seaweed Bundle
description: Fresh seaweed harvested from the fields.
examine_text: A large bundle of dark green seaweed. It is wet and slick to touch, and gives off a briny smell.

name: Old Table
description: A small wooden table, whole family uses it for meals.
examine_text: This table has clearly seen years of use. Its surface is weathered and scarred, but it still holds sturdy.

name: Rustic Chair
description: A handcrafted chair, used frequently, but still in good shape.
examine_text: The chair is made of some undersea wood. It's old and creaks slightly under weight, but still functional.

name: Shabby Closet
description: An old wooden closet where farmer keeps his belongings.
examine_text: The closet is dark and musty, crammed with bits and bobs. Certain items of interest might be hidden within its depths.

name: Thermal Crystal
description: A shimmery orb that is warmed from the surrounding geothermal heat.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the crystal is not merely glowing from heated energy, it seems to have an inner light that flickers and dances as you observe it. Its warmth is inviting.

name: Healing Pool
description: A natural pool enriched with minerals known for their healing properties.
examine_text: Dipping your fingers into the warm pool, you feel a tingling sensation. It is said that wounds can heal and strength can be recovered by bathing in this mystical mini-lagoon.

name: Sea Urchin Sushi
description: A piece of Sea urchin sushi, freshly prepared by underwater aquapolis' top chef.
examine_text: On a small bed of seaweed rice lies a tender medallion of sea urchin - a delicacy in underwater communities. It looks fresh and smells divine.

name: Aquatic Hoe
description: A long tool typically used for tilling underwater soil.
examine_text: The Hoe is solid and reliable, made out of titanium to resist corrosion and feature artificial gills to adjust buoyancy. It's quite heavy, signifying its sturdy build and efficient functionality.

name: Seaweed Shovel
description: Specifically designed tool for shoveling seaweed and soft underwater earth.
examine_text: This Shovel has a wide, concave blade which contains a cutting edge at its bottom, made from steel alloy. Designed to scoop and transport seaweed and soft earth.

name: Storage Box
description: A storage box to keep tools and other items.
examine_text: This is a large, sturdy wooden box with a metal latch. It's water-resistant and looks capable of holding a decent amount of stuff.

name: Colorful Blossoms
description: A variety of flowers of assorted colors
examine_text: You look closer at the flowers, their vibrant colors stand out even under the shade of the trees. The blossoms are in their full form, a delightful view to the eyes.

name: Climbing Vines
description: Thick vines climbing up the tree trunks
examine_text: As you glance at the enormous vines, they seem to move, looping and twisting across the tree trunks. You can see clusters of ripe berries hanging from it.

name: Ancient Oak
description: An old but sturdy oak tree within the forest clearing
examine_text: As you gaze at the ancient oak, you can detect the history in its gnarled bark. The branching roots seem to hold an invisible entrance.

name: Fruit
description: A cluster of ripe fruits hanging from the vines
examine_text: As you gaze at the fruits, their color catches your eye. They are ripe and juicy, quenching both thirst and hunger.

name: Wooden Staff
description: A long, wooden staff with various strange symbols etched into it.
examine_text: The staff is taller than you and made from the wood of an ancient tree. Indistinguishable symbols are carved along its length. The staff gives off a faint glow, indicating it is probably enchanted.

name: Leaf Clothes
description: Clothes woven from various leaves and vines.
examine_text: Closer inspection of the clothes reveals they are tightly woven from the leaves and vines of different local plants. They are surprisingly thick and durable and should offer some protection while being light and breathable.

name: Wizards potion
description: A strange bubbling concoction in a clear glass vial.
examine_text: The potion is a swirling iridescent liquid. It seems to bubble of its own accord and gives off a light, pleasant scent. The vial is sealed with a wax stopper.

name: Wooden Hut
description: A small hut that blends in with the surrounding trees.
examine_text: The hut has been carefully crafted to blend into the surrounding foliage. Small windows can be seen peering out from within the leaves and bark.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old iron sword, left by a knight
examine_text: The sword has seen better days. The iron is rusting, with nicks and chips on the blade from intense battles. A faint symbol can be seen on the hilt- a crest of some sort.

name: Haystack
description: A large pile of hay, often used for rest
examine_text: The haystack is quite large, made of golden strands of hay. Something may have been left behind within the pile from previous amorous endeavors.

name: Silver Sickle
description: A curved, sharp tool used by the wenches as payment
examine_text: This sickle, though often used as currency amongst the residents, still holds a sharp edge. The silver shines brightly even under the dense tree cover.

name: Fish Bucket
description: A sturdy iron bucket with few noticeable dents.
examine_text: Colour has faded away due to prolonged usage. Large enough to carry four fishes.

name: Fishing Net
description: A large network of thread, designed to catch fish.
examine_text: The net is intricately tied and has a few torn edges from past catches but is still ready to use.

name: Drinking Gourd
description: A large dried and hollowed-out gourd used historically for carrying water.
examine_text: You see a hollowed out gourd with a stopper made from cork. It's light and solid, good for refilling with water from the stream.

name: River Stones
description: Smooth, worn stones from the bank of the stream.
examine_text: You pick up a stone — it's surprisingly smooth, and cold under your fingers.

name: Long Reeds
description: Tall, spindly reeds poking out of the river and bent by the water's flow.
examine_text: Binded tightly together, they are thick and erect, reaching almost to your waist. Their feathery, swaying tips release floating seeds into the air, and their rough, sandpapery surface makes them difficult to hold for long.

name: Forest Berries
description: Clusters of round, juicy-looking berries positioned along the river bank.
examine_text: The berries have a rich, violet hue and are glossy with dew. They seem edible and exude a delicious, slightly tart scent.

name: Polished Stone
description: A small, smooth stone lying near the edge of the water.
examine_text: The water of the river has worn this stone into a sleek pebble. It is smooth to touch and has an unremarkable earthy brown color.

name: Water
description: A flowing river, clear and cold. The only source of fresh water in this forest.
examine_text: The clear river gurgles passively, its consistent flow causing the surface to teem with life. Cool to the touch and clear enough to see the riverbed.

name: Mysterious Mushrooms
description: A clump of colorful, inedible mushrooms growing around the base of a tree.
examine_text: A strange variety of mushrooms, they're vibrant and mesmerizing, but don't look safe to eat. Their stems are thick and robust, caps large and dotted with unusual patterns and colors.

name: Tall Ancient Tree
description: A towering, gnarled tree that looks as old as the forest itself.
examine_text: This massive tree has a gnarled and twisted trunk, with thick moss coating its bark. Despite its age, it still stands defiant and firm, its leaves dark and lush.

name: Ghostly Fog
description: A constant, eerie fog that blankets the forest floor.
examine_text: The fog is unusually cold and dense. It seems to cling to everything around it, obscuring the base of the trees and turning the forest into a surreal, otherworldly landscape.

name: Hunters' Crossbow
description: A well-crafted crossbow left behind by a hunter.
examine_text: The crossbow is made of sturdy wood and iron, with a well-worn grip. It's light but decisive, an expertly crafted tool for skilled hunting.

name: Old Tree
description: A towering, old tree covered in moss
examine_text: You see a tall tree towering above you. Its bark is full of moss, indicating its age. It has wide spread branches, which are home to many birds

name: River Rocks
description: Smooth, polished rocks from the river
examine_text: The rocks at the river's edge are smooth and shiny, polished over time by the river. Some are oddly shaped and various sizes

name: Bluegill
description: A small, but tasty, freshwater fish
examine_text: The bluegill is a colorful little fish, no more than four inches long. Its scales are shiny, and it has a blue-purple gill cover

name: River Water
description: Fresh, clear water from the river
examine_text: The water from the river is crystal clear, and you can sip it directly from the running stream. It's cool and refreshing

name: Leather Backpack
description: A sturdy backpack made of dark brown leather.
examine_text: On close examination, you see that the backpack is old but well-worn. It appears to be handmade, and the leather is studded with small charms and trinkets. Despite its age, it seems to be sturdy enough to hold a fair amount of items.

name: Water Flask
description: A small flask filled with fresh water.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see that the flask is made of glass and wrapped in a leather casing. The water inside looks clean and clear, an inviting sight to a thirsty traveler.

name: Loaf of Bread
description: A freshly baked loaf of bread.
examine_text: Upon further examination of the loaf, you can see the golden brown crust and can almost taste the rich, yeasty flavor. It appears to be freshly made and still warm from the oven.

name: Sharp Axe
description: A sharp and sturdy axe.
examine_text: Looking at the axe up close, you see the shiny, sharp blade, the gleam of the well-polished handle and can feel the heft of a useful, quality tool.

name: Camouflage Cloak
description: A cloak designed to blend in with the forest surroundings.
examine_text: Examining the cloak in more detail, you see the various shades of green, brown and other colors that match the forest, interwoven to create a stunning patchwork of Earth's natural hues.

name: Oak Tree
description: A huge and majestic oak tree
examine_text: The tree trunks are thick and dark with textured and rough bark. Looking up, you can see the branches of the tree stretching outwards, covered with leaves. An occasional acorn might slip from the branches above.

name: Wildflowers
description: A patch of wildflowers growing in the light
examine_text: The flowers vary in size and color, growing close together. Some have delicate petals, and others have bold, vibrant colors. They smell fragrant when you get close.

name: Walking Stick
description: An abandoned walking stick leaning against a tree
examine_text: The wooden stick looks solid and sturdy, with a light brown color. It is polished smooth and worn from use.

name: Bear Tracks
description: A set of large bear tracks leading deeper into the forest
examine_text: The prints are large and fresh, indicating the bear isn't far away. The moist mud around the prints have captured it perfectly, showing the deep indentations of the bear's claws.

name: Berry Bush
description: A bush covered with ripe berries
examine_text: The bush is full of small, ripe berries. The berries are a deep, luscious red and look juicy. The leaves on the bush are a deep, dark green and slightly glossy

name: Picnic Basket
description: A quaint wicker basket filled with food items.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you take a peek inside the picnic basket. It smells of fresh bread and ripe fruit. You also see a few jars of homemade jam and some comfortable looking flannel picnic blankets.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A simple wooden fishing rod with a sturdy piece of string attached to it.
examine_text: The fishing rod seems to be made out of solid pine and has a moderately worn grip, suggesting that it has been used often. A single metal hook dangles from the end of a strong string.

name: Tree Stump
description: A cut down tree stump that serves as a seat
examine_text: With sawdust still fresh on its surface, the tree stump is surprisingly smooth and makes for a rather comfortable seat. Resilient moss is gradually claiming the sides, displaying a mix of green and brown hues.

name: Tall Tree
description: A large tree that towers over you.
examine_text: The tree is tall and strong with a thick trunk. Its branches are full of green, beautiful leaves and you can hear the soft rustling of the wind. Around the base are a plethora of roots, binding the tree to the earth.

name: Bow and Arrows
description: An ancient hunters' tool left behind.
examine_text: The bow is made from fine yew, flexible and strong. The arrows are tipped with sharp iron points and have feathers on the end for guidance. All items are worn from age but still usable.

name: Deer
description: A majestic creature of the forest.
examine_text: The deer is a beautiful creature with a brown coat. It has grand antlers and kind eyes, nibbling on some foliage. It looks wary and ready to spring away at any sign of danger.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A simple fishing rod made of wood and twine
examine_text: This is a simple and sturdy fishing rod, made by a local craftsman. It has a wooden handle and a long, thin pole attached to it. A thin line of twine is attached to the end of the pole.

name: Rocks
description: A pile of different sized rocks lying on the ground
examine_text: These are simple rocks, with different sizes and colors. Some of them have interesting shapes and patterns.

name: Pond Water
description: Shimmering water of the pond full of life
examine_text: The water is mostly clear and shimmers in the light. Tiny fish dart in and out of the reeds, and you observe frogs lounging on nearby lily pads.

name: Tree Bark
description: Bark from the surrounding trees
examine_text: Looking closely at the bark, it appears rough and rugged, as a testament to the tree's years of survival in the wilderness.

name: Ancient Tree
description: A massive and imposing tree, its bark gnarled by years of existence in the Forest.
examine_text: At a closer look, the Ancient Tree appears even more intimidating, it's massive roots gripping the earth deeply, it's hollow trunk leading into a dark abyss and it's branches that seem to reach out menacingly. Spider webs dangle from the branches and you see movement - bigger spiders than you'd like.

name: Witch's Hat
description: A black, triangle shaped hat, encrusted with glittering gems.
examine_text: The Hat seems to thrum with an unseen energy. The gems shine with an ethereal light and the fabric feels like centuries old. This Hat definitely seems to belong to one of the witches from the Forbidden Forest.

name: Creepy Crawly
description: A shadowy creature, skittering around with eight legs and too many eyes.
examine_text: As you get closer, the Creepy Crawly lets out a chittering sound, it's multiple legs shifting uneasily and it's fangs glinting in low light. Try not to get bitten by it.

name: Old Tombstone
description: An ancient, weathered tombstone that stands amid the pine trees.
examine_text: The tombstone, battered and eroded by countless years, no longer bears an eligible name. Some arcane symbols can still be made out, hinting at forgotten rites and ceremonies.

name: Dead Grass
description: Bunches of yellowed, lifeless grass blanketing the ground.
examine_text: So much grass, browned and brittle. Unpleasant to walk on and even worse to touch. It crumbles beneath your fingers, sharp and prickly.

name: Moss
