description: Dark green, damp moss growing from the graveyard's cold stones.
examine_text: The moss grows in thick patches, covering the rocks and tombstones. It's soft, damp, and surprisingly warm to the touch.

name: Crawling Critters
description: Small creatures scurrying over the graveyard's terrain.
examine_text: Tiny creatures, some resembling spiders, others more like beetles, scuttle across the ground. They are shy and quick, retreating at your approach.

name: Fairy Wing
description: A delicate, ethereal wing of a fairy, shimmering with iridescent color.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the wing is incredibly fine - it's almost like looking at a rainbow under a water droplet. It's soft to the touch, and seems to glow with a magical aura.

name: Watermelon Skin Home
description: A small, quaint home, crafted expertly from the skin of a watermelon. It seems to be a fairy's abode.
examine_text: Propped up by thin slivers of wood, the Watermelon Skin Home looks remarkably durable. You can't see inside, but a soft glow suggests it is inhabited. The sweet smell of fresh watermelon fills the air.

name: Unicorn Horn
description: A long, spiraled unicorn horn. It sparkles with a mesmerizing, multi-colored luster.
examine_text: The Unicorn Horn is a thing of beauty. It is firm yet smooth, cool to the touch and emanates a sense of powerful magic. There are faint traces of silver and gold along its spiraled surface, reflecting light in a pleasing, calming manner.

name: Fairy Whistle
description: A small ornate whistle, it's said to summon a fairy when blown.
examine_text: The whistle is made of wood, carved intricately with designs of fairies and flowers. If you put it to your ear, you can hear a faint, magical humming.

name: Ornate Bird Feather
description: A colorful feather from one of the forest's ornate birds. It's a stunning piece of natural beauty.
examine_text: The feather is lush and vibrant, its colors seemingly shifting and changing when viewed from different angles. Touching it, you find it soft and warm, as if retaining some essence of the bird it came from.

name: Broken Branch
description: A large branch that looks like it recently fell from a tree.
examine_text: The branch is solid and heavy with a rough, barky surface.  One end seems to have been cleanly snapped off, while the other tapers to a sharp point.

name: Loamy Soil
description: A rich, earthy soil scattered with fallen leaves.
examine_text: The soil is damp to the touch, rich with organic matter and teeming with tiny, unseen lifeforms.  Fallen leaves provide a crunchy top layer.

name: Decaying Leaves
description: A pile of decaying leaves.
examine_text: The crumpled leaves are in various stages of decay, their once vibrant colors turned to muted shades of brown.  They are damp and spongy to the touch.

name: Giant Ant
description: A huge, aggressive ant.
examine_text: A giant, red ant that is scurrying around with significant speed. It has strong jaws and serrated mandibles which look capable of dealing lethal bites.

name: Ant Queen
description: The queen of the ant colony.
examine_text: A frighteningly large ant queen, easily distinguished by her massive size. She is bulbous and nearly immobile, her only task to lay eggs for the colony.

name: Fallen Branch
description: A large, sturdy branch that has fallen from the pine tree.
examine_text: Weathered and worn, the branch is long and sharp at one end. It seems it could be useful as a makeshift weapon.

name: Pine Cone
description: A large, prickly pine cone, fallen from the tree above.
examine_text: The pine cone is tightly closed, with its scales protecting the seeds inside. It has a rough texture and a sharp tip.

name: Root Chair
description: A sturdy chair made from interwoven roots
examine_text: The chair looks hard, but sits very comfortably. The roots have been interwoven in an intricate design

name: Wooden Table with Flowers
description: A table made of wood adorned with flowers
examine_text: The table is adorned with fresh wildflowers. It's constructed from several pieces of sturdy forest wood

name: Wooden Cup
description: A cup made of wood
examine_text: The cup appears to be carved from a single piece of wood. It is sturdy and light

name: Grass Bed
description: A bed made from interlaced grass and leaves
examine_text: The bed is soft and surprisingly comfortable. It's mostly made of dry grass and leaves

name: Glowing Flower
description: A flower that glows dimly
examine_text: The flower emits a soft, ethereal light. It's a rare and magical plant

name: Old Backpack
description: A worn out backpack, seems to have been left here a long time ago.
examine_text: The backpack is made of sturdy, faded canvas. Dust has settled on it and you can see a hint of a red star patch sewn onto the side of it. The zippers are a bit rusty, but it still seems to be sturdy.

name: Sword
description: An ancient sword, stuck into the ground.
examine_text: The old sword has been thrust into the ground, hilt up. The blade is rusting but still looks sharp. It must be old, probably a relic from a bygone era.

name: Rustic Hat
description: A hat seeming to be long forgotten and left by some traveler.
examine_text: The rustic, brown hat is wide-brimmed, made out of straw. It has lost its shape in a few areas, perhaps due to rain or a clumsy foot. It might provide some shade if worn.

name: Apple
description: A red, juicy apple fallen from a tree branch.
examine_text: This apple looks ripe and delicious. It's skin is shiny and it appears to be fresh and full of juicy goodness. It's free of any visible blemishes.

name: Elven Sword
description: A beautifully crafted Elven Sword with intricate designs
examine_text: You see a long sword with an ornately decorated blade, its hilt wrapped in leather. The design and craftsmanship suggest it was made by Elves

name: Magic Potion
description: A magical potion that glows with a peculiar light.
examine_text: The potion is in a delicate glass vial, the liquid inside glows with an unearthly light promising magical effects.

name: Guard's Helm
description: A sturdy helm, seems it belongs to the guard.
examine_text: The helm is robust, made of tightly woven metal. It has several nicks and dents from battles fought.

name: Mysterious Book
description: An old dusty book, the content seems unfamiliar.
examine_text: The book is ancient, its pages yellow and brittle. The text is in a language you can't understand, and strange symbols adorn the margins.

name: Oak Tree
description: A grand and ancient tree with a trunk you can't quite wrap your arms around.
examine_text: The mighty Oak stands earnest in the woodland, its wide trunk covered in coarse bark with patches of moss. Its branches stretch out high above, touching the sky with an array of leaves rustling softly in the breeze. The tree itself is home to myriad creatures, a complex ecosystem in its own right.

name: Fallen Log
description: A large log, possibly from an old tree, lying on the foliage.
examine_text: The fallen log is large and robust, having rotted slightly to create an array of holes and crevices where small creatures could nest. Its bark has withered away in spots, and the wood underneath is visible and splintered.

name: Field Mushroom
description: A small white mushroom growing in the moist soil.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, the field mushroom looks to be an edible Amanita. Its cap is circular and white, its gills not seen due to the shield-like position of the cap. A slender stalk holds it upright, imbedded in the wet earth.

name: Longbow
description: A sturdy longbow left by an archer, leaning against a tree.
examine_text: The longbow is made from well treated yew wood, the natural curve of the wood providing the tension needed for firing arrows. A well worn string, made from twisted animal gut, is stretched tight along its length. The wood is incredibly smooth, clearly well cared for and oiled regularly.

name: Old Fishing Rod
description: An old fishing rod left on the pier, probably by a forgetful villager.
examine_text: This fishing rod is old and seems barely usable. The wooden pole is weathered, making the paint peeled off. The line is tangled and thin, suggesting countless usage. A worn-out lure is attached at the end of the line.

name: Seashells
description: A small collection of seashells washed up along the pier. They are hard, brittle, and hollow.
examine_text: These seashells come in a variety of shapes and sizes, each unique in their own way. From spiral-coned to hat-shaped, their smooth textures and vibrant colors reveal the beauty of submarine life.

name: Fishing Nets
description: These large fishing nets are often left hanging on the rails, filled with the day's worth of catches.
examine_text: The nets are enormous and woven tightly with strong ropes. Some remnants of seafood can still be seen entangled in the hollows of the nets, and the smell of the sea is pervasive.

name: Barnacles on Pilings
description: Clusters of small white barnacles have made these wooden pilings their home.
examine_text: These tiny sea creatures firmly attached their shells to the surface of the pilings, forming small complex colonies. The sight gives an enchanting, oceanside touch to the entire wooden structure.

name: Weathered Hat
description: A worn-out hat, presumably belong to a peasant or a fisherman, was left behind on the pier.
examine_text: The hat has definitely seen better days. It is dirt-stained and with frayed edges, yet still functional enough to provide shade under the hot sun.

name: Old Compass
description: A rusty, age-worn compass.
examine_text: You squint to make out the faded markings on the old brass plate. The needle trembles slightly, still faithful to its purpose despite the passage of time.

name: Lighthouse Log Book
description: A thick, weathered log book.
examine_text: The pages of the log book are yellowed, filled with the meticulous records of countless years. Who knows what secrets it might hold...

name: Lighthouse Lamp
description: A large, oil-burning lamp. It casts a wide beam of light.
examine_text: This massive beacon projects its warm light for miles. It's meticulously clean, expertly cared for, despite showing signs of its age. It's not something that can be easily moved.

name: Old Seaman's Coat
description: A weather-beaten seaman's coat worn by the lighthouse keeper.
examine_text: The coat is heavy and of canvas material designed to withstand strong winds and stormy conditions. It smells of sea salt, its once vibrant navy color now faded to a washed-out grey. You can feel the strength and history in every fiber.

name: Old Sea Chest
description: An ancient wooden chest, weathered by time and salty air.
examine_text: The chest is made of worn-out, grey wood. Small, intricate carvings of sea creatures adorn its surface. It's locked tightly, but you notice a rusted metal keyhole.

name: Tattered Hammock
description: A hammock that's seen better days. Its frayed ropes barely hold together.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see strands of the once colorful fabric, worn thin and faded from the harsh beach sun. The ropes are shady and frayed. It's questionable whether it can still bear weight.

name: Broken Lantern
description: A half-burned, discarded item that must have been used to light the night sky.
examine_text: The lantern has a crack in its glass and the flicker of the flame is long gone. It's covered in a layer of sand, and the metal handle is corroded from the constant exposure to the salt air.

name: Clam Shell
description: A large, empty clam shell.
examine_text: The clam shell is large and rough to touch, with streaks of vivid colors on the inside. It's completely empty, save for some dry, crusty residue along the edges.

name: Seashell
description: A dainty, iridescent seashell.
examine_text: A shiny glimmering seashell, polished over by the sea’s tide. It's iridescent pfpearance makes it pretty and eye-catching.

name: Pirate's Chest
description: A rustic, weathered chest that appears to be filled with treasures.
examine_text: A sturdy wooden chest, tarnished and eroded by time and seawater, overflows with shining gems and gold-coins. Its lock is rusted but it seems it can still be opened with the right key.

name: Seaweed
description: Green and slimy seaweed washed ashore.
examine_text: A mass of intertwined green strands of seaweed, still fresh and damp from the sea. It has a distinct salty aroma.

name: Corals
description: A bunch of colorful corals.
examine_text: A stunning collection of corals of different shapes, sizes and colors. They are quite sharp and textured.

name: Mermaid's Scale
description: A shiny silver scale from a mermaid's tail.
examine_text: This scale shimmers in the sunlight with an iridescent silver glow. It's smooth and oddly warm to touch. It may have magical properties.

name: Seashell
description: A small, cool and colorful seashell.
examine_text: A beautiful tiny seashell that was washed ashore. It's spiral in shape and has a smooth, cool texture. It has a mix of vibrant colors from orange, pink to blue.

name: Beach Ball
description: A colorful and inflatable beach ball.
examine_text: The beach ball is inflated, ready for some beach fun. It's vibrant stripes of color give off a vintage beach vibe.

name: Picnic Basket
description: A woven picnic basket filled with snacks and drinks.
examine_text: This is a woven picnic basket filled with goodies perfect for a beach picnic. There's fruit, sandwiches, and refreshing drinks.

name: Sunny Hat
description: A large brimmed summer hat.
examine_text: A stylish summer hat with a large brim. It's perfect for protecting against the summer sun while adding a touch of fashion.

name: Beach Towel
description: A huge beach towel with a vibrant pattern.
examine_text: A large beach towel, perfect for sun bathing or picnicing. It's covered in a vibrant tropical pattern.

name: Seagull Feather
description: A small, white feather discarded by a seagull.
examine_text: The feather is white, small and soft. Probably from a seagull. It is clean but delicate, it would be easily destroyed by rough handling.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A basic rod for fishing.
examine_text: It's an ordinary fishing rod, long and made out of sturdy material, with a line, hook, and float attached. There's a handle for reeling in fish. Looks like it's been well-used.

name: Bucket
description: A simple bucket, apparently used by villagers for fishing.
examine_text: A simple, sturdy metal bucket. It looks capable of holding seashells, water or whatever else you might need to carry.

name: Golden Throne
description: An ornate golden throne inlaid with precious gems.
examine_text: The throne is shining brightly with gold and a variety of dazzling gems. It's made for the king's comfort, but also tall and imposing, designed to overawe any who dare approach it.

name: Regal Carpet
description: A plush red carpet that spans the length of the throne room.
examine_text: The carpet is richly woven, thick and soft, with intricate designs woven in gold thread.

name: Kings Crown
description: The king's golden crown studded with rare jewels.
examine_text: The elaborate crown is expertly crafted from gold and encrusted with a variety of rare gems. Each gem symbolizes a different aspect of kingship.

name: Royal Paintings
description: Priceless paintings of past kings adorn the walls.
examine_text: Each painting is masterfully done, showing a different king in the prime of his reign. They all exhibit such realism and fine detail that each face seems almost alive.

name: Rope
description: A long, strong rope made of hemp.
examine_text: This hemp rope has been weathered by the sea air, but it still retains its sturdiness. It's quite long and could certainly be useful.

name: Bosun's Whistle
description: A small silver whistle often used by ship's officers.
examine_text: A polished silver whistle engraved with intricate designs. It's traditionally used for giving commands on a ship. Although neglected for years, its luster remains with a magical glow.

name: Ornate Railing
description: A beautifully designed railing stretching along the ship's stairs.
examine_text: The railing glistens, ornate carvings decorating its surface. Its construction shows the craftsmanship of a bygone era. Although stationary, it seems to echo with the voices of those who once held tight during stormy voyages.

name: Captains Hat
description: A forgotten Captain's hat laying on the ship's wheel
examine_text: The prestigious cap of a ship's captain. Its gold brocade frames a large brim, revealing a symbol of authority and respect. The long-abandoned hat retains its shape, eager to once again command the seas.

name: Sea Jewel
description: A large, gleaming gem from the sea monster's eyes.
examine_text: This brilliant jewel shines with an ethereal light that reflects the color of the sea. It is embedded within the statue of the sea monster,  its mesmerizing glare hinting at potent magical properties.

name: Old Rusted Anchor
description: An old anchor, rusted from years of exposure to the saltry sea
examine_text: This old anchor is rusted entirely, with no unexposed metal remaining. The surface pockmarked and discolored. Despite the decay, you can see that it was once quite a large and strong tool. It seems like it has been forgotten here for a long time.

name: Mariner's Compass
description: A mariner's compass left behind on the docks.
examine_text: It's a traditional nautical compass, encased in aged brass and glass. The cardinal points are faded but still legible. This tool must have been critical to a sailor at some point, but now it's been carelessly left on the docks.

name: Dockside Crate
description: A wooden crate resting on the docks.
examine_text: This sturdy wooden crate was once used for shipping goods. It's seen better days, but it's still sealed shut. The faded image on its side suggests it might have contained rope, or perhaps fish.

name: Discarded Bottle
description: An empty bottle left behind by a traveler.
examine_text: The clear glass bottle has been left empty and forgotten. It's got a round base that swirls up to a narrow neck, likely once stoppered with a cork. Judging by the faint smell, its previous contents were strong and alcoholic.

name: Sea-washed Pebble
description: A small smooth pebble from the shore.
examine_text: This tiny stone has been smoothed over time by the sea's relentless waves. Its dark grey surface glistens when wet, suggesting it's made of some form of quartz.

name: Rope
description: A long coil of weathered rope.
examine_text: This sturdy rope has seen better days, but still looks strong enough for use. It's rough to the touch, frayed in parts but intact. It's long enough to perhaps assist in climbing.

name: Rock
description: A sharp-looking piece of granite.
examine_text: A sizeable chunk of solid granite that's slipped from the cliff above. It's sharp edges could possibly be useful if handled carefully.

name: Seashell
description: A large, colorful seashell.
examine_text: This seashell is large, with a spiral shape and a surface covered in various hues of blues and pinks. It feels smooth to the touch, and holding it to your ear, you can almost hear the ocean.

name: Canteen
description: An old, metal canteen.
examine_text: This rusted, half-buried canteen appears to have been there for a long time, forgotten or lost. You can hear a sloshing sound from within, probably water.

name: Golden Crown
description: This is the King's crown
examine_text: A stunning gold crown, studded with diamonds and rubies. It twinkles in the sunlight, lending an aura of majesty to anyone who wears it.

name: Beach Ball
description: A large inflatable beach ball
examine_text: A colorful beach ball, almost larger than you are! Perfect for beach games in the summer sun.

name: Cocktail
description: A refreshing beach cocktail
examine_text: A vibrant cocktail, served in a tall glass and garnished with a juicy slice of pineapple. It smells delightful!

name: Sandwich
description: A tasty beach sandwich
examine_text: A hearty sandwich, generously filled with the freshest of ingredients. On the side are some crisp chips.

name: Table
description: A round beach table
examine_text: A round table, made of weathered teak and engraved with intricate flowers and vines. Various knick-knacks and plates of food are spread across its surface.

name: Rusted Gear
description: A corroded ancient gear, abandoned by the lighthouse.
examine_text: Aged with the passage of time, the gear has been eaten away by the salt in the sea. Despite its condition, it still holds a certain beauty in the workmanship.

name: Bronze Trim
description: A portion of the window with a bronze trim, elegant in its simplicity.
examine_text: The bronze trim has faded to a rich patina, reflecting the color of the sun as it emerges from hiding.

name: Lighthouse Lamp
description: The primary beacon of the lighthouse, providing guidance through the treacherous seas.
examine_text: The lamp's glass is smoky from years of use, but it gleams with an ethereal light. You can almost feel the hope it radiates to the lost sailors.

name: Ornate Throne
description: An exquisitely designed throne.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see intricate carvings etched into the golden frame of the throne. It's embellished with gemstones of every color imaginable.

name: King's Crown
description: A richly adorned crown signifying the power of the king.
examine_text: The king's crown, beset with diamonds and rubies, glimmers in the light. The regality it exudes is unmatched.

name: Historical Carvings
description: Carvings showcasing the history of the kingdom.
examine_text: The wall carvings display different epochs of the kingdom's rich history, each scene more captivating than the last.

name: Luxurious Bed
description: A bed covered in designed covers.
examine_text: The bed is lined with the smoothest and finest silken sheets, its pillows plump and bathe in softness, and the coverlet is adorned with rich designs fancifully embroidered.

name: Seashells
description: Glistening seashells dot the wet sand.
examine_text: They come in all colors, shapes, and sizes. Some are smooth, polished by the tide, while others are jagged and rough.

name: Sand
description: The seashore is made of gleaming white sand.
examine_text: The sand is clean and warm, perfect for building sandcastles or just lying on and soaking up the sun.

name: Ocean Water
description: The water laps half-heartedly at the sand.
examine_text: The water is clear and you can see your feet through it. Tiny fish swim away as your shadow falls over them.

name: Wooden Bed
description: A simple, somewhat uncomfortable looking bed.
examine_text: The bed appears to be hastily constructed from rough wooden beams. It doesn't look particularly comfortable, but would provide a place to rest.

name: Wooden Chest
description: A sturdy wooden chest used to store personal belongings.
examine_text: The chest is made of strong oak, reinforced with iron bands. It's filled with personal items belonging to the guards.

name: Old Bow
description: An old, well-used longbow.
examine_text: The bow is well-worn and shows signs of frequent use. Despite its age, it still looks like it could shoot an arrow accurately.

name: Guard's Uniform
description: A royal guard's uniform, neatly folded.
examine_text: The uniform is made of a strong cotton fabric. It's a deep green color with the royal coat of arms embroidered on the chest.

name: Hay Bale
description: A bundled stack of hay.
examine_text: It's surprisingly heavy and roughly square-shaped. When examined closely, you can see the individual strands of dry, golden grass bound tightly together with twine.

name: Pitch Fork
description: A three-pronged farming tool.
examine_text: This is a robust tool made from sturdy wood. Its handle is well-worn from years of use and the prongs are slightly rusted but razor sharp.

name: Clay Pot
description: A container for storing grain.
examine_text: It's a well-crafted ceramic pot crafted from the local clay, quite big and of a smooth texture, with signs of regular use.

name: King's Livery
description: A fine cloth bearing the king's crest.
examine_text: It's a fine cloth in the king's traditional colors and crest. It stands out as a symbol of loyalty and servitude to the kingdom.

name: Stable Shovel
description: A Standard wooden shovel leaning against the wall.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the shovel is very old. There are cracks in the handle and the metal part of the shovel is rusty. The handle is smooth though from countless use. It's a simple, unassuming, yet indispensable tool.

name: Hay Bale
description: A dry bale of hay lying on the side.
examine_text: The haystack is tightly packed and bound with twine. It's dry to the touch and has a distinctive sweet, earthy scent. It is fodder for the horses.

name: Lantern
description: A small oil lantern hangs from a hook.
examine_text: The lantern is made of rusty iron and old glass. It contains a wick and a small reservoir of oil for light. It can be carried around.

name: Water Bucket
description: A wooden bucket filled with clear water.
examine_text: The bucket is old and made of sturdy oak, bound with iron rings. It's filled with clear cool water. The horses drink from this.

name: Saddle
description: A well-worn leather saddle hangs on a rack.
examine_text: The saddle is old but well cared for. It’s made from dark brown leather and shows traces of constant use. Brass fittings add to the durability and looks of the saddle.

name: Iron Portcullis
description: A sturdy iron gate that bars the entrance to the castle
examine_text: A closer look reveals an intricate design of menacing beasts etched into the bars of the gate. It appears unmovable and completely defends the castle's entrance.

name: Torch Sconces
description: These hold the torches that illuminate the front gates
examine_text: Made of weathered iron, they hold flaming torches that cast a flickering light across the stone walls.

name: Flag of the Leaders
description: A grand flag proudly displaying the emblem of the leaders
examine_text: On a closer look, you see it flaunts an elaborate emblem of a noble beast, embroidered with gold and silver threads. It represents the authority and power of the leaders.

name: Guard's Halberd
description: A sharp weapon wielded by the castle guard
examine_text: This pole weapon has a large axe head topped with a spike, mounted on a long shaft. It's much longer than a sword, designed for keeping attackers at bay.

name: Bridle
description: A soft leather horse bridle hung on the wall.
examine_text: This bridle, made from craft leather, is used for guiding the royal horses by the reins. It's been polished and is in excellent condition hinting the meticulous care taken in the stable.

name: Hay Bales
description: Fresh, golden hay bales stacked in the corner.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see dust particles dancing in the warm stable light as it hits the golden hay bales. They're dry and crunchy, perfect for horse's meal.

name: Lantern
description: A well-polished, iron lantern hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: On approaching you notice, this lantern floods the entire stable with its warm, welcoming glow. It appears to be very old, potentially as old as the castle, yet well-preserved, signaling at the stable's rich history.

name: Bow
description: A wooden bow with a string attached from end to end
examine_text: This is a long wooden bow, crafted with high precision. It seems a little worn, perhaps used by the master archers themselves for their daily practice. The string seems a bit loose, but should work fine

name: Quiver
description: A leather case for holding arrows
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the leather quiver holds about a dozen arrows with iron tips. The craftsmanship is simple yet sturdy, the perfect companion for an aspiring archer. An essential tool at these training grounds.

name: Arrows
description: A set of arrows with a sharp iron tip
examine_text: A closer look reveals that the arrows are made of solid oak, each with a sharp iron tip. The feathers attached to the end of the arrows are all from the same kind of bird, most likely for consistency during flight

name: Torches
description: Wooden torches secured to the stone walls.
examine_text: The torches are made of sturdy wood with a top dipped in a combustible substance. They are securely placed in stone carvings on the walls.

name: Bunk Beds
description: Cheap hay and feather mattresses piled upon wooden bunk beds.
examine_text: Simple wooden framework supporting bunks of hay and feather-stuffed mattresses. Ideal for a quick afternoon rest or an overnight sleep for the stable hands.

name: Wooden Chests
description: Wooden chests are scattered around the room; they are worn out from use.
examine_text: These are simple wooden chests, with signs of wear and tear. They contain personal belongings of the stable hands.

name: Small sacks
description: Small sacks lying beside the bunk beds.
examine_text: Small sacks made from rough cloth. They are mostly used by the workers to store personal items or food for later.

name: Damaged Barrels
description: Old, forlorn barrels lay scattered all around.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you make out the corroded marks and old etchings claiming that the barrels once stored acid.

name: Dead Trees
description: Bare, stripped of their life essence, these trees stand like morose sentinels.
examine_text: These battled and scarred trees have been etched by acid rains. Their wood is so dry, it's turned almost to stone.

name: Acidic Moss
description: Brightly colored moss os the only vegetation present in the yard.
examine_text: The only plant resilient enough to survive the poisonous environment, its tacky texture and otherworldly glow suggest high acidity.

name: Acid Contaminated Rocks
description: Scattered all over the perimeter are grey-black rocks.
examine_text: Closely examined, the rocks exhibit an odd gleam. The occasional hiss and sizzle suggest that the rocks might be contaminated by acid.

name: Iron Sword
description: An ordinary sword made of iron. It's well-balanced and sharp.
examine_text: This is a standard issue iron sword. It has a hard, sharp blade and a simple hilt. From the look of the blade, it has been well maintained and frequently sharpened.

name: Wooden Chest
description: A large chest made of sturdy oak. It's filled with weapons.
examine_text: This large chest has been well-made with heavy, dark oak. It's filled with extra weapons, stacked neatly and kept in good condition.

name: Mysterious Weapon
description: A peculiar weapon of unknown origin. It's unlike anything you've seen.
examine_text: This strange weapon has a bizarre design, unlike anything typically seen in this kingdom. Its origins and purpose remain a mystery to the warriors.

name: Neatly Arrayed Wooden Boxes
description: Boxes filled with newly made arrows
examine_text: Upon examination, these are wooden boxes filled with neat rows of finely crafted arrows, each feathered and pointed precisely.

name: Worn Practice Bows
description: Bows hung on the wall for practicing archery
examine_text: Old and well-used bows perfect for practice, await the next hand to draw their string.

name: Polishing Equipment
description: Professional tools for maintaining arrows and bows
examine_text: Everything required to keep your bow and arrows in peak condition. Abrasive paper for removing burrs from wooden shafts, oil for keeping bow strings flexible and more.

name: Small Wooden Chair
description: A chair made of wood
examine_text: A simple wooden chair for the Fletcher to rest. It barely shows any sign of usage, probably because the old man is always up and working.

name: Old Cannon
description: A large, old-fashioned cannon situated in one of the wider slots of the battlements.
examine_text: This cannon is rusted from use and exposure to the elements, but still appears to be fully functional. The wheels and base are made from sturdy oak wood, and the cannon itself is cast from iron.

name: Bow
description: A simple long bow made of flexible hickory, lying within an armory box.
examine_text: The wood is polished smooth and decorated with intricate carvings. The string is taut and ready for use.

name: Armory Box
description: A small, long wooden box lined against the outside battlement wall, used for storing weapons.
examine_text: The wooden armory box is worn from years of service, signs of rain, snow, and sun damage on its surface. Despite its age, it still serves its purpose dutifully.

name: Helmet
description: A worn iron helmet left on the battlements.
examine_text: The helmet carries dents and scratches from previous battles. Inside, a soft leather padding provides comfort.

name: Ancient Stones
description: Stones that have been stacked carefully to form the entrance to the castle.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the stones are not just any ordinary stones. They have runes and symbols etched into them. They seem to emit a faint glow.

name: Moss
description: A rich green moss covering parts of the stone structure.
examine_text: A close examination reveals the moss to be soft, damp, and fragrant. It's unlike any ordinary moss you've ever seen.

name: Fairy Lights
description: Little lights that hover around the castle entrance.
examine_text: Upon close examination, they're not just lights but tiny fairies. They flutter around you taking interest.

name: Antique Stone
description: A shiny, silver, ancient stone.
examine_text: The stone is incredibly shiny with a gloss of silver that reflects light brilliantly. It's incredibly hard and cool to touch, signifying its ancient origins.

name: Castle Garden Flowers
description: Beautiful flowers from the castle gardens.
examine_text: The flowers show a vibrant array of colors, their petals are soft and yet firm to touch, and the sweet aroma they give off is truly mesmerizing.

name: Prehistoric Door Stone
description: This stone used on the entrance door dates back to the prehistoric age.
examine_text: This stone, even after so many years, still has a durability that is impressive. Its worn surface is testament to its age, and the weight is overwhelming.

name: Long Sword
description: A shiny, metallic sword prone against one of the houses
examine_text: This is the trademark weapon of the War Officer. The sword is long and sturdy with a sharp point. The hilt is decorated with a rare gemstone, reflecting the Officer's prestige.

name: Scroll of Agriculture
description: An ancient scroll with complex diagrams and text, resting on a table in the Agricultural Advisor's home
examine_text: The scroll is filled with complex diagrams and instructions describing the most effective agricultural techniques. The ink is faded but the parchment is well preserved, suggesting it has been treasured for many years.

name: Officer's Robe
description: A colorful robe hanging by the entrance of the Military Commander's house
examine_text: This robe is an intricate tapestry of colors and symbols that represent the Officer's rank and achievements in the King's army.

name: Commander's Hammer
description: A heavy looking hammer propped up against the Military Commander's abode
examine_text: The hammer is large and exceptionally heavy with a polished wooden handle and a rough metallic head. It's a symbol of the Military Commander's strength and influence.

name: Black Throne
description: A shiny black throne with gold decorations, symbolizing the ultimate power of death.
examine_text: The throne is gigantic, ornately decorated with gold and precious stones. On closer inspection, you can see strange symbols carved into the armrest. They gleam with an eerie light, hinting at some hidden, ancient magic.

name: Purple Throne
description: A smaller throne, decorated in purple and gold. It emanates an air of dictatorial authority.
examine_text: Closer examination exposes the intricate golden lapel design on the armrest. The seat is made up of a sort of soft velvety material. Despite its smaller size, this purple throne seems to hold immense power.

name: Dolphin Painting
description: A painting of a gray dolphin, symbolizing death. Its eyes seem eerily alive.
examine_text: The dolphin is painted with such attention to detail, it almost seems like it could leap out of the canvas any moment. Its morose gray color and the dark, stormy background give a disturbing interpretation of death.

name: Torturer's Whip
description: A terrifying weapon used by the torturer to inflict punishments. It is set with sharp, cruel-looking barbs.
examine_text: The whip is long and made of thick, coiled leather. The handle is covered in bloodstains and its barbs gleam ruthlessly under the dim light. You shudder to think about the pain it can inflict.

name: Black Hood
description: The cloaking hood worn by the Watchman. It hides the wearer's identity and marks his gloomy duty.
examine_text: Made from rough, worn-out fabric, the hood is well-used and carries an air of despair and trepidation. It is unnervingly dark, swallowing all light and hope that dare to approach it.

name: Dim Torch
description: A poorly lit torch affixed to the dungeon wall.
examine_text: The torch barely produces enough light to illuminate its surroundings. It flickers weakly, as though on the verge of going out.

name: Dripping Water
description: Water constantly dripping down the dungeon walls.
examine_text: The water is unclean, tainted with the mildew and grime of the dungeon walls, it is definitely not suitable for consumption.

name: Torture Table
description: A large wooden table set in the middle of the room with manacles on all corners attached to a rotating lever.
examine_text: The table is dark with age and use. The wood is scarred and burned in many places. The manacles are sturdy and cold, the perfect tool for inflicting pain and horror.

name: Manacles
description: Rusty old manacles fastened to the dungeon walls and the torture table.
examine_text: The manacles are grim and sturdy, made of cold, unforgiving iron. They've rusted over time, but remain strong. A chilling reminder of the dungeon's purpose.

name: Cages
description: Monstrous cages aligned along the dungeon walls.
examine_text: The cages are constructed from heavy black iron bars. They are old and rusty yet it gives a sense of dread and confinement.

name: Dark Throne
description: A shadowy, sinisterly ornate, throne situated at the end of the room.
examine_text: Crafted from an unearthly black rock, the throne is hardened in the shape of a huge demon. Its eyes seem to almost glow in the dim light, inducing an eerie feeling.

name: Zombie Hand Wand
description: A wand made from a severed zombie hand, clenching a phosphorescent crystal.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the crystal seems to be pulsating with a strange energy. The zombie fingers are shriveled and grey but still clutch the crystal tightly.

name: Bone Chalice
description: A ornately decorated chalice made of polished bone, filled with a bubbling dark liquid.
examine_text: The bone chalice has intricate carvings and is filled with a bubbling potion. It has a pungent smell that both repulses and attracts you.

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A cloak as black as the darkness in the room itself.
examine_text: The cloak seems to absorb the light around it, making it seem like a rip in the fabric of the world. It is powerfully magical.

name: Heavy Wooden Door
description: A very solid wooden door with an old, rusty lock.
examine_text: You approach the imposing door, its ancient wood still sturdy after countless years. The lock is old and rusty but seems to be in working order. There are symbols carved into the door that you don't recognize.

name: Dim Candle
description: A small, half-burned candle providing the only light in the room.
examine_text: The half-burned candle flickers in the room, casting moving shadows against the stone walls. It smells of tallow and is warm to touch. It seems that it was recently lit.

name: Blackened Stones
description: The room's walls are built using uneven black stones.
examine_text: The hefty, black stones making up the walls of the lair are cold and damp on touch. Their surface is uneven, covered in moss and grime of undetermined age.

name: Bloody Chains
description: Old, rusty chains stained with centuries-old blood. They are hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that these chains are older than they initially seemed. Dark red stains cover most of the metal, the evidence of many years of use. They are attached to a pulley system in the ceiling.

name: Torture Rack
description: A horrific torture device used for stretching out its unfortunate victims.
examine_text: This medieval rack is composed of two wooden frames. It's designed to stretch the person strapped onto it as a form of torture. There are old blood stains permeating the wood.

name: Iron Maiden
description: A large, ominous iron maiden stands in the corner, it's spikes glistening.
examine_text: The iron maiden is a large, upright sarcophagus-like device, covered in decorative, gothic imagery. It is lined with spikes that are intended to pierce the unwary. The interior smells strongly of rust and death.

name: Dark Lord's Robe
description: A thick black robe worn by the Dark Lord himself.
examine_text: The robe is elaborately decorated with dark symbols and embroidery. It's heavier than it looks, lined with a material that's unfamiliar. Despite its age, it seems to be in good condition.

name: Stone Wall
description: A towering wall made out of stones
examine_text: On close observation, the rough and cold stone wall bears countless marks, testament to the terrible punishments meted out here.

name: Straps
description: Leather straps used to tie unfortunate souls
examine_text: These leather straps are worn out and stained with sweat and blood. A close inspection reveals that they are thick and strong, made to withstand hard resistance.

name: Whip
description: A whip used to lash at those being punished
examine_text: Looking at the whip, you see a length of tightly coiled leather, ending in a vicious series of tassels. Each has a cruel barb at its tip for that extra layer of torment.

name: Ethereal Armor
description: A suit of armor forged from netherworld minerals.
examine_text: The armor appears translucent, subtly shimmering with an eerie glow. It's surprisingly lightweight yet seems indestructible.

name: Lord's Throne
description: A grand high-backed throne embedded with precious stones.
examine_text: The throne is menacingly imposing, carved with intricate designs. The precious stones radiate an ominous light that harmonizes with the eerie netherworld.

name: Netherworld Goblet
description: A goblet filled with a mysterious liquid.
examine_text: The goblet is made from obsidian with strange glyphs engraved along the lip. The liquid within is a luminescent purple, and it emits a tempting aroma.

name: Ancient Scroll
description: An old, worn out scroll with unknown text.
examine_text: Upon close examination, the scroll seems to contain a prophecy, written in a nearly extinct olden language. It's in a fragile state.

name: Tear of the Damned
description: A single tear collected from the pit's victims.
examine_text: The tear is a cool, clear bead. It shines with a subtle, blueish light. The absolute despair and agony of all the Netherworld's victims glisten within.

name: Scratched Bone
description: A bone from a sinner, covered in marks from relentless scratching.
examine_text: The bone is white and dry. Deep scratch marks, a testament to futile attempts of escape, mar its surface.

name: Pool of Despair
description: A foul mixture of blood, tears, and excrement collected at the bottom of the pit.
examine_text: The pool is dark and thick, undulating horrifically as if it were alive. It reeks of desolation and decay.

name: Devil's Throne
description: A large, imposing throne seemingly made of skulls.
examine_text: This throne is crafted from the skulls of past victims. It is very jagged and angular with a dark, ominous aura around it.

name: Soul Jar
description: A jar filled with swirling souls.
examine_text: The jar contains swirling, ethereal souls that seem to howl out in sorrow.

name: Bloodied Sword
description: A heavy, blood-stained sword.
examine_text: The sword is old and rusty yet deadly. It carries the stains of countless battles and bloodshed.

name: Demonic Armor
description: An intimidating set of demonic armor.
examine_text: Heavy armor, constructed entirely out of dark matter, sits imposingly. Each piece is adorned with skulls and spikes irregularly, echoing the brutality of the netherworld.

name: Obsidian Shard
description: A sharp piece of solidified lava.
examine_text: It is pure black and sharp like a dagger. You can see faint reflections of the blazing lava lake on its sheen surface.

name: Magma Rock
description: An incredibly hot rock just taken from the lava lake.
examine_text: It glows ominously with the heat of the magma, searing to touch.

name: Scorched Bone
description: A bone that has somehow made its way to the lake, although severely scorched.
examine_text: It is blackened and brittle from the intense heat. Who knows what creature this once belonged to?

name: Lava Lake
description: A vast, bubbling, scorching lake of molten magma.
examine_text: Too hot to touch or venture near, it is never still, always churning and bubbling. The sight is both terrifying and mesmerizing.

name: Midnight Sword
description: A flaming sword with pure darkness infused into its blade.
examine_text: The sword is radiating an unbearable heat. The blade, while engulfed in flames, seems impossibly dark - as if it's sucking all the light into its core. Its handle is made of blackened bone and it pulses with an eerie blue glow.

name: Devils Throne
description: A magnificently terrifying throne belonging to the Devil himself.
examine_text: The throne is built from obsidian and adorned with skulls of countless souls. It is pulsating with a terrifying energy that seems to reach out and touch your soul. Flames flicker around its edges, giving it an even more imposing appearance.

name: Eternal Flame
description: A flame that has been burning for an eternity.
examine_text: The flame blazes with a ferocity that seems unnatural. Its heat is unbearable and looking directly into it is a challenge. The flame has an unnatural red color and seems to flicker relentlessly despite the lack of wind.

name: Soul Shackles
description: Supernatural shackles used to bind the souls to the castle.
examine_text: The shackles have an eerie, unearthly appearance. They are composed of darkness so solid it looks almost material. Upon closer inspection, thin, shadowy tendrils seem to extend from them, reaching out for something unknown.

name: Dead Tree
description: A skeletal, once-beautiful tree
examine_text: Its gnarled branches reach upwards, like cold, skeletal hands. You feel a cold wind pass through the tree, carrying sad, muted whispers.

name: Cracked Fountain
description: A once grand, but now withered fountain
examine_text: Made of cracked marble, its dry basin carries the echoes of laughter and joy it once held. Dirt and moss creep across the stone, dulling the once radiant white.

name: Rotting Bench
description: A fragile, decaying wooden bench
examine_text: Crafted from wood now turned to brittle decay, the bench sits as a lonely testament to time gone by. Any pressure might crumble it entirely, turning it into a pile of dust.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusted sword, discarded and forgotten.
examine_text: The sword has lost its luster, covered in a thick layer of rust. The blade is chipped, and the grip is wrapped in decaying leather. It is not much, but it could be useful in a pinch.

name: Decrepit Chest
description: A lonely chest, rather worn and battered, sits in the corner.
examine_text: The chest is made of old wood, splintered and cracked in several places. The latch is almost rusted through completely. Who knows what it may contain?

name: Moldy Bread
description: A slice of bread, now discarded and neglected, lies on the stone floor.
examine_text: The bread is dry and unappealing. Mold spots are appearing around its edges. Starvation would have to be crippling to consider eating it.

name: Old Table
description: An old table sits in the middle of the dungeon, covered in dust and grime.
examine_text: The table is rickety and old. The passage of time and lack of care are evident in every crack and creak. Yet it still stands, sturdy and stubborn.

name: Magical Dome
description: A magical dome standing tall on the stage.
examine_text: The Magical Dome emits a dim, enchanting glow. When looked at closely, one can perceive murky images of the living world, albeit unclear.

name: Opera Seat
description: An old worn-out opera seat.
examine_text: An opera seat made of red velvet. Age and numerous sittings have left the material faded and worn out, but it retains an air of distinguished gravity.

name: Viewing Box
description: A luxurious viewing box.
examine_text: Luxuriously decorated with golden trimmings and crimson drapes, this box was intended for the wealthy. Despite years of neglect, it still glistens with a neglected grandeur.

name: Glowing Fungi
description: A cluster of luminous fungi, emanating a light that cuts through the cavern's darkness.
examine_text: Soft, cold, and waxy. This rare, magical plantlife provides a dim, bioluminescent glow. It seems to be feeding off the damp, cold rocks of the cavern, providing a much-needed light source.

name: Lizard Scale
description: A Tough, glossy scale from a netherworld lizard.
examine_text: It's large, tough, and incredibly durable. The glossiness indicates it's from a netherworld lizard. It might be useful in crafting.

name: Undid Torch
description: A never lit torch, possibly dropped by previous adventurers.
examine_text: The torch appears to be in good condition. With an adequate flame, it could serve as a reliable light source and possibly be used as a weapon.

name: Stalagmite
description: A tall, pointed rock formation that rises from the floor.
examine_text: An ancient stalagmite towering above the cavern floor, its pointed form an impressive mark of geological time.

name: Ancient Oak
description: A majestic, centuries-old oak tree with thick branches.
examine_text: Looking closer, you notice carvings on the bark and a small hollow in the trunk.

name: Magical Force Field
description: A pulsating shield of magic that surrounds the tower.
examine_text: It has a gentle glow and hums with arcane power. Touching it sends a tingling sensation through your body.

name: Tower Door
description: An imposing wooden door leading into the tower.
examine_text: The door is covered in complex magical runes. It seems to require a special incantation to be opened.

name: Tower Key
description: A small, ancient-looking key lying in the grass.
examine_text: This could probably open one of the many locked doors in the tower. Curiously, it seems to be vibrating slightly...

name: Fireplace
description: A small stone fireplace providing warmth.
examine_text: The fireplace is made of aged stones, blackened with soot. Its flames flicker, illuminating the guard shack with a warm, cozy light.

name: Food Crate
description: A wooden crate filled with enough food for a week.
examine_text: The crate contains a variety of preserved meats, hard cheeses, and few loafs of hard bread. It's neatly packed and well-preserved.

name: Earthenware Jug
description: A large earthenware jug filled with water.
examine_text: The jug has been crafted from clay, its exterior glazed and polished. It's filled with clean, cold water, likely taken from the nearby stream.

name: Guard Uniform
description: The tower guard's work uniform.
examine_text: The uniform is sturdy and rugged, made from durable fabrics and adorned with the tower's insignia. It is designed to be worn comfortably for long hours.

name: Stone-Staircase
description: A long winding stone staircase leading to the top and bottom of the tower.
examine_text: The staircase is made of grey stone, worn and weathered from age and constant use. The steps are uneven, making them treacherous to traverse without caution. You notice small chips and cracks scattered across them.

name: Signal-Fire
description: A small fire pit used to send signals across long distances.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the pit contains a mixture of different types of wood, some dry, some oily. It is carefully designed to produce thick black smoke when lit, perfect for sending signals. The pit is currently unlit.

name: Landscape-Scroll
description: A detailed scroll of the surrounding lands and terrain.
examine_text: Unrolling the scroll, you see incredibly detailed drawings of the surrounding landscape. Small notes and symbols on the map indicate different landmarks, rivers, and potential hazards. The parchment is well preserved, with barely any fading of the ink.

name: Ancient Tomes
description: A collection of old and fragile books filled with knowledge of ancient magic.
examine_text: Each tome is filled with curious symbols and aging pages exhibiting a patina from years of studying. Some of the books appear to be journals, with notes and drawings scrawled in the margins.

name: Green Flame
description: A mysterious flame that emits a magical green fire.
examine_text: The fire is not hot. It emits an eerie green light and seems to be a source of magical energy. You sense a strong aura of magic around it.

name: Mysterious Jars
description: Jars containing various reagents used for magical rituals.
examine_text: Each jar is filled with different materials: some with crushed stones, others with dried plants. Many are labeled with symbols that you don't recognize, but they surely hold great significance in the wizard's magical practices.

name: Wizard's Robe
description: A worn out, mystical robe embellished with arcane symbols.
examine_text: The robe is made of a resilient fabric, embroidered with silver arcane symbols. It has an air of authority and power about it.

name: Wandering Rose
description: A delicate rose vine that meanders around a nearby pergola.
examine_text: The Wandering Rose vine is a truly stunning piece of nature. Its blooms are vibrant shades of red and pink, with soft petals that look almost velvety. The vine itself bears sharp thorns which provide a stark contrast to the gentle appearance of the flowers.

name: Winter Bloom
description: A rare flower that only blooms during the coldest winter months.
examine_text: The Winter Bloom is an exquisite and rare flower. Its petals are bright white, almost translucent under the sunlight. Every part of her exudes a faint glow. Its stem is thin yet sturdy enough to support the big flower on top. It is said that the very first Winter Bloom was planted by the Princess herself.

name: Garden Bench
description: A worn-out wooden bench, perfect for people watching.
examine_text: The bench, although it is in a garden full of exotic blooms, is rather simple. Made of a light-toned wood, it has a history of many years, evidenced by the worn-out sitting area and the grooved, almost polished surface. A gap here and there between the planks reveals that it's been weathered by many seasons. Nonetheless, it is very comfortable to sit on for long periods of time.

name: Ancient Stone Blocks
description: Old, worn-out stone blocks from the tower.
examine_text: The stone blocks are weather-beaten, each one exhibiting a unique pattern of erosion. Despite their age, they still possess an unyielding resilience.

name: Sparse Grass
description: Small patches of grass growing at the tower's base.
examine_text: The grass is sparse, and looks like it's struggling to survive. However, given its resilience, it might come handy for something.

name: Worker's Tools
description: A set of tools likely used by the workers who built the tower.
examine_text: The tools are quite old, but still in relatively good condition. They consist of hammers, chisels, and other masonry equipment.

name: Rusted Iron Ring
description: An ancient, rusted iron ring presumably from the ago of the tower's construction.
examine_text: Despite rust and age, the iron ring retains its circular shape. It's quite heavy and has an engraving that seems to be in some old language.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusted sword left abandoned
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the sword's blade is corroded and pitted. Despite its condition, it looks like it could still inflict some damage.

name: Mossy Stone
description: A piece of moss-covered stone seemingly fallen from the tower?
examine_text: The stone is rough to the touch and cold. The moss that covers it is soft and slightly damp.

name: Old Wooden Shield
description: An aging wooden shield with many battle scars.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the wooden shield seems to have withstood many battles. The marks of swords and other weapons etched deep into its surface.

name: Old Wooden Shield
description: A weathered wooden shield lying on the ground.
examine_text: It's a large round wooden shield, scarred from previous battles. Despite being old and weather-beaten, it still looks sturdy. It seems it was left behind perhaps intentionally or maybe unintentionally.

name: Canteen
description: A forgotten canteen near a tuft of grass.
examine_text: A leaky but salvageable canteen, probably left behind by a passing traveler. It's slightly dented and its once bright blues are faded, but it still seems to be usable.

name: Old Leather Boot
description: An abandon pair of old leather boots.
examine_text: A pair of worn leather boots with rugged soles and a missing shoelace. The leather is discolored from exposure to the weather, but they're in decent shape overall.

name: Guard Shield
description: A sturdy, metallic guard's shield used for defence
examine_text: The shield is round and made of steel with iron rims. It's decorated with the royal emblem of the kingdom, showing years of hard battles in it's numerous dents and scratches.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A simple and sturdy wooden chair, often used by the guards during their shifts.
examine_text: The chair has been worn by years of use, the wood grain is barely visible under layers of grime. It looks uncomfortable yet served its purpose.

name: Lookout's Glass
description: A handheld telescope made of copper and glass, used by the guards to scout the distant horizons.
examine_text: The telescope is expertly made, with clear glass and detailed etchings covering the copper. It retracts and expands smoothly, allowing for distant viewing.

name: Observatory Equipments
description: A set of equipments located in the watchtower for observing the vast night sky.
examine_text: The equipment consists of various tools, most notably a large, well-crafted brass telescope that stands pointing towards the starlit sky.

name: Alarm Horn
description: A large horn used by the watchmen to alert the castle of any impending danger.
examine_text: The horn is evidently old but in good condition. It has a deep, broad opening for creating loud, resonating sounds.

name: Guard's Armor
description: The armor of the castle guardsmen. They are always ready for a fight.
examine_text: This sturdy looking armor is composed of several steel plates for maximum protection. The symbol of the royal family adorns the chest piece.

name: Old Scrolls
description: Some ancient scrolls used by the wise men for studying the stars.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, these parchments have celestial maps and notations scrawled across them in an ancient script.

name: Cobblestone Path
description: A path leading to the tower entrance.
examine_text: A well-worn road made of sturdy cobblestone. It carries the weight of countless marching soldiers.

name: Torch
description: A large torch, it is alight with a blazing fire.
examine_text: The fire plays across the wall of the tower and sends shadows dancing over the mossy stones. It provides light and a bit of warmth.

name: Moss
description: Layer of moss covering the cold stones of the tower.
examine_text: The moss is soft and damp, providing a stark contrast to the unyielding stone beneath. It seems to thrive in the shadow of the torchlight.

name: Tower Door
description: A large wooden door serving as the entrance to the tower.
examine_text: Impressive and robust, the door has withstood both time and conflict. It carries an aura of nobility and strength.

name: Unidentified Potion
description: A potion with a swirling mixture of colors.
examine_text: The liquid inside the glass bottle shifts and swirled. It's hypnotizing. The color seems to change continuously. It’s best not to drink something if you’re not certain what it does.

name: Old Spell Book
description: An ancient book filled with cryptic symbols and worn-out pages.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see magic spells and formulas written down. Despite the worn and weathered exterior, the pages are preserved well. It seems very valuable and could maybe be used for something else.

name: Glass Decanter
description: A fancy, old-looking glass decanter.
examine_text: The decanter is made of heavy, clear glass. It feels solid and sturdy in your hand, and it is remarkably untouched given all the fragile ingredients in this room.

name: Test Subject Cage
description: A small cage housing a small, fur-covered creature.
examine_text: Inside the steel cage, a small creature, which resembles a rodent, huddles in fear. You can’t blame it, given the surroundings. You might be able to open the cage somehow.

name: Old flask
description: An old, battered flask filled with unknown liquid.
examine_text: The flask is dented and aged, suggesting it's been used numerous times.

name: Rusty sword
description: A weathered and rusted sword, likely abandoned by a former soldier.
examine_text: The sword holds a sense of age and abandonment, its blade corroded with patches of red-brown rust. Despite its appearance, it appears to be still sturdy.

name: Camouflage net
description: A net extensively used to conceal things, its colours matched to the swamp environment.
examine_text: Green and brown threads in a mixture create a dense web meant to blend in with the swamp surroundings.

name: Rations pack
description: Sealed packs containing food sufficient for one soldier for one day.
examine_text: The pack is tightly sealed, containing dry food, and easy to carry around.

name: Old Boat
description: A large, rusty old boat.
examine_text: Though suffering from years of neglect, the old boat is sturdy. It is made of wood and held together with iron nails. It creaks eerily in the wind but might still be usable for crossing the swamp.

name: Water lily
description: A beautiful water lily.
examine_text: The water lily is serene. Its petals are a soft white and seem to glow in the murky water. Although beautiful to look at, the water lily also serves as a reminder of the swamp’s hidden beauty.

name: Old Fishing Rod
description: A old discarded fishing rod with a broken reel.
examine_text: The fishing rod has seen better days. The line is frayed and tangled, and the reel doesn't turn. Perhaps it could be fixed.

name: Muddy Water
description: A bottle of muddy swamp water.
examine_text: The water is murky and dirty. It could be boiled to potentially make it safe to drink, but as it is, it's better used for non-drinking purposes.

name: Bog-swamp armorsuit
description: A special suit made by Gumerian goblins for traversing the swamp more efficiently
examine_text: This armorsuit seems to be made of natural components of the swamp to camouflage in the murky water. Can be put on to improve swamp maneuverability.

name: Marsh Gun
description: An oddly shaped firearm, designed specifically for swamp combat
examine_text: The gun appears to have been modified to shoot hydro-energy bullets, particularly effective against swamp creatures. Could be powerful against Hoakbera!

name: Bog Mushroom
description: A large, grotesque, purple swamp mushroom mostly found stuck on outpost walls
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, it emits a strange yet sweet aroma. It's used as a food source by goblins.

name: Outpost Map
description: A dirty piece of parchment showing the layout of the outpost
examine_text: Studying the map reveals hidden routes around the outpost and potential escape routes.

name: About Hoakbera
description: A small bird's eye dangling from a string. Singing into it reveals information about the swamp monster Hoakbera.
examine_text: You, with a fruitful voice, unleash a melody towards the eye. The voice from within speaks of the horrible swamp monster Hoakbera.

name: Dead Log
description: An old, hollow log lying on the muddy ground.
examine_text: You see a rotten, hollow log fallen by the side of the bog. If you look closely, you can see something shiny lodged inside.

name: Murky Water
description: Dark, murky water with hint of movement below the surface.
examine_text: Upon closer look, the water is teeming with life; you could almost make out tiny tadpoles and minuscule bugs swimming around.

name: Reeds
description: Tall, green reeds jutting out of the water.
examine_text: The reeds are tall and slender. They blend well with the environment, making a perfect hiding space for the swamp creatures.

name: Swamp Bugs
description: A swarm of bugs buzzing around the swamp.
examine_text: A closer look reveals these bugs to be rather large in size, probably full from feasting on the abundant plant life in the swamp.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A rusty, aged sword.
examine_text: The sword looks as though it hasn't seen combat in centuries. Patches of brown rust speckle the blade, rendering it dull and unwieldy.

name: Cobblestone
description: A block of rough cobblestone.
examine_text: This grey cobblestone, one of many that creates the path across the bridge, is unnaturally cold to the touch.

name: Mossy Log
description: A fallen log overtaken by verdant moss.
examine_text: The fallen log is teeming with life, blanketed in a carpet of brightly-colored moss and lichen, creating a small ecosystem in itself.

name: Swamp Water
description: Murky water from the swamp.
examine_text: The smelly brackish water looks unappetizing and potentially harmful. It is probably best to leave it where its.

name: Leather Pouch
description: A weathered leather pouch.
examine_text: The pouch is crafted of supple leather, worn smooth over time. It's sealed with a sturdy drawstring.

name: Fishing Net
description: An old tattered fishing net, possibly left by some unfortunate adventurers.
examine_text: The fishing net lies discarded on the muddy ground, its weave is intricately designed but has suffered some tear and wear. Some small fish and bugs are squirming in the holes.

name: Murky Water
description: A patch of particularly opaque and muddy water.
examine_text: The water is almost black and moving it only makes the dirt particles spread out even more. The smell is absolutely awful.

name: Insect Swarm
description: A cloud of buzzing, biting insects.
examine_text: Upon closer observation, the swarm is a mix of mosquitoes, flies and various unknown bugs. Their incessant humming buzzes in your ears.

name: Creature Tracks
description: Unusual patterns imprinted in the mud
examine_text: The tracks belong to a large creature and lead deeper into the swamp. The path is interrupted by the occasional snapped branch.

name: Rotting Wood Pieces
description: Pieces of decaying wood, perhaps once part of the house's structure.
examine_text: This wood is rotten and damp, completely fallen under the influence of the swamp. It crumbles under pressure, leaving behind a pungent smell.

name: Ancient Grimoire
description: Old witches' book of spells with a leather cover darkened by time.
examine_text: This book has eerie symbols on the cover and is filled with handwritten spells in an ancient language. Some pages are blood-stained, adding to the dark aura around it.

name: Leaky Witch's Cauldron
description: A cast iron cauldron with a small hole at the bottom, dripping out an unknown fluid.
examine_text: The cauldron is charred from years of fire usage. There is a small hole where it's starting to lose its contents. The fluid it leaks has a potent, magical aroma.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword partially embedded in the muck.
examine_text: The sword's ornate hilt pokes out of the mud, covered in time's rust and swamp gunk. Despite the grime, it feels solid and unexpectedly well-balanced. It has probably been here for many years, lost by some unfortunate adventurer.

name: Ghostly Lantern
description: A ghostly lantern flickering with an eerie blue flame.
examine_text: The lantern, seemingly held aloft by some spectral force, emits a haunting blue light that dances in the swamp mist. As eerily beautiful as it is, it's utterly intangible.

name: Mossy Log
description: A large, partially-submerged log covered in moss.
examine_text: The log is old and waterlogged, a layer of damp moss clinging to its surface. It's firm enough to sit on, or perhaps something might be hiding in its hollow center.

name: Tattered Hat
description: A worn-out hat probably belonging to a previous adventurer.
examine_text: The hat is tattered, faded, and appears to have been soaked in murky waters. It is stained in brown and green nearly camouflaging with the surroundings. A hat band, once shining and golden, has lost its shine and now houses patches of rust.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword sticking out from the quicksand.
examine_text: The sword is rusty and weathered with a hilt wrapped in rotted leather. Though old, it still retains a dull edge. Years of submersion in the quicksand has given it an eerie, ancient appearance.

name: Glowing Mushroom
description: A mysterious mushroom glowing with iridescent colors.
examine_text: This mushroom grows in the marshy soil surrounding the pit, emitting a soft, mesmerizing glow. Its cap is large and domed, covered in slimy speckles that radiate an iridescent light.

name: Swamp Stone
description: A flat, smooth stone, oddly dry and clean amidst the swampy area.
examine_text: The stone is nearly circular in shape, and cool to the touch. Its surface is smooth and sleek, seeming out of place in the swamp. It seems ordinary, until you notice the strange, cryptic symbols etched into its surface.

name: Fishing Net
description: A sturdy fishing net left by the peasants.
examine_text: The net is made of tough, tightly woven fiber. It's frayed around the edges, suggesting it has seen years of heavy use. Despite its age, the net seems to still be in good condition.

name: Stone
description: A typical grey stone found on the bank.
examine_text: It's a smooth, oval stone with a weighty feel to it. On one side, the stone is covered with moss, a sign of the damp surroundings of the swamp.

name: Apple
description: A ripe apple fallen from one of the nearby trees.
examine_text: The apple is a vibrant red with a slight shine to it. It's perfectly ripe with a crisp texture and sweet aroma.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A simple fishing rod, seemingly forgotten by a fisherman.
examine_text: The rod is fairly long and made with a flexible yet strong material. Its line ends in a hook for bait.

name: Stone Bench
description: A long stone bench built into a hillside.
examine_text: The bench is slightly worn from years of use. Lichen and moss add patches of green to the otherwise gray stone.

name: Temple Doors
description: Massive, intricately carved doors. They depict scenes from religious texts.
examine_text: The doors are so tall they seem to reach the heavens. The carvings are incredibly intricate and evoke a sense of awe.

name: Green Grass
description: Lush, green grass getting its nourishment from the sunlight; the perfect setting for meditation.
examine_text: Upon a closer look, one can see the individual blades of grass, all striving towards the sun's warm light.

name: Stained Glass Windows
description: Brightly coloured windows with designs that filter the sunlight into multi-hued shapes.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, intricately designed figures can be seen in the colorfully stained glass.

name: Ancient Stones
description: Stones that have been around for centuries, bearing the weight of the temple.
examine_text: When you look closely, you can see the natural erosion that has taken place. But surprisingly, these stones have withstood the test of time and are very sturdy.

name: Lighted Torches
description: A torch that has been lighted to guide the way.
examine_text: You can see the flame dancing on the wick, illuminating a warm orange light. The heat is incredibly warm if you get too close.

name: Rocks
description: They have unique shapes, textures and colors. Each one different than the other.
examine_text: When you pick up a rock, you can feel the rough surface. Some are more jagged than others. You would also notice their weight varies greatly.

name: Yellow Brick Road
description: A road made of yellow bricks leading to the temple.
examine_text: Bright yellow bricks make the road distinguishable from its surroundings. The bricks are laid out perfectly and seem to be very well maintained.

name: White Flowers
description: Beautiful white flowers glowing in the morning sun.
examine_text: These flowers are pure white with a soft, delicate texture. Their scent is subtle, yet enchanting.

name: Doves
description: Peaceful doves perched on the trees
examine_text: The doves are pure white and seem to radiate a sense of calm and tranquility.

name: Trimmed Trees
description: Well-trimmed trees surrounding the temple
examine_text: The trees provide shade and enhance the aesthetic appeal of the area. They seem to be trimmed regularly for maintaining their shape.

name: Ancient statue
description: A stone statue standing tall amongst the flora.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you spot intricate patterns and markings suggesting an ancient civilization.

name: Spring water
description: Crystal clear water bubbling from the ground.
examine_text: The sparkling water appears pure and inviting, with a faint glimmer of minerals.

name: Sacred tree
description: An old tree with leaves that shimmer under the sunlight.
examine_text: The tree stands towering and majestic. Its age is betrayed by the layered texture of its bark.

name: Petal flowers
description: A bunch of beautiful flowers with bright, colorful petals.
examine_text: The lush, captivating colors of the petals paint a beautiful contrast against the verdant backdrop.

name: Ornate Statues
description: Highly intricate statues depicting gods and goddesses.
examine_text: Each statue is highly unique and lovingly crafted by a master artist. No two statues are the same and each one draws your attention with its intricate detailing.

name: Pieces of Cloth
description: Colorful pieces of cloth tied everywhere.
examine_text: Each cloth is brightly colored, tiny symbols and scriptures are stitched into them. They flutter gently in the breeze, creating a captivating sight.

name: Large Statue
description: A huge statue in the middle of the courtyard that is always surrounded by people praying.
examine_text: The statue looms over the courtyard, it's surface is smooth and cool to touch. The deity represented is simultaneously imposing and comforting.

name: Archaeologist's Map
description: An old, worn out paper bearing markings and annotations.
examine_text: The map looks like it's seen better days. Its edges are torn and the paper has yellowed with time. Upon closer inspection, you notice that it seems to be a map of the temple site, marked with various symbols and text written in a language you don't understand.

name: Old Stone Artifact
description: A small stone artifact, possibly from the temple.
examine_text: The stone is cool and smooth in your hand. It's surprisingly heavy for its size. As you turn it around, you notice intricate carvings that might be ancient text or symbols of some sort. Could this hold the key to the temple?

name: Archaeologist's Tools
description: A set of basic archaeologist's tools.
examine_text: On closer inspection, you see a variety of tools: brushes of several sizes, chisels, a trowel, and a long thin metal rod with a sharp point. These tools seem meticulously maintained, indicative of their scholar owner's precision.

name: Temple Guard Jacket
description: A sturdy-looking cloth jacket adorned with the temple's insignia.
examine_text: The jacket looks very warm, made from a heavy burgundy fabric. The golden temple symbol is stitched onto the left sleeve. It seems to be very well-tailored and in good condition.

name: Fire Pit
description: A simple fire pit with a few logs set up for a fire.
examine_text: The fire pit is surrounded by small pebbles. The logs in the center appear to be dry and well-prepared for burning. Some leftover ash indicates its frequent use.

name: Sleeping Bag
description: A rough, hay-filled sleeping bag.
examine_text: The sleeping bag is made from a thick, rough material. It is filled with hay which makes it somewhat comfortable yet scratchy.

name: Wooden Seat
description: A simple wooden seat, a bit worn by the weather.
examine_text: The wooden seat is crude in design, but effective. Despite its worn look, it appears to be sturdy.

name: Mystical Water
description: A pool of clear, cool spring water.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the water shines with an ethereal glow, hinting at the hidden magical properties it is said to possess.

name: Rose Bushes
description: Rose bushes surround the spring bath.
examine_text: The rose bushes are full of luscious, crimson roses, emitting a sweet fragrance that fills the air.

name: Funerary Robes
description: A set of robes used for dressing the deceased.
examine_text: The robes are made of a soft grey fabric, adorned with mystical symbols believed to protect the deceased in the afterlife.

name: Wooden Sign
description: A large, wooden sign hanging in front of the shop
examination_text: Upon closer examination, the aged wood of the sign tells you of its years. It sways gently in the wind, making a soft creaking sound

name: Cobblestones
description: The grey cobblestones that make up the structure of the shop
examination_text: The cobblestones, worn and weathered, provide a certain charm to the small shop. Each stone is unique, adding depth and texture to the building

name: Flower Decorations
description: Various colourful flower-based decorations for sale
examination_text: The flower decorations are a vibrant mix of hues, with each flower skillfully arranged in beautiful displays. The intricate details truly bring everything to life

name: Party Decorations
description: Balloons, banners, and all kinds of quirky and fun party decorations
examination_text: A plentiful selection of festive materials; colorful and lively, bound to add joy to any party

name: Religious Statues
description: Large and imposing religious statues that stand guard at the entrance of the temple.
examine_text: On close inspection, the statues are intricately carved from stone, each details showing the enormous skill and dedication of the maker. Their faces held a serious and sacred expression.

name: Stone Floor
