description: The ground is made out of well-worn stones.
examine_text: The stones are polished smooth from lengths of years and countless soles that passed over them. Leaves and dust are scattered over them. Some of stones bear the carved symbols, weather-beaten and partially eroded.

name: Stone Bridge
description: A stone bridge that leads to the entrance of the temple.
examine_text: The stone bridge is old but well maintained. It's broad and sturdy, constructed with massive blocks of stone. There are symbols and drawings etched into its sides.

name: Skull
description: A weathered and bleach-white human skull.
examine_text: You pick up the skull and look into its hollow eye sockets. Marks cover it, perhaps remnants of a terrifying encounter with a beast or a warrior's tool. Its jaw set in an eternal scream, a chilling testament to the fate of its former owner.

name: Ancient Weapon
description: A rusty old dagger covered in centuries-old dried blood.
examine_text: The blade, although rugged and worn, still boasts a dangerously sharp edge. Ornate symbols and faded gold inlay suggest that this weapon once belonged to someone of great importance.

name: Bone Necklace
description: A necklace made from finger bones strung together with sinew.
examine_text: The bones, yellowed with age, are worn smooth from countless finger's touch. It is a crude, yet deeply haunting piece of jewelry.

name: Tattered Scroll
description: A fragment of an old parchment, nearly obscured by earth and grime.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the ink has all but faded away, but the faint trace of an ancient script can still be discerned. It appears to be a historical record of some sort.

name: Statue of Monks
description: A set of massive statues of monks
examine_text: Each statue is unique, carefully crafted to resemble an ancient monk. Their faces serene and honoring the great contributions they made to the temple.

name: Colored Drapes
description: Large drapes hanging from the ceiling, each with a distinct color and symbol.
examine_text: Each drape symbolizes a different village, an embodiment of the unity and fellowship shared among them. The symbols on them tell stories of the village’s history and victories.

name: Pews
description: Massive wooden pews on both sides of the red carpet down the center.
examine_text: They are made of dark mahogany and have been polished to a radiant sheen. They have been worn smooth by years of use.

name: Throne
description: An imposing throne under the statues.
examine_text: The throne is grand and majestic, and stands as a symbol of authority. It is ornately carved with intricate designs and is adorned with precious gems.

name: Ancient Stone Steps
description: A long staircase leading up the mountain to the temple entrance.
examine_text: The moss-covered stones, worn crisp on the edges, has hints of imprinted scripts –perhaps prayers or chants from a bygone era.

name: Jasmine Bush
description: A lush green bush, abundant with pink and white blossoming flowers.
examine_text: The sweet fragrance of the blossoms wafts from the bush, calming your mind to reverence. Delicate petals frame hardy leaves, a riot of life thriving in this solemn place.

name: Melting Candles
description: Several waxen candles illuminated sacredly around the temple.
examine_text: Soft, golden light flickers from slowly melting white candles. Every now and then, a droplet of wax drips down the candle's length, silently adding to the small mountain of hardened wax below.

name: Exquisite Temple Door
description: The entrance crafted from a rare ancient wood no longer in existence.
examine_text: The temple door stands as a testament to the artistry of the forgotten civilization. Intricate carvings of mythical beasts and gods wind their way across the beautifully aged wood, suggesting a story that's as ancient as time itself.

name: Garden Hoe
description: A long wooden stick with a flat metal piece at the end
examine_text: This garden hoe appears to be very sturdy and looks like it's been frequently used. The wood on the handle is slightly worn out and the metal end is a bit rusty.

name: Garden Bench
description: A beautiful vintage wooden bench
examine_text: The garden bench is made out of mahogany with detailed carvings on the leg of the bench. There's a bit of peeling paint, suggesting it has sat here in all weather.

name: Rosebud
description: A beautiful blooming rosebud
examine_text: The rosebud is a vibrant shade of red with velvety soft petals. It is still connected to the plant, but looks like it could easily be picked.

name: Artist's Paint Palette
description: A wooden palette holding various colors of paint
examine_text: The palette has dollops of paint in every color imaginable. It looks like it's well-used but well-kept.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large stack of dried grass, compacted into a tightly bound bale.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the straw-like scent of dried grass and see the twine holding it together. It looks fresh and is sure to be a good meal for the horses.

name: Horse Brush
description: An old, wooden handled brush used for grooming horses.
examine_text: The brush looks well-used with its slightly worn bristles. The handle is smooth to touch and there's subtle glow of wax from its routine cleaning.

name: Horse Tack
description: A set of equipment required for riding a horse, usually including a saddle, bridle, and reins.
examine_text: The leather is supple and well cared for, with shiny buckles and clean stitching. It's the type of tack one would expect to see used by a royal family.

name: Water Trough
description: A long, shallow tub filled with fresh water for the horses to drink.
examine_text: The water ripples gently, reflecting the sky above. Bits of hay float on top indicating a recent visit from the horses.

name: Stone Bench
description: A beautifully crafted stone bench, positioned under a large tree
examine_text: The stone bench is quite old and weathered, yet it maintains its regal appeal. Tiny flecks of light catch on the chiseled detailing of the stone. It seems to tell a story of love and dedication, symbolized by the etched roses wrapping around the bench legs.

name: Bird Bath
description: A stunning white marble bird bath with intricate designs
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the bird bath is carved from a single piece of marble. Detailed carvings cover the surface, depicting the king's and queen's story. Water in it reflects sunlight beautifully, seemingly inviting any nearby birds.

name: Statue of King
description: A large, imposing statue of the ancient king
examine_text: The statue of the king is a faithful representation of his image. It's crafted from obsidian stone, making it seem even more majestic. You can see a slight smile on the king's face, his eyes filled with kindness and wisdom.

name: Statue of Queen
description: A lifelike statue of the beautiful ancient queen
examine_text: The queen's statue, made from pure white marble, contrasts beautifully with the king's obsidian statue. Her expression is one of love and benevolence, perfectly embodying her known characteristics. Her robes are intricately carved, showcasing her regality.

name: Weight Plate
description: A round, heavy iron plate. Used for strength training.
examine_text: The weight is carefully carved from a block of iron. It has been used extensively and shows signs of wear with several scratches and spots where the iron color has worn off. The weight of the plate is clearly marked on it.

name: Archery Target
description: An object affixed with a series of concentric circles, used as a mark for archery.
examine_text: This large target consists of layers of tightly-packed straw. The concentric circles are clearly drawn, from largest to smallest, each one a different colour. Countless arrows have scarred the surface, while a few still stick out.

name: Hay Bail
description: A large, tied bundle of straw.
examine_text: This large bundle of straw has been tightly packed and tightly tied with a rough, strong rope. It's been used as makeshift seat, table and even as a target for shoot practice.

name: Training Sword
description: A blunted sword made for practice.
examine_text: This sword is decently long and its steel blade is purposely blunted for safety. The grip is wrapped in white cloth, now slightly discolored by sweat. Albeit made for practice, the sword still has a certain heft.

name: Rose Bush
description: A bush of delicate roses in vibrant shades of pink and red.
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the carefully pruned roses in full bloom. The petals appear soft and velvety, with dew drops glistening in the morning sunshine.

name: Statue of Founding Leader
description: A grandiose statue of the nation's founding leader.
examine_text: The statue is a towering representation of the country's founding leader. It is made from pure white marble, with detailed carvings depicting the leader in a majestic pose.

name: Moat
description: A moat surrounding the statue.
examine_text: The moat is filled with clear, cool water. It reflects the image of the statue and the rich green foliage around it.

name: Stone Walkway
description: A stone path leading through the garden.
examine_text: The stone walkway weaves through the vibrant garden, leading visitors on a pleasant journey to take in all the sights.

name: Straw Mat
description: A straw-filled mat
examine_text: A straw-filled mat to sleep on. It's a bit dirty and ragged, but it's better than sleeping on the hard, cold ground.

name: Clothes Pile
description: A pile of worn clothes
examine_text: A dishevelled pile of worn, patched clothes. They appear to have been carelessly tossed aside.

name: Food Sack
description: A white sack filled with food
examine_text: A large white sack containing potatoes, apples and other basic food items. The sack is a little worn, but it seems to be holding up well.

name: Alligator
description: Dark scales and sharp teeth, this creature is a menace of the moat.
examine_text: Its eyes are cold as it silently watches from the water. Its massive tail stays hidden under the murky water. Its sharp teeth glisten in the sun as it opens and closes its mouth, watching you closely.

name: Murky Water
description: Dark, treacherous water surrounds the castle
examine_text: The water is opaque, hiding whatever may lurk beneath. Occasionally, bubbles percolate indicating the movement of creatures underneath the surface.

name: Intruder Bones
description: The skeletal remains of an unfortunate intruder.
examine_text: The bones have been picked clean, scattered around the grassy banks of the moat. They offer a haunting reminder of the moat's purpose.

name: Castle
description: The magnificent structure that towers over the moat.
examine_text: Its weathered stone walls stand tall, dotted with the occasional window. The castle, with its imposing battlements, exudes a solemn aura of strength and antiquity.

name: Golden Door Handles
description: Handles made from solid gold, ornate and gilded.
examine_text: These handles are forged from pure gold and engraved with regal patterns. They are established fixtures of the doors.

name: Door Engravings
description: Intricate engravings that depict the lineage of past kings and queens.
examine_text: The engravings are meticulously crafted pictures of past monarchs. Each figure carries a symbol of their reign and is depicted in a dignified manner.

name: Castle Doors
description: Large, solid gold doors providing entry to the castle.
examine_text: The doors are imposing and heavy. They provide much needed security for the castle, resisting any forms of invasion. Despite their weight, they move with surprising ease on their hinges.

name: Garden Fountain
description: A grand, intricately detailed stone fountain
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the fountain is laced with faint carvings of mythical creatures. Water bubbles gently from the mouth of a stone lion at the fountain's heart, creating a soothing ambiance.

name: Stone Bench
description: A carved stone bench, perfect for sitting and gazing at the palace.
examine_text: Examining the stone bench reveals delicate etchings of a story, perhaps an old legend from the kingdom's past. Slightly cold to the touch but comfortable nonetheless.

name: Royal Sigil
description: The kingdom's royal sigil, plated with gold.
examine_text: The sigil is meticulously crafted, featuring the arms of the royal family. The gold plating catches your eye, reflecting the sunlight in a dazzling array of colors.

name: Apple Tree
description: A lofty apple tree laden with ripe fruit
examine_text: The apple tree is bursting with vibrant-apple green leaves and crisp red apples. Perhaps they are here for the palace folks to enjoy a fresh fruit now and then.

name: Clothespins
description: A collection of wooden clothespins
examine_text: These are small, simple wooden clothespins, used by the villagers to hang their clothes on the lines. They are worn with use but still sturdy.

name: Laundry Baskets
description: Several hand-woven laundry baskets full of clothes
examine_text: These baskets are carefully crafted from local plants, filled with various clothes, waiting to be washed or already clean.

name: Drying Clothes
description: An assortment of colorful clothes hanging and drying in the sun
examine_text: The drying clothes are of multiple colours and designs suggesting the diverse clothing styles of the villagers. They are damp and fluttering in the breeze.

name: Washing Stones
description: Flat stones once used for washing clothes
examine_text: The stones are smooth and worn from years of use. They are situated near the stream for easy access to water

name: Stone Bench
description: A hand-carved stone bench, cool to touch.
examine_text: The bench is intricately designed by the skilled masons. It's smooth, cool, and provides a resting place for the people who wander in the courtyard.

name: Hanging Moss
description: Green moss hanging around the courtyard.
examine_text: This moss is hanging from the surrounding trees, giving this palace courtyard a serene and relaxing ambiance.

name: Flower Bed
description: Several beds of colorful flowers.
examine_text: The flowers are in full bloom, their inviting colors and scent give the courtyard a vibrant and lively feel.

name: Royal Rose Bush
description: An extremely beautiful bush studded with roses in various shades of red.
examine_text: On close inspection, the roses on the bush are in full bloom and their petals are velvety and soft. They give off a delightful fragrance that fills the air.

name: Garden Bench
description: Made of exquisitely carved wood, this bench has a delicate charm.
examine_text: The bench is worn smooth from the wind and weather but still maintains its sturdy structure. A beautiful carving of the palace is etched on its back support.

name: Fountain
description: Situated at the center of the labyrinth, this fountain is a characterful masterpiece.
examine_text: Composed of white marble and adorned with elegant sculptures, the fountain trickles with pure, crystal-clear water. A depiction of the late queen graces the highest point of the structure.

name: Labyrinth Bush
description: Shrubs shaped into walls for the labyrinth, adding an air of mystery to the garden.
examine_text: The thick shrubs are masterfully cut and maintained in a perfect network of woven paths. Closer look reveals tiny birds and insects taking refuge in their lush greenery.

name: Statue
description: A towering stone statue located at the corner of the courtyard.
examine_text: Close inspection reveals it to be a figure from Greek mythology, expertly sculpted with brilliantly detailed facial expressions and garment folds.

name: Fountain
description: A large, ornate fountain occupies the center of the courtyard.
examine_text: The water in the fountain is crystal clear, and it cascades softly from the top tier into the basin below. The stonework is ornate and the edges of the fountain are adorned with intricate sculpted seashells.

name: Flower
description: A brightly-colored flower growing in the garden.
examine_text: The petals look velvet-soft and have an iridescent sheen that catches the sunlight. The flower has a sweet, intoxicating scent.

name: Bench
description: A stone bench rests along the path near the garden.
examine_text: The bench, crafted from smooth marble, provides a comfortable place to sit and enjoy the atmosphere of the courtyard.

name: Rose
description: A vibrant red flower, although somewhat wilted.
examine_text: This rose, despite its wilting state, seems to pack a lot of life. Its radiant redness speaks volumes of the love once treasured in this place.

name: Statue
description: A large statue of a beautiful woman wrapped in ivy.
examine_text: This majestic marble statue of a woman holds an expression of kindness. It is wrapped in ivy, suggesting a sense of abandonment and yet, somehow, the lovely woman it replicates seems unfazed.

name: Overgrown Archway
description: An archway concealed by the wild growth of plants.
examine_text: The archway, made up of twisted roots and branches, seems to be a portal to another world. One step inside, there might not be any turning back...

name: Hunting Knife
description: A sharp, well-balanced hunting knife.
examine_text: The knife is lean and mean, built for precision and utility. It has a diamond-shaped cross-section, and it glistens menacingly under the sunlight. The handle is wrapped up in coarse leather, providing a good grip.

name: Leather Quiver
description: A quiver made of sturdy leather, filled with arrows.
examine_text: A sturdy leather quiver, dyed dark green. It holds a number of sleek, feathered arrows. The quiver's strap is thick and built to last, while the interior is divided into sections to keep each arrow separate.

name: Hunting Flask
description: A steel flask filled with a refreshing beverage.
examine_text: A quality flask, polished to a high shine. It's cool to the touch and you can hear liquid sloshing around when you give it a little shake. The top is smoothly threaded, suggesting it can be opened.

name: Camouflage Hood
description: A hood dyed with different shades of green and brown to blend into the environment.
examine_text: The hood is made of a durable fabric, dyed with streaks of green, brown, and black. The inside is lined with a softer material, and there's a slight weight to it, suggesting it's made to resist elements.

name: Old Lantern
description: A battered, rusty lantern. It seems old and abandoned.
examine_text: The lantern is really old and the glass is already cracked. It's made from rusty iron. By some miracle, it seems to still hold some oil in it.

name: Cloak
description: A dirty, torn cloak hangs on the trail's sign pole.
examine_text: The cloak is dirty and dusty. It is torn in many places but could perhaps still offer some shelter from the cold.

name: Ghostly Amulet
description: An ancient, pallid amulet that appears to glow dimly with ghostly light.
examine_text: The amulet hangs on a thin, silvery chain. The center bears a large, clear gem which seems to flicker with an inner light. The spectral light it emits adds an eerie quality to it.

name: Ancient Acorn
description: An acorn from the Tree of Spirits, glowing with a mysterious energy
examine_text: The acorn is rough to the touch, with a faint, pulsating glow. It is rumored to hold great power due to its connection with the souls trapped within the tree.

name: Spirit-Brew Berries
description: A handful of shimmering berries picked from a nearby bush. They are said to have healing properties.
examine_text: Each berry is a vibrant, almost ethereal blue. Their sweet scent fills the air, making your mouth water. It's said these can be brewed into a potent healing draught.

name: Bark of Protection
description: An enchanting piece of bark from the Tree of Spirits, believed to ward off harm.
examine_text: The bark is rough yet mesmerizing, with bright swirls of colors reflecting from its surface. It is believed to shield the wearer from harm.

name: Feathered Nest
description: A slightly glowing birds nest, nestled in one of the tree's branches.
examine_text: This beautiful nest is finely woven from small twigs and leaves, lined with glowing feathers from the birds who've made the Tree of Spirits their home. It's quite big, and something is rustling below the feathers...

name: Old Signboard
description: An aged wooden sign.
examine_text: Up close, you can see the faded lettering of various trail names and distances. Despite its age, the sign still serves its purpose efficiently.

name: Old Wagon Wheel
description: A weathered wagon wheel resting against a tree.
examine_text: Time and the elements have not been kind to this old wheel. From the looks of it, it might have been part of a merchant's caravan once.

name: Loaf of Bread
description: A half-eaten loaf of bread.
examine_text: Despite being half-eaten and slightly stale, this loaf of bread could potentially be a welcome meal for someone in need.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A rusty old cooking pot.
examine_text: Despite the rust, the pot still seems serviceable. You could probably use it to cook something, given the right ingredients.

name: Old Blanket
description: A threadbare blanket.
examine_text: While it may not afford much warmth, it's definitely better than nothing.

name: Large Oak Tree
description: A centuries-old oak tree that towers over the trail exit
examine_text: The tree is majestic, with a sturdy trunk and sprawling branches. Some initials have been carved into its bark, probably by lovers or hopeful adventurers leaving their mark. There is a sense of history and wisdom about this old tree; it has silently observed the passing of time and events in this forest.

name: Broken Branch
description: A sturdy-looking branch that has snapped off the tree
examine_text: The branch, probably from the oak tree, is solid and hefty, although one end is splintered from where it broke off. It's long and light enough to serve a purpose as a makeshift weapon or walking stick

name: Bird Nest
description: A small nest at an upper branch of the oak
examine_text: Upon careful observation, you see a small, delicately woven bird nest. Although the bird has flown away, the nest is a testament to nature's craftsmanship. It's perfectly formed, possibly with three or four small eggs in it.

name: Peasant's Quiver
description: A leather quiver discarded by a peasant
examine_text: The quiver is crafted from worn, sturdy leather with a strap for shoulder carry. It's designed to hold a set of arrows. Distinct smell of animal's skin confirms it's not new, although it's empty now and the arrows are nowhere to be found.

name: Ancient Bone
description: A bone from an unknown animal that adds to the structural integrity of the path
examine_text: It is a tinted piece of bone, aged and weathered. The bone is exceptionally tough and etched with marks of old runes.

name: Scary Eyes
description: Eyes that continuously watch you from the darkness of the forest
examine_text: These eyes glow with an ominous gleam. They seem to follow you around, staring with an intense scrutiny.

name: Ogre's Club
description: A massive weapon once wielded by the Ogre of the trail
examine_text: The club is massive, crudely constructed, but deadly nevertheless. It is stained with ancient tales of violence and combat.

name: Wild Fruits
description: A selection of brightly colored fruits clustered at the base of lone tree.
examine_text: The fruits vary in size, some as small as cherries while others are as big as a clenched fist. Their colors are just as varied, each adding to the enticing appearance of this natural bounty.

name: Hunting Bow
description: A sturdy bow, crafted from a tough flexible wood. Perfect for hunting.
examine_text: This bow is a piece of art. The wood is smoothly polished to ease tension, while the string, surprisingly, is of such strength that could withstand even the toughest arrow's speed.

name: Leather Quiver
description: A handy quiver made of sturdy leather. It comes full of sharp arrows.
examine_text: The leather quiver radiates an aroma of wild animals. The arrows are sharp and ready, glistening under the sun, promising to pierce through any flesh.

name: Gourd Flask
description: A flask made out of a hollowed gourd, it’s full of refreshing water.
examine_text: The gourd flask is rough to touch, with bits of the natural gourd's outer shell still on. It's quite heavy, indicating that it's full of water.

name: Carved Stone
description: A stone carved with inscriptions. It may be of importance.
examine_text: The stone is engraved with an old language. The characters are so complex that it's hard to interpret their meanings.

name: Ancient Oak Tree
description: A towering, majestic oak tree with sprawling branches and sturdy trunk.
examine_text: This ancient creation of nature looks like it's been here for hundreds of years. The bark is rough and knotty, making progress difficult. A few holes in the tree suggest the existence of squirrel's nests.

name: King's War Map
description: A detailed war map illustrating the layout of neighbouring kingdoms.
examine_text: This map, painted on a heavy piece of parchment, exhibits the strategic genius of the King. The details, illustrated with astute precision, depict the terrains, fortresses and key areas of the nearby kingdoms. It's secured in a leather tube.

name: Soft Moss Bed
description: A clump of damp, soft moss underfoot.
examine_text: A thick bed of plush seasonal moss. It's cool to the touch and brings a sense of calming tranquility. It's the perfect place to take a quick nap if you don't mind a few insects.

name: King's Sword
description: The King's ornate, jeweled sword, gleaming in the light.
examine_text: It's made of high-quality steel, a symbol of power and wealth. The hilt is adorned with precious gemstones, and the blade is engraved with the King's official crest.

name: Oak Pews
description: Long, sturdy pews made from polished oak. Each one can seat about ten people.
examine_text: The pews look old but well cared for. Crisp engravings decorate the sides, showing scenes from the Bible. They're smooth and worn from countless worshipers over the years. A hymnal book rests on one.

name: Altar
description: A stone altar at the front of the chapel, adorned with a simple white cloth and wooden cross.
examine_text: The altar is hewn from solid stone, imposing and majestic. Wisps of incense smoke linger around it. The wooden cross is simple and solemn. It's evident this altar has played host to countless sermons.

name: Hymnal Book
description: A hymnal book resting on a pew, filled with religious songs and prayers.
examine_text: The hymnal book is bound in rugged leather, the pages are fragile and yellowed with age. Fingerprints smudge the corners of well-loved pages. It's filled with lyrics, scripts for hymns and prayers in crisp, flowing script.

name: Golden Cross
description: A gleaming golden cross displayed gloriously on the inner sanctuary wall.
examine_text: This cross catches your eyes with its noble light. The unique religious piece was produced by a local artisan. Its simple but compelling design embodies the piety and faith of the believers.

name: Candelabra
description: An ornate candelabra sitting on the altar, holding flickering candles.
examine_text: The candelabra is a work of art, ornately decorated with cherubs and swirls, holding aloft seven candles. It casts a warm and inviting light throughout the room.

name: Megabiblion
description: A massive, leather-bound book displayed on a wooden pedestal.
examine_text: The massive leather-bound book contains hand-written scriptures and stories, carefully scribed by a generation of devoted monks. The paper itself is yellowed with age, but the text is still crisp and clear.

name: Prayer Bench
description: A humble wooden prayer bench, worn by the knees of countless faithful.
examine_text: The prayer bench is worn smooth by countless hours of devotional prayer. Despite its simple construction, there is a profound serenity to be found in its well-worn wood?

name: Choir Robes
description: A set of long, white choir robes with green accents.
examine_text: The robes are pristine white with lovely green accents, signaling the beauty of purity and life. They look well-cared for and quite elegant.

name: Keyboard
description: A small keyboard resting in the corner.
examine_text: The keyboard, though small, is well-kept and has a full set of black and white keys. Though compact, it is capable of creating beautiful melodies and harmonies essential for the choir's performance.

name: Table
description: A large table situated in the middle of the room.
examine_text: The table is sturdy with a polished surface. It serves as a hub for the choir members, where they gather around for their practice sessions.

name: Chairs
description: Several chairs arranged around the table.
examine_text: The chairs are simple and function-centric, offering just enough comfort for the choir members during their practice sessions.

name: Large Brass Bell
description: A big bell made of brass used to call people to service
examine_text: The large brass bell gleams in the sunlight, resounding powerfully when struck. There are decorations and scriptures adorning its surface, becoming testament to its age and significance. The bell displays the years of its use, with a polished sheen that comes from countless rings.

name: Creaky Floor
description: An old wooden floor that creaks under pressure
examine_text: Years of weather and use have aged this floor. The wooden planks are worn and uneven, some loose and others firm. Each step leads to a different sound, creating a melody of creaks that echo with the church's longevity.

name: Bell rope
description: A long and sturdy rope tied to the bell, used to ring the bell
examine_text: The rope has a rugged texture, made from years of tugging and bell ringing. It's quite long, stretching all the way to the top of the bell tower. It feels strong, reliable, capably bearing the bell's weight over all these years.

name: Marble Bench
description: A long, sturdy bench crafted from smooth marble.
examine_text: The bench, cool to the touch, shows signs of wear from countless worshippers finding respite upon it. Small etchings of religious symbols adorn the sides.

name: Frosted Window
description: A large window with intricate frost designs.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the frost designs morph into biblical scenes, masterfully crafted to catch and refract the soft, diffused light that filters through the window.

name: Organ
description: A large organ resting on the stage.
examine_text: The organ, imposing and grand, bears a dark, polished mahogany finish. Its intricate mechanics are hidden within, and towering pipes ascend towards the high ceiling.

name: Gold Trim
description: Gold trims outlining the walls and archways.
examine_text: The gold trim, elegant and pristine, curves into ornate patterns that speak to the craftsmanship of its makers. It gleams as it catches the light.

name: Altar
description: The ornately decorated centerpiece of the church.
examine_text: The Altar is made of rich, dark wood and covered with a deep red silk cloth embroidered with gold. A hefty, ornate cross, studded with precious jewels glimmers atop the table, reflecting colored light across the room.

name: Jeweled Cross
description: A cross decorated with diamonds, sapphires, and rubies.
examine_text: The cross is exceptionally large and ornate, almost glowing with reflected light from the carefully placed gems. It is a truly unique treasure.

name: Stained-Glass Window
description: A large, decorative window overlooking the altar.
examine_text: The window is made of multicolored glass, arranged in a brilliantly detailed depiction of a biblical scene. Sunlight streams through it, casting a beautiful display of colored light across the room.

name: Cloud of Smoke
description: A swirling mass of colors residing in the church
examine_text: As you approach, the cloud glows and pulses with an almost lifelike quality. It's strange and magical, yet also a bit disconcerting.

name: Discarded Fairy Trinkets
description: Small items and oddities dropped by the fairies
examine_text: They appear shiny and delicate, ranging from tiny bejeweled boxes to miniature golden goblets. They look precious, but picking them up might be a part of the fairies' trick.

name: Floor
description: The surface you walk on
examine_text: The floor is a strange, shifting surface, sometimes solid, sometimes soft like moss. You suspect the fairies may manipulate it as part of their tricks.

name: Fairy dust
description: A sparkling dust lingering in the air
examine_text: Microscopic and lighter than air, yet glittering in a spectrum of colors. It feels magical, but you wonder if it's part of the fairies' pranks too.

name: Wooden Bench
description: An old, worn-out wooden bench used by people to sit and put on their footwear.
examine_text: The bench has faded in color due to years of exposure to moisture and is slightly shaky due to people constantly sitting on it and changing their shoes. It has an aroma of mixed scents from the various leather and fabric shoes that have been placed on it over the years.

name: Wicker Baskets
description: Large wicker baskets used for holding coats and shoes.
examine_text: The baskets are made of sturdy plaited wicker with a deep, wide opening for coats and shoes. They have been reinforced on the bottom to handle the weight of the items being placed on them.

name: Candle Sconce
description: An ornate wall-mounted candle sconce providing a gentle, flickering light.
examine_text: The sconce is a little high up, but you can see that it's made of iron, rusted slightly from age, holding a single thick wax candle that's been burned down a little. It provides just enough light to cast eerie shadows on the coats in the basket.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A simple durable wooden chair with an ornately carved back.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the chair's carving depicted a serene scenario.  The hardwood has been polished to a shine and comes with a velvet cushion for the sitter to avoid discomfort.

name: Religious Tapestry
description: A large colorful tapestry depicting a religious story.
examine_text: The tapestry grapples the attention with intricate detailing and vibrant colors. Various shapes, figures and symbols used to display biblical stories are woven onto it with a mastery that speak the hands of a skilled artisan.

name: Stone Lighting Wall sconce
description: A stone holder for candles that's attached to the wall.
examine_text: The stone has been carved and hewn into an intricate holder for two or three candles. Flint and iron is kept by this setting for times when the wax sticks have to be replaced for a new lighting.

name: Wooden Pew
description: A lone wooden row seat at the back of the church.
examine_text: It's a sturdy, somewhat aged wooden pew. The wood is a bit scuffed from years of use and the finish is dull. Past generations must have sat here.

name: Hymn Book
description: A thick hymn book, filled with church songs and prayers.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the hymn book reveals worn edges and soft, well-thumbed pages. Annotations are made in neat handwriting in the margins of some songs.

name: Candlestick
description: A slender brass candlestick holding a tapered candle.
examine_text: The surface of the candlestick seems to hold years of polish and care. The wax candle is barely used, with a small wick sticking out at the top.

name: Prayer Beads
description: A small set of prayer beads made from wood.
examine_text: These beads are worn smooth from repeated use, strung together on a thin, sturdy string. Each bead seems to hold a history of prayers spoken silently or whispered to the air.

name: Gospel Books
description: A collection of gospel books and religious materials.
examine_text: The volumes contain various gospel texts, prayers, and teachings. Each book is worn with use, its bindings creased and pages yellowed from many years of devoted study.

name: Silk Linens
description: Expensive, opulent silk linens, set aside for the pope's use.
examine_text: The silk linens are luxurious, their rich texture is cool and tantalizing to the touch. The pope must have a comfortable sleep amidst his religious duties.

name: Makeshift Kitchen
description: A small, functional kitchen area, just enough for one person's needs.
examine_text: The kitchen is small but well-kept, with a stove, pot, and some basic utensils. There's a smell of fresh bread and soup from the last use.

name: Cabinet
description: A small wooden cabinet filled with religious tapes and records.
examine_text: The cabinet looks old and worn out. It's filled with various religious tapes and records.

name: Robes
description: Several big robes are hanging neatly on hooks.
examine_text: The robes are thick and heavy, perfect for the chilly interior of the church. They are embroidered with intricate designs of crosses and saints.

name: Candles
description: A set of candles gently illuminating the room.
examine_text: The flickering light from the candles creates shadows that dance across the room. They have a soft, slightly smoky scent.

name: Bookcase
description: A bookcase filled with religious texts.
examine_text: The bookcase is full to the brim with different religious texts. Some books are thumbed through often, while others are covered in a layer of dust.

name: Wooden Pew
description: Long, polished wooden pew perfect for sitting during sermons
examine_text: The pew appears old and hallowed, still glistening from the polish. There's a hint of an antique smell and an comforting ambience.

name: Stained Glass Windows
description: Ornate windows depicting biblical scenes in vivid colors
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the artwork on the windows is indeed impressive. Each scene is meticulously crafted, reflecting light in a way that breathes life into the depictions.

name: Red Runner Rug
description: Long, red runner rug that lines the path to the altar
examine_text: This thick rug bears the faded traces of hundreds of years of pious footsteps. One can almost feel the fervent prayers of those souls who paced this path.

name: altar
description: A small wooden altar placed at the front of the church.
examine_text: The altar is well-worn but well-kept, showing signs of regular use and care. The top of the altar is smooth, with a simple cloth draped over it. A couple of candles are placed at the sides, their wicks blackened from many prayers.

name: candle
description: A wax candle on the altar, it provides a soft glow to the room.
examine_text: The candle is mostly melted down, showing its frequent use. The wax is creamy white, and the flame dances gently, casting a warm light around the altar.

name: traveler's cot
description: A simple cot, available to any weary traveler who needs it.
examine_text: The cot is made of simple wood and a thin straw mattress. It doesn't look particularly comfortable, but it's certainly better than sleeping on the ground.

name: priest's robe
description: A simple robe belonging to the priest.
examine_text: Though simple, the robe has a quiet elegance to it. It's made of rough cloth in muted colors. Despite its simplicity, the robe carries an aura of significance.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A slightly worn out wooden bench.
examine_text: The bench is made out of oak wood, slightly worn out due to usage. Some initials are carved into the backrest, likely made by bored youths.

name: Crucifix
description: A small wooden crucifix.
examine_text: This crucifix appears to be hand carved. Its simplicity adds to its beauty. One feels a sense of calm looking at the depiction of Jesus Christ on the cross.

name: Vase
description: A small, simple vase.
examine_text: The vase is made of ceramic. Despite its simplicity, it's rather elegant. It is filled with fresh flowers, which add to its charm.

name: Plant
description: A potted plant.
examine_text: A small green plant in a terracotta pot. It has been well taken care of, as it is thriving despite the meager light available in the church.

name: Ornate Mosaic
description: A large, vibrant mosaic depicting scenes of notable Paladin exploits.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the mosaic is intricately detailed, with each tiny tile representing a part of a larger, grand picture. The Paladins depicted show expressions of determination and valor, capturing their courage and devotion to their faith.

name: Sarcophagus of the First Great Paladin
description: A grand sarcophagus at the center of the chapel.
examine_text: Made of pure marble, the sarcophagus is a work of art in itself. The exquisite carvings tell the story of the first Great Paladin and his courageous deeds. The top holds an almost life-sized statue of the Paladin in his full regalia, laying in eternal rest.

name: White Roses
description: A cluster of white roses, a symbol of a Paladin’s funeral.
examine_text: The roses bathe the chapel in a lingering, sweet fragrance, a testament to the bounty of life each Paladin had safeguarded. Their stark whiteness emanates an aura of reverence, each rose in full bloom conveying a lost Paladin’s spirit.

name: Clergy Robe
description: A simple black and white clergy robe hung on the coat hook.
examine_text: The robe is a plain black and white color, with a small cross emblem stitched on the shoulder. It's very thin and likely not at all warm.

name: Wooden Cross
description: A worn-out wooden cross resting vertically against the foot of the bed.
examine_text: A symbol of faith and devotion, the cross is clearly old and weather-beaten. The wood is chipped in places, and the surface is rough under your fingers.

name: Bed
description: A rickety looking wooden bed with a thin mattress.
examine_text: The bed looks uncomfortable, with its thin mattress and threadbare blanket. Yet it remains a place to rest.

name: Nightstand
description: A simple wooden nightstand next to the bed, with a gastly old lamp on it.
examine_text: The nightstand shows signs of heavy use. The paint has faded, revealing the old wood underneath in places. The lamp’s once white shade is now stained a warm yellow.

name: Parchment
description: An old and slightly torn piece of parchment.
examine_text: It's filled with ancient scriptures, perhaps a verse from the bible, the ink has faded over time.

name: Wooden Chairs
description: A set of somewhat dusty wooden chairs.
examine_text: They are intricately carved with symbols, perhaps linked to the religious theme of the church.

name: Stained Glass Art
description: Impressive and ancient stained glass pieces portraying biblical stories.
examine_text: Each piece of glass has been meticulously worked and assembled to form vivid and moving images.

name: holy water vial
description: A small, glass vial filled with clear liquid
examine_text: Upon inspecting the vial, you notice the light refracting perfectly through the clear, sanctified water. The vial itself is made of thin, but robust glass, with various unidentified markings etched into the surface.

name: ceremonial robe
description: A simple, yet elegantly embroidered robe
examine_text: The robe is made of fine cloth, usually in hues of white or gold. The fabric is further enriched by detailed lacing and embroidered elements, representing religious symbols that are significant to the church's faith.

name: prayer book
description: A small, delicate book filled with prayers and religious texts
examine_text: The book's cover feels warm to the touch, made of worn but well-preserved leather. The pages, smelling mildly of old parchment, are filled with handwritten prayers in a calligraphy that can only be described as an artwork.

name: altar candle
description: A tall, white candle with many wax drippings
examine_text: The candle is almost eerily perfect in its cylindrical shape. Wick still intact, it's been burnt many times, as evidenced by the hardened wax drippings. It's commonly used for religious rituals and ceremonies.

name: Old Torch
description: A dusty, unused torch leaning against the wall
examine_text: The torch is thickly covered in dust. It seems it hasn't been used in decades. The handle is a bit brittle but it's solid enough to hold. It still has a bit of oil in it.

name: Stone Steps
description: Uneven stone steps leading downwards into the passage
examine_text: The stone steps, though ancient, are sturdy. Years of use have worn them slightly in the middle, but they're still safe to use.

name: Secret Door
description: A hidden wooden door behind the wardrobe
examine_text: Though expertly hidden behind the wardrobe, you spot the secret door. The pinewood door is adorned with a simple iron handle. It looks like it hasn't been opened in ages.

name: Priest's Stole
description: A strip of cloth worn by clergy members during confession.
examine_text: The stole is made of fine purple cloth. Ecclesiastical symbols are beautifully embroidered on it. The wear and tear suggests it has seen many confessions.

name: Confessional Chair
description: A small wooden chair for the priest during confession.
examine_text: The chair creaks under your weight. It's surprisingly comfortable despite its austere look. Soft, worn from years of use.

name: Secret compartment
description: A hidden compartment in the confessional box.
examine_text: You run your hand along the edge of the compartment, feeling the uneven, hand-carved edges. The compartment is empty.

name: Collection of confessions
description: A stack of sealed envelopes containing handwritten confessions.
examine_text: Each envelope is secured with a wax seal, detailed with the church's crest. The faded ink on the parchments suggests they have been in the compartment for quite a while.

name: Golden Chalice
description: An ornate, golden chalice studded with precious gems.
examine_text: Struck from pure gold and studded with gems of every kind, this chalice is an object of unparalleled beauty and sanctity. The cup is etched with sacred carvings and the base is adorned with delicate filigree work.

name: Altar Cloth
description: A beautifully embroidered altar cloth.
examine_text: A finely woven cloth, it is embroidered with gold and silver threads, depicting holy symbols and scenes. It smells faintly of incense and is warm to the touch.

name: Sacred Candle
description: A tall, flickering candle.
examine_text: The candle is made of pure beeswax. Its bright flame flickers and dances, casting shadows around the altar. It seems to radiate a warmth more profound than mere physical heat.

name: Bible
description: A large, ancient Bible.
examine_text: It is bound in leather and its pages are yellowed with age. The cover is inscribed with holy symbols and the pages within are filled with the wisdom of ages past.

name: Altar Cloth
description: A pure white altar cloth spread on the altar.
examine_text: The cloth is untouched by dirt and dust, a testament to the reverence with which it is treated. Embroidered along its edges are intricate designs and religious symbols, painstakingly stitched by hand.

name: Golden Chalice
description: A brilliant, golden chalice embedded with precious jewels.
examine_text: The chalice is ornate, with detailed carvings of saints and apostles. It could hold about a pint of liquid. The jewels catch the light, casting soft hues about the room.

name: Golden Plate
description: A shiny, circular golden plate.
examine_text: The plate is polished to perfection and catches the candlelight beautifully. Intricate designs and religious symbols are carved along its edges.

name: Pew Bench
description: A long wooden bench, worn smooth from years of use.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the bench seems to have been crafted out of sturdy oak, its surface worn smooth from years of frequent use. There are tiny scratches and engravings on the wood, perhaps left behind by those who have sat here in days past.

name: Prayer Candles
description: A row of small white candles in brass holders.
examine_text: Each bright, petite candle is encased in a brass holder. The individual flames flicker earnestly, casting a soft glow. You can feel a sensation of tranquility and solemnity.

name: Priest's Podium
description: A large wooden podium on the stage where the priest gives his sermons.
examine_text: Crafted from a dark mahogany, the podium is solid and commanding. It is adorned with religious symbols, the reflective varnish catching the light. There's a distinct sense of authority that emanates from it.

name: Wooden Divider
description: A sturdy, dark wood divider with carved patterns on each side.
examine_text: Upon closer look, the divider reveals intricate carvings of religious figures. There's a small mesh screen at around average height to facilitate the communication between the two.

name: Confessional Seat
description: A simple wooden seat without a back rest.
examine_text: The seat is smoothed over from years of usage. Despite its simplicity, there is a certain comforting aura around it.

name: Prayer Book
description: A thick, worn out prayer book with many bookmarks marking the pages.
examine_text: The book seems to be several years old, but is well-kept. Various prayers and hymns are written in ornate language. Several pages are marked with silky bookmarks, possibly denoting the most often used prayers.

name: Holy Bible
description: A large, leather-bound bible with gold leafing on the edges
examine_text: The bible feels heavy and dignified in your hands. Reading its pages, you find wisdom and guidance to counter life's tribulations.

name: Crucifix
description: A soldier crucifix hung on the wall above the seat
examine_text: The crucifix depicts the image of Jesus Christ, offering a reminder of his crucifixion. The figure is masterfully crafted and has a somber, sacred aura.

name: Ornate Desk
description: An intricately carved wooden desk that is the centerpiece of the chamber.
examine_text: The desk is made of sturdy, dark oak with intricate carvings of divine symbols all around the edges. There are several drawers which may contain valuable items.

name: High Back Chair
description: A comforting chair that the high priest uses to study and meditate.
examine_text: The plush chair has been worn down in places from years of use. The upholstery is a coarse, but not uncomfortable fabric. It creaks slightly when sat upon.

name: Cup of Holy Water
description: A chalice filled with water, blessed by the high priest himself.
examine_text: A golden chalice glistens under the candlelight, the water inside pure and untouched. When drank, it restores one's health completely.

name: Bookshelves
description: Bookshelves filled with ancient religious texts.
examine_text: The wooden bookshelves are filled to the brim with countless religious texts, all of which the high priest has spent time studying. They could contain useful information or even hidden notes.

name: Handmade Angels
description: A group of delicate handcrafted figurines
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the exquisite craftsmanship of these heavenly figures. Each one is unique, their hand painted faces reflecting the artisan's attention to detail.

name: Christmas Decorations
description: An array of festive décor packed away for next Christmas
examine_text: These decorations vary from glittering ornaments to large, intricately designed nativity scenes. Stored carefully to avoid any damages.

name: Candles
description: Numerous candles of various sizes stocked for use
examine_text: You see an assortment of candles, from the small votives to larger pillar types. Some are scented giving off a warm, pleasant aroma.

name: Donations
description: A pile of donated items to the church
examine_text: Upon inspection, you see a variety of goods- clothing, food, books, and more- all donated by the congregation for the needy.

name: Small Round Window
description: A small round window, devoid of glass
examine_text: A small, round window cut out in the attic, intended for ventilation, not for viewing. It doesn't have any glass, allowing the outside air to circulate inside.

name: Religious Text
description: A book with scuffed leather and gold gilt edging.
examine_text: The book contains religious text and depictions. Pages are old and yellow but still legible with beautiful caligraphic writing.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A simple chair made out of oak, heavily used with marks and scratches.
examine_text: Though the chair might not look comfortable, it's made that way to discourage prolonged idle sitting. The wood is polished and well cared for.

name: Old Trunk
description: A large wooden trunk with iron bindings, worn with age.
examine_text: The trunk is heavy and filled with old manuscripts and parchments. The lock is rusted but functional.

name: Candlestick
description: A brass candlestick holder, a little bit of wax dripped down
examine_text: It's made to hold one candle and has a handle. The wax is nearly finished.

name: Wooden Door
description: A large wooden door that leads into the church.
examine_text: The door is heavy, made of carved wood. You see many intricate designs and religious symbols etched into the wood.

name: Candles
description: A set of candles burning on a table.
examine_text: Each candle glows with a gentle light, filling the room with a divine aura. You can smell a faint scent of beeswax.

name: Prayer Books
description: A series of worn prayer books.
examine_text: The books have soft, leather covers, worn over time. The pages are filled with various prayers and hymns, marked by numerous bookmarks.

name: Sign
description: A sign listing the names of the clergy.
examine_text: The sign is made of polished metal and is etched deeply with the names of the current clergy.

name: Bible
description: A worn-out, leather-bound bible laying on the pulpit.
examine_text: The book is old and well-used, pages frayed from years of fervent reading. The cover is deeply embossed with gold lettering spelling out 'Holy Bible.' Inside, the tiny text looks meticulously handprinted.

name: Church Pew
description: Rows of wooden Church Pews with worn out cushions.
examine_text: These hard wooden pews have seen better days. The stain is fading and the wood is chipping off in places. The cushions attached to them are threadbare and worn. They exude an unmistakable aura of history.

name: Stained Glass
description: Beautifully colored Sstained glass windows depicting different biblical scenes.
examine_text: The large stained glass windows are depicting various biblical stories. Sunlight seeping through them creates a hauntingly beautiful array of colors. These truly are an artisan's masterpiece.

name: Hymn Book
description: An old hymn book, worn from years of use.
examine_text: The hymn book is worn and dog-eared.  Some of the pages are torn and the hymns have faded over the years, but you can still make out 'Amazing Grace'.

name: Bible
description: An ancient Bible, it looks like it hasn't been touched in years.
examine_text: The Bible is heavy with a leather cover.  The pages are gilded and the binding is still intact. Upon opening it, you find passages highlighted and notes written in the margins.

name: Church Pew
description: A large wooden church pew, worn from years of use.
examine_text: The pew is sturdy, made of oak and stained a dark brown. It is scratched and faded in places, as if many people have sat here over the years.

name: Ancient Pew
description: A long wooden pew with a polished surface.
examine_text: This ancient pew has intricate carvings on its surface, signifying the stories of early inhabitants and their faith. Despite its age, it's solid and sturdy. A testament to the craftsmanship of its makers.

name: Ceremonial-candle
description: A long, wax candle set on a shiny brass holder.
examine_text: The pale white wax of the candle gleams against the dim light. It exudes a soft, delicate aroma when lit. The brass holder, polished to perfection, reflects the flickering flame elegantly.

name: Hymn-book
description: A worn out hymn book filled with numerous spiritual songs.
examine_text: The hymn book, though worn with age, is bound in leather and engraved with golden letters. The pages inside are off-white and have a musty scent. The hymns are beautifully written, with lyrics singing praises of the divine.

name: Wooden Pew
description: A long wooden bench, worn and smooth from years of use.
examine_text: This pew is made of a dark, rich-coloured wood with an aged, glossy finish. Surprisingly, despite seeming old, it’s quite sturdy.

name: Stained Glass Window
description: A large, ornate window, painted with colourful depictions of religious events.
examine_text: The stained glass window is a canvas of bright and colourful images, telling stories entrenched in religious lore. Sunlight filters through, casting vibrant hues onto the stone floor.

name: Religious Book
description: A thick, well-preserved book filled with centuries of wisdom and stories.
examine_text: The book is bound in burgundy leather with corners tinged with gold. Inside, the pages are slightly yellowed with age, filled with closely-written text and beautiful, intricate illustrations.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A simple wooden bench, worn by the passage of countless worshipers.
examine_text: The bench is sturdy and simply designed, devoid of any lavish designs. The wood is worn smooth from decades of use and the passage of countless worshipers. There's room enough on it for up to four people.

name: Stained Glass Window
description: A beautiful stained glass window depicting Biblical imagery.
examine_text: The window is a colorful mosaic of stained glass, each piece intricately designed and fitted together to depict stories from the Bible. The light filtering through paints a kaleidoscope of colors onto the stone floor of the nave.

name: Pulpit
description: A sturdy, wooden pulpit situated at the front of the nave.
examine_text: Made of the same sturdy wood as the benches, the pulpit stands raised above the nave floor. It is used by the priest for delivering sermons. Despite its simple design, it exudes a sense of authority and it is the focus of the congregation during masses.

name: Bible
description: A worn, but meticulously kept bible.
examine_text: The cover is heavily worn, indicating years of usage. Pages are highlighted, underlined, and covered in notes from decades of study.

name: Prayer Beads
description: A set of old, wooden prayer beads.
examine_text: The beads are worn smooth from use, held together by a thin, leather string. Each bead represents a prayer or intention.

name: Pew
description: An old, wooden pew
examine_text: The pew is sturdy, well polished and has seen more years of service than any one person.

name: Old Bible
description: A worn and dusty Bible left on a pew
examine_text: It's an old, weathered copy of the Bible. The pages have yellowed with age and the cover is torn in places. Some of the pages are dog-eared, possibly marking important passages.

name: Candle
description: A half-melted candle stands on the altar
examine_text: A white wax candle, halfway melted with a thin wick sticking up. It has been a long time since this candle was last lit.

name: Pew
description: A long old wooden pew
examine_text: It's a classic church pew, made from old, creaky wood and polished to a dull sheen. There are numerous scratches and carvings in the wood, possibly etched by bored church-goers.

name: Crucifix
description: A large ornate crucifix hangs on the wall
examine_text: It's a large, intricately detailed crucifix hanging high on the wall. Made of dark wood and adorned with gold accents, it stands as a symbol of faith.

name: Stained Glass Window
description: A beautiful stained glass window depicting various biblical scenes
examine_text: The window is a kaleidoscope of vibrant colors, depicting various scenes from the Bible. The light streaming through the glass casts a colorful glow in the church.

name: Confession Booth
description: A dark wooden confession booth sits in the corner
examine_text: It's a small, secluded booth situated in the corner of the church. Separated by a thin wooden wall, it offers a sense of privacy and solace for those seeking confession.

name: Bell
description: An antique, iron bell hung high in the tower.
examine_text: The bell is a giant artifact of ancient ironwork. Thick cracks etch deep into its massive form and a wooden mallet swings idly by its side. The underside is dark and hollow, an abyss that swallows up the thin light.

name: Altar
description: A small wooden altar at the base of the bell tower.
examine_text: The altar, though diminutive, bears the ornate tracery and gilt-work of genuine dedication. A still reverence lingers near the worn surface, which feels velvety under your touch.

name: Climbing Ropes
description: A set of thick, coarse ropes attached to the bell.
examine_text: These ropes are wearied from years of constant pull and release. Their fibers are thick and browned with age, though sturdy enough to withstand further use.

name: Prayer Book
description: A slightly worn book of prayers.
examine_text: The book is old and well-thumbed, with a cover that has faded to a deep navy. Inside, the pages are filled with ancient prayers and blessings.

name: Hard Bench
description: A long, dark oak bench for the faithful to sit.
examine_text: Crafted from dark oak, the bench is long and has definitely seen better days. But its history and the countless prayers whispered from its seating adds to its palpable spiritual aura.

name: Golden Altar
description: A stunning golden altar that serves as the centerpiece of the church.
examine_text: A breathtaking work of art, the altar glistens with its gold embellishments. Angelic figures can be seen carved on its surface, each seemingly telling a story of faith and redemption.

name: Church Piano
description: This antique piano rests off to the side, ready for hymns to be played.
examine_text: A classic upright piano that echoes with the melody of faith. Its worn keys hint at the many hymns played throughout the years, each note a testament to devotion.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A small, uncomfortable wooden bench. It looks worn and polished by countless penitents over the years.
examine_text: The bench is made of a sturdy dark wood, probably oak, and it has a soft shine from countless sitting and kneeling prayers. It has no rest or cushioning - it was built for penance, not comfort.

name: Candle
description: A single slender candle, providing the sole source of light in the room.
examine_text: Made of white wax, the candle is almost completely consumed. To your surprise, the flame does not flicker, it maintains a steady, calm, almost divine light.

name: Sliding Window
description: A small wooden window within the confessional. It is shut, separating you from the cardinal on the other side.
examine_text: It is a simple window: just a wooden rectangle that slides to the side. The mystery of its opposite side calls to you in the dim candle light.

name: Velvet Curtains
description: Thick, red fabric used to shield the confessional booth
examine_text: The curtains are deep scarlet in color, made from a plush material. They're noticeably worn by years of use but maintain a sense of regality.

name: Oaken Bench
description: A sturdy bench made from oak
examine_text: The bench is solid oak, without any cushion. Years of wear has seasoned the wood to a deep brown.

name: Screen
description: A thin, wooden partition dividing the booth
examine_text: The screen is sheer and intricately carved, providing privacy but not complete isolation.

name: Vintage Painting
description: An old painting depicting Jesus' death and resurrection
examine_text: Despite the fading colors and cracks, the painting still shows the agonizing crucifixion and miraculous resurrection of Jesus with great detail.

name: Ancient Artwork
description: Ancient, symbolical artwork covering the temple windows.
examine_text: Intricately designed with vibrant colours, each piece of artwork tells a story of the gods. Some sections of the artwork have faded over time, adding to its charm and mystery.

name: Glowing Altar
description: A deep glow comes from the altar.
examine_text: Built of solid stone, the altar glows mysteriously. Offerings of flowers and incense adorn its surface, filling the air with a calming scent. It's believed to have divine energies attached to it.

name: Old Pews
description: Rows of old pews where the faithful can sit and pray.
examine_text: Made of heavy, dark wood, they are worn smooth from years of use. Each pew has an old hymnal book neatly placed on it.

name: Hymnal Book
description: An old book filled with hymns and prayers.
examine_text: The book is worn and well-loved, with dog-eared pages and hand-written notes in the margins. Some pages have been bookmarked with old, pressed flowers

name: Wooden Chair
description: A simple wooden chair lined with golden trim.
examine_text: It is an old, wooden chair slightly polished with wear and the passage of time with a touch of sparkle from the golden lining.

name: Golden Cloth
description: A golden cloth with a dragon on it covering the window to the priest's chamber.
examine_text: As you approach, you realize it's a beautifully intricate piece of cloth. It's woven from golden thread and depicts a mighty dragon in the middle.

name: Window
description: A small window that offers a glimpse into the priest's chamber.
examine_text: On closer examination, one notes the window is just right for viewing. It is shaded by the golden cloth, making any confessions an anonymous affair.

name: Cloud Chalice
description: A light blue, cloudy glass full of refreshing ale.
examine_text: The chalice looks beautiful. You can see the froth at the top of the ale and the condensation on the outside of the chalice.

name: Sky Spectacles
description: A pair of spectacles with a light blue frame, giving a hazy view of the sky city.
examine_text: The spectacles are slightly heavy, but they're surprisingly comfortable. They provide a unique, clearer view of the city.

name: Elixir of Levitation
description: A mysterious, shimmering potion in a vial. Known to give temporary levitation ability.
examine_text: The elixir is swirling with sparkling particles, and gives off a soothing glow. It smells sweet and tangy.

name: Cloud Cushion
description: A fluffy white cushion made of cloud fabric, perfect for a peaceful rest.
examine_text: The cushion looks invitingly soft and comfortable. It does seem like sitting on a cloud!

name: Celestial Globe
description: A large, antique celestial globe, providing a map of the heavens.
examine_text: The celestial globe is intricately carved with the constellations. The zodiacs are drawn in gold leaf and cities are marked with precious stones.

name: Telescope
description: A grand telescope, polished to a mirror shine, mounted to a rotating base.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you take note of the elaborate carvings on its wooden body and brass lenses on both ends. It's adjusted by a set of intricate gears and wheels.

name: Moon Map
description: An aged and detailed map of the moon's surface, hung on the wall.
examine_text: The map is quite large, dominated by countless gray and white circles symbolizing the moon's craters. A network of thin lines mark natural features, and notes in neat handwriting can be seen along the margins.

name: King's Royal Robe
description: A magnificent, plush robe adorned with golden embroidery, likely belonging to the king.
examine_text: The texture of the robe is luxuriously soft and the intricate, golden threadwork depicts celestial bodies and constellations. It is truly fit for a king.

name: Wooden Table
description: A worn, long wooden table filled with remnants of meals past.
examine_text: The lengthy table, drenched in candle wax and spotted with various stains, hints at years of usage. Tiny engravings litter its surface, possibly from the idle hands of past workers.

name: Candle
description: A dimly burning candle providing the room with scarce light.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the candle wax drips slowly from its base, revealing countless nights of use. The flame, though small, flickers stubbornly against the darkness.

name: Worn Apron
description: A soiled apron hanging from a nearby bench.
examine_text: This apron, stained with dirt and grease, tells stories of kitchens bustling with activity. A few embroidered threads come loose at the edges, evidence of its owner's hard work.

name: Mossy Stone
description: A damp stone overgrown with a patch of green moss.
examine_text: Up close, the tiny leaves of the moss plants thrive in the damp environment. The stone itself feels cold underneath, a silent reminder of the hall's aging structure.

name: Golden Harp
description: A beautiful golden harp glinting in the ethereal cloud light.
examine_text: On close examination, the Golden Harp appears extremely well-crafted. It's made from a shiny gold material that gives off a melodious sound when strummed.

name: Cloud Lyre
description: An exquisite lyre made from condensed cloud fiber.
examine_text: The Cloud Lyre is a breathtaking instrument. Made from pure cloud fiber somehow condensed into a stable form, its strings create a sound that echoes like a soft wind.

name: Ether Bouzouki
description: A bouzouki created from ether, a highly atmospheric and rare material.
examine_text: The Ether Bouzouki is a rarity among rarities. The ether gives it a near-transparent appearance, but when it's played, it resonates with a sound that seems to vibrate the very air around it.

name: Stormshield
description: A mighty shield crafted from a strange, sky-blue metal.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the shield seems to shimmer with energy. Its surface is engraved with beautiful cloud patterns. It is clear the blacksmith has put great skill into making this shield.

name: Cloudwine
description: A bottle of refreshing, crisp wine that smells heavenly.
examine_text: The wine is light and airy, bubbles occasionally traveling to the surface. On the label, there is an image of the city in the clouds.

name: Market Table
description: A sturdy wooden table strewn with goods for sale.
examine_text: The table is laden with all kinds of local produce, artisan breads, cheeses, fruits and other food items. There are a couple of chairs tucked underneath for buyers to sit and make their transactions.

name: Skydrifter Sword
description: A finely crafted sword with a hilt of cloud-shaped silver.
examine_text: The sword is surprisingly light. Its blade is nearly transparent and its grip feels comfortable. You notice intricate carvings on the hilt that look like tiny cloud formations.

name: Winged Tankard
description: A metal tankard with small wings etched along the sides.
examine_text: The winged tankard is made from silver, with delicate wings etched elegantly on its sides. It's heavier than it looks and cold to touch.

name: Winged Darts
description: Sharp darts with tiny wings on them.
examine_text: A set of sharp pointed darts, crafted from steel and feathered with miniature wings. They have a good balance and are incredibly sharp.

name: Angel Ale
description: A heavenly brew served in the Cloud Tavern.
examine_text: An enticing ale with an intoxicating scent and an ethereal, golden glow. It tastes cloud-light and slightly sweet.

name: Grand Chair
description: A mahogany chair at the end of a long table.
examine_text: The chair is massive, made from expensive mahogany. It's very likely used by a person of importance.

name: Long Table
description: A long table that dominates the center of the hall.
examine_text: The table is made out of the same mahogany wood as the chair. It is beautifully cared for and polished.

name: Massive Door
description: The massive main entrance to the grand hall.
examine_text: Astonishingly large and intricately carved with images of the city's history, this door only closes during times of extreme crisis.

name: Dragon Saddle
description: This is a sizeable, black leather saddle with shiny, silver buckles. It's worn out a bit but it looks comfortable enough for a dragon ride.
examine_text: As you scrutinize the saddle more closely, you see the quality in the dense, black leather and well-made, silver buckles. Despite being used frequently, it's been well-maintained. The seat is padded for added comfort, and harnesses are adjustable to fit various dragon sizes.

name: Dragon Feed
description: This is a large bag of ground meat mixed with other dragon-approved goodies. Sealed tightly, it's used to feed the dragons.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, this bag is quite large, stuffed full with a mix of meats, fruits, and other ingredients that dragons are known to enjoy. The scent is odd, a combination of musk and sweet fruit.

name: Joel's Smock
description: A dirty, tattered smock belonging to Joel Delgado, the dragon keeper, hangs on a hook by the door.
examine_text: You notice the various stains of dragon feed, oils, and maybe even a little blood on the worn out fabric. Despite its condition, a faint smell of dragons clings to the garment hinting at many hours spent tending these majestic beasts.

name: Telescope
description: A large, brass telescope pointed out the window.
examine_text: This robust telescope appears to be held together by brass and leather fittings. Its lens is sharp and clear, revealing far-off details with stunning clarity.

name: Map
description: A parchment map full of notes and markings.
examine_text: On closer inspection, you notice this map encompasses the lands beneath the cloud city. It's covered in annotations, coordinates, and markings, presumably for monitoring activity below.

name: Globe
description: An intricate globe mounted on a mahogany stand.
examine_text: The globe is a delicate, intricate model of the world below. Mountains, rivers, and cities are rendered with stunning detail.

name: Trumpet
description: A large, brass trumpet meant for signaling.
examine_text: This ornate trumpet is designed for issuing alerts throughout the cloud city. It has a wide mouth piece and seems to be connected to a series of tubes that lead throughout the city.

name: Dragon Eggs
description: Large, stone-like objects nestled in the hay.
examine_text: These are eggs of different colours representing different species of dragon. They are rough to the touch and almost impossibly hard, with a faint warmth radiating from them.

name: Lab Equipment
description: Various scientific tools and apparatus on the stone table.
examine_text: There are beakers, vials, scales, and probably instruments of wizardy used in hatching and caring for dragon eggs. Some are still bubbling with latent magic.

name: Glowing Jars
description: Blue-glowing jars scattered around the room.
examine_text: Each jar is filled with luminescent crystals that provide both light and heat. You can see arcane symbols scribed on the glass.

name: Stone Table
description: A round stone table standing in the middle of the room.
examine_text: A perfectly circular table made from a single stone. It emanates an old, timeless kind of power.

name: Torch
description: An ever-burning torch fastened to the rocky wall.
examine_text: The torch is fastened securely to the wall. The flame dances wildly, casting eerie shadows on the damp cave walls.

name: Coven Robe
description: A black robe hanging from a stalactite.
examine_text: The robe is make of rough fabric, dyed black. Some sort of emblem is embroidered by hand onto the chest.

name: Fish
description: Small fish swimming in the water nearby.
examine_text: They are small, silvery fish with large eyes and a shimmering tail.

name: Rocky Outcrop
description: A platform of rocks above the water level.
examine_text: The rocky area is broad and flat which provides enough space for people to sit, or a place for items to rest.

name: Paddle
description: A paddle lying on the cave floor.
examine_text: It's a wooden paddle, possibly drifted here from some underground river. It's long and somewhat heavy, making it potentially useful as a weapon or a tool.

name: Mushroom Bed
description: An oddly shaped mushroom that functions as the bat royal family's bed.
examine_text: It's quite large for a mushroom, providing just enough space for the bat king and queen. It's soft and moist to the touch.

name: Bat King Ornament
description: The bat king's regal ornament, shining dimly in the darkness.
examine_text: You see a precious gem held by a thin string. It's so small, yet it carries such majesty. It can be worn.

name: Bat Queen Crown
description: The bat queen's crown, adorned with precious stones.
examine_text: The crown is exquisitely beautiful, studded with different types of stones. It's surprisingly lightweight and wearable.

name: Geode
description: A small, unassuming rock
examine_text: Upon closer observation, it's clear the the rock is actually a Geode. Its exterior is rough and uninteresting, however when you get a glimpse inside of it, you are mystified by a cavalcade of magnificent crystals.

name: Crystals
description: Brightly colored, luminescent stones
examine_text: You examine the crystals more closely. They possess radiant colors that seem to shimmer from within, casting a soft, ethereal glow around the room. Their symmetrical facets shimmer in the pale light, and you are struck by how each crystal is uniquely beautiful.

name: Mystical Lion
description: A majestic, ethereal creature
examine_text: Up close, the lion's appearance is awe-inspiring. It is etched in a constellation of stars which twinkle and swirl on its body. Its eyes burn with an intensity that belies wisdom older than time. It is a sight to behold and fear; a mythical guardian of the chamber.

name: Troll's Club
description: A large, sturdy club made from gnarled wood, crudely crafted with sharp stones embedded in its top.
examine_text: The club is heavy and has a rough, rugged feel. Streaks of dried blood across it tell a tale of savage attacks. The stones embedded at the top are large and jagged, clearly designed to deal devastating blows. There's something almost primal about it, a simple design brutality that chills you to your core.

name: Bones
description: Remains of unlucky spelunkers who ventured into the troll's den, scattered on the cave floor.
examine_text: The bones are of different sizes, many broken and cracked likely from the troll's strong grip. Some bear the marks of gnawing, a grim reminder of the troll's carnivorous diet. There's a sort of sadness about them, a monument to a final, desperate struggle that ended in failure.

name: Rotting Meat
description: Spoiled meat from the troll's previous meals, piled grotesquely near the wall of the cave.
examine_text: The meat is in varying states of decay, ranging from fairly fresh kills to unrecognizable messes of maggots and decomposition. The smell is nauseating - an overpowering stench of rotting flesh. Even a glimpse of such a grotesque sight is enough to make your stomach churn.

name: Stalagmites
description: Large rock formations that emerge from the ground of the cave.
examine_text: These stalagmites, formed over hundreds of years, have a beautiful, albeit eerie quality to them.
