Despite their dangerous appearance, there's something mesmeric about them: the way the light glints off their hard surface, the irregular patterns marking their growth...it's almost enough to make you forget about the surrounding danger.

name: Copper Coins
description: A small handful of gleaming copper coins.
examine_text: These bright, well-worn coppers are coveted by every prisoner wanting escape. The guards who made a living by exploiting the hope bottled in these coins seems to never tire of their shine.

name: Militiaman's Torch
description: A small, used torch formerly owned by a militiaman.
examine_text: This charcoal-black torch has seen better days. Still, even an old friend can light the way in darkness. You imagine the militiaman, holding it high above his head to light the cavernous tunnel, his questionable morals masked by the comforting candlelight.

name: Cave Moss
description: A patch of soft, green cave moss.
examine_text: The soft, green carpet of moss that covers most of the tunnel is cool and damp. It thrives in the shadowy, wet atmosphere of the cave. There's a certain freshness to it - something that calms your nerves in your bid to escape.

name: Alcohol Bottles
description: Empty bottles with the labels torn off.
examine_text: You can see dried out liquid at the bottom and some small insects crawling on it.

name: Colorful Pebble
description: A small stone from the river, it's dyed by the minerals in the water and shiny.
examine_text: Upon closer look, it's both curved and rough, with shiny specks on it.

name: Glowing Gem
description: A slightly luminous gem, embedded in the cave wall.
examine_text: The gem seems to have the ability to capture any light and refract it. It reminds you of a starry night.

name: Forgotten Jacket
description: A jacket forgotten by a teenager, in the corner of the cave.
examine_text: It's a denim jacket, with a school logo on the back. It smells like cigarettes and summer.

name: Ornate Ladder
description: A gold ladder leading into the underground
examine_text: This ladder is carved from gold, the rungs spiraling downward into the darkness of the cave. It seems sturdy enough to hold your weight.

name: Torches
description: Bright torches illuminating the cave
examine_text: The torches flicker and cast shadows on the painted walls. They have a strange blue flame suggesting they are no ordinary fire torches.

name: Rosco Statue
description: A statue of Rosco Monteguy
examine_text: A life-sized statue of Rosco, the famous explorer, in a proud pose, facing the entrance as if guarding the mysterious cave behind him. His excited gaze suggests he's just found something incredible.

name: Wall Paintings
description: Historical paintings on the cave's walls
examine_text: The scenes are painted with vibrant natural pigments and show various historical events, including battles of legendary kings, peaceful kingdom's life, and the history of the cave's discovery. You could learn a lot from these historical paintings, if you took the time.

name: Dimly Lit Torch
description: A flickering torch barely illuminating its surroundings
examine_text: This is a flaming torch. It is almost extinguished, struggling to stay alive in the damp atmosphere of the cave. The torch seems capable of providing barely adequate light for a short time. A faint smell of burning wood hangs in the air around it.

name: Jagged Rock
description: An oddly shaped rock found on the cave floor
examine_text: A large, rough and jagged rock sits on the ground. It appears to have been freshly broken off from the cave wall. Its sharp edges seem capable of inflicting damage if correctly applied.

name: Empty Bottle
description: A bottle, found in one corner of the cave
examine_text: An old, dusty glass bottle lies in a corner of the cave. It appears to be empty, but there's something etched into the side of the glass. Upon closer inspection, it's too dirty to make out what it is.

name: Torch
description: A simple wooden torch that emits a warm, flickering light.
examine_text: This hand-made torch looks like it has been used many times before. Charred at the end and wrapped in a fabric that's doused in a flammable liquid. It lights up the cave around you, painting the walls with ghostly shadows.

name: Skeletal Remains
description: The remains of someone who failed to find their way.
examine_text: These are the skeletal remains of a human, a grim reminder of the perils of the cave. Some of the bones are scattered around, possibly from the activities of cave dwelling creatures.

name: Loose Rock
description: A small rock that appears to be removable from the cave wall.
examine_text: This modest rock, looser than the rest, seems to be removable from the wall. While it might not seem like much, you never know what uses you might find for a good rock in a place like this.

name: Hidden Chest
description: An old wooden chest, hidden away in a corner of the cave.
examine_text: Legend says treasure is hidden in these caves, could this old chest be it? It's wooden, worn, and covered in a layer of dust. A small lock guards the contents.

name: Mushroom Cluster
description: A collection of fungi growing from the cave floor.
examine_text: Growing in the dampness of the cave, a cluster of mushrooms spread out. Some of them are glowing faintly, perhaps a self defense mechanism against the perpetual darkness of the cave environment.

name: Rusty Iron Shackle
description: A rusted chain affixed to a shackle, nailed into the rock wall of the cave.
examine_text: The Iron shackle is rusty and old, it has been used to bound prisoners. The long chain fixed to the shackle leads to a damp stone wall.

name: Rat
description: A small, scurrying rat.
examine_text: This cave rat is quick and nimble, constantly on the move looking for food. It appears used to the darkness and eeriness of the cave.

name: Pile of Bones
description: A small pile of bones lay in a corner.
examine_text: The pile consists of many bones of different sizes, all belonging to small to medium creatures. Many have been picked clean, possibly by the rats.

name: Old Wine Bottle
description: An old wine bottle sitting in a dry, dusty corner of the cave.
examine_text: This is a vintage bottle, left over from the day this cave was a wine cellar. It is now empty, the label is worn out and faded, but still intact.

name: Weapon Rack
description: A large wooden rack filled with various types of weapons
examine_text: A closer look reveals an array of swords, axes, bows and arrows, and daggers. Some of them seem to be of high value, indicating the gang's frequent encounters with royal guards.

name: Bandit Loot
description: A pile of assorted treasures, looted from various raids
examine_text: The pile contains gold coins, jewelry, goblets, armors, and even some royal seals, evidently acquired from noble households.

name: Food Table
description: A long wooden table covered in food and drinks
examine_text: The table is laden with bread, cheese, fruit, meat, and hip flasks, presumably full of some local brew.

name: Ragged Clothes
description: Scruffy and muddied clothes, scattered around the cave
examine_text: These garments are obviously not taken care of and are dirty and torn, a fact that is representative of the bandits' lifestyle.

name: Hanging Moss
description: A growth of moss hanging from the roof of the cave's entrance.
examine_text: The moss hangs creepily from the entrance of the cave, swaying slightly in the breeze. Its colours range from dark green to brown, hinting at its age and endurance. The texture looks a little rough and slimy, typical of natural mosses.

name: Shrubs
description: Green shrubs growing on either side of the entrance
examine_text: The shrubs look strong and bushy. Their leaves are a rich, verdant green, healthy despite the fact that they grow in the absence of sun. The branches twist and turn, making them difficult to traverse unless cleared out.

name: Dirt Path
description: Narrow dirt path that leads to the entrance of the cave
examine_text: The path is hardened from constant use, a dark, coffee colour that leads your eyes straight to the cave. Some patches of green grass manage to push through the solid earth, adding a little life to this somewhat desolate location.

name: Grass
description: Sparse clumps of grass dotting the cave's entrance
examine_text: The grass is a stark contrast to the hardened dirt path, providing a slight softness to this harsh location. Gentle and resilient, the grass grows in clumps, never managing to completely cover the ground.

name: Cave Torch
description: An unlit torch resting against the cavern wall. Looks like it's been here for a while, left by the villagers.
examine_text: The torch is made of a sturdy wood, with a head wrapped in some kind of absorbent material, likely drenched in a flammable substance. It's heavy, well-used but still in good shape.

name: Pool of Water
description: A small, deep blue pool of water. The water in the pool remains still, reflecting the cave walls in its surface.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the pool's water is clean and clear. It seems drinkable. There may be possibilities for fishing here.

name: Cave Stones
description: A pile of large, sharp stones near the cave entrance. Probably used to fortify the entrance in case of an attack.
examine_text: The stones are heavy, with sharp, jagged edges. They would make an improvised but effective weapon should you need it.

name: Dirt Floor
description: The floor of the cave is made from damp, packed dirt. Not comfortable, but could be used as a surface.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the floor is cold to the touch. Small impressions show that this area has seen traffic recently.

name: Rusty sword
description: An old, corroded blade that's seen better days.
examine_text: The sword is old and rusted beyond recognition. Perhaps this was once wielded by a powerful orc, or perhaps it was simply left to rot.

name: Old torch
description: A poorly maintained torch, its flame flickering dimly.
examine_text: The torch is on the brink of going out. It's covered in a thick layer of grime, suggesting it hasn't been cared for in a while.

name: Rock pile
description: A mound of various-sized rocks.
examine_text: The pile is comprised mostly of jagged, small rocks. Some of the rocks have traces of ore. There are traces of old blood stains on a few rocks.

name: Glowing Ruby
description: A large, radiant, red ruby embedded in the cave wall.
examine_text: As you move closer, you can appreciate the perfect cut and incredibly deep, rich red color of this ruby. It glows from within, projecting an almost otherworldly light.

name: Silver Nugget
description: A large nugget of pure silver rests on the cave floor.
examine_text: The nugget is heavy and cold to the touch, with a high shine that catches the flickering candlelight amazingly.

name: Cave Candle
description: A partially-burnt down wax candle providing a small circle of light.
examine_text: This simple candle lights the immediate area, casting shadows on the gleaming minerals around. Wax is slowly melting down its side.

name: Emerald Cluster
description: A cluster of emerald crystals embedded in the cave wall.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the crystals glimmer in the subtle candlelight. Their facets refract the light in such a way that the cave wall appears to be covered in a sheet of flickering green fire.

name: Torch
description: A wooden stick with a flammable end.
examine_text: The torch is made of a sturdy piece of wood as long as an adult’s arm, with one end covered in a dark viscous substance. The torch's end is currently unlit.

name: Precious Mineral
description: A beautiful, shiny mineral embedded in the floor of the cave.
examine_text: The precious minerals sparkle dimly from the floor of the cave. Their colors range from deep blues to bright yellows and reflect any source of light brilliantly.

name: Skeleton
description: The remains of a former adventurer.
examine_text: The skeleton lies eerily on the cave floor, its bony fingers still clutching a rusted sword. The empty eye sockets stare accusingly into the darkness.

name: Rusted Sword
description: A rusted sword next to the skeleton.
examine_text: The sword, though heavily rusted, still feel considerably heavy in your hands. The blade is chipped in several places.

name: Campfire
description: A blazing campfire in the middle of the countryside
examine_text: The campfire glows with an inviting warmth. Around it, scattered stones provide places to sit. The crackling flames dance on the logs, throwing dynamic shadows on the surrounding environment. Soot coats some of the more charred logs, and leftover firewood sits nearby.

name: Traveler's Backpack
description: A sturdy backpack belonging to one of the travelers
examine_text: The backpack is weathered and bears many patches, each likely telling a story of their own. It is plump with necessities, such as dried food, a water bottle, a compass, a map, and even a small first aid kit. There's also a bedroll neatly tied to the bottom.

name: Stick
description: A wooden stick being used for training by the local children
examine_text: The stick is about a meter long, rather straight, and surprisingly sturdy. It appears to have been striped of its bark and treated to avoid any splinters. Its ends are blunt, making it safe for children.

name: Traveler's Coat
description: A heavy woolen coat stowed away by one of the travelers
examine_text: The rugged coat is coated in a layer of dust, but appears to be of high-quality make. It has several deep pockets, a high collar, and sturdy buttons. The inner layer might even be lined with hide for added warmth.

name: Kite
description: A colorful kite lying on the grass.
examine_text: A vibrant colored kite made of thin, lightweight material. It's surprisingly light given its size. It's ideal for windy days, which is perhaps why it's out here in the vast openness of the meadow.

name: Picnic Basket
description: A full picnic basket sitting under a lonesome tree.
examine_text: A wicker picnic basket with intricate pattern weaving. It appears to be filled with a delightful assortment of food and drinks — perfect for a day out in the meadow.

name: Flower
description: A beautiful wildflower growing in the meadow.
examine_text: The flower has beautiful petals - vibrant and full of life, in colours you have never seen before. It's a symbol of the beautiful, untouched nature of this meadow.

name: Baseball Bat
description: An abandoned baseball bat near a makeshift diamond.
examine_text: The baseball bat has seen some rough games. Even with the scars and dents of many a swing, it still feels strong. It's evidence of the kids' passion for the game.

name: Dead Tree
description: A dark, crumbling tree. It's leaves are long gone.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the tree looks like it has been dead for a while. The bark is rough and broken in places.

name: Witch Hat
description: A pointy, black hat often associated with witches.
examine_text: This hat is made of black felt with a wide brim. It's pointy and tall, the cliche hat of witches.

name: Eerie Animal
description: An oddly-shaped, dark creature peeking through the bushes.
examine_text: The creature has large, glinting eyes and sharp teeth. It's fur looks coarse and unkempt.

name: Goblin Club
description: A rudimentary, worn out weapon used by goblins.
examine_text: A crude wooden club, with gnarled handles, and probably used by a goblin. It's quite heavy and blunt.

name: Wooden Table
description: A sturdy, rough-cut wooden table, cluttered with tools and vials.
examine_text: A sizable table made from a mahogany, which obviously has seen countless seasons. An array of items lie scattered on its surface like tools, vials, a dusty grimoire and an ornate silver knife.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A pot hanging above a cold hearth, residues of its last uses can still be seen.
examine_text: A large, circular iron pot, blackened by countless uses. You can distinguish a dried, crusty outer layer that seems to have been food once.

name: Enchanted Amulet
description: A small, green amulet made of jade on the windowsill flickers under the sun.
examine_text: The amulet is surprisingly warm to the touch, vibrating with an unseen power. The jade is smooth and reflects the light in an ethereal glow. Runes are intricately carved into the jade's surface.

name: Chamber Pot
description: A simple chamber pot hides under the wooden bed.
examine_text: A shallow pot made of dull pewter sits in stark contrast to the surrounding items. Blessed with simplicity, it carries out its duty impeccably that is, if it is ever needed.

name: Wooden Table
description: A sturdy, old-fashioned table made of wood.
examine_text: The wooden table is worn but solid, testifying to many years of use. Its surface is full of marks and stains from countless meals and gatherings. Passed down through generations, this table anchors the cottage's primary function as a hub of dining and conversation.

name: Vintage Chair
description: An old, vintage chair with a well-worn cushion.
examine_text: This vintage chair, with its worn-out cushion, tells tales of years gone by. Though it looks timeworn, sitting in it you can feel its comfortable embrace. Sitting on it, you might let your eyes wander over its years of faithful service in the small cottage.

name: Firewood
description: Firewood for the fireplace.
examine_text: The firewood is chopped into regular-sized pieces and stacked neatly in a corner. It's dry, and perfectly suited for feeding the warmth of the fireplace on chilly nights.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A large, old cooking pot.
examine_text: The pot, burnished with age, still shines with a light of its own. It is large enough to prepare hearty meals for groups of people. It carries the mellow scent of countless dishes cooked in it.

name: Candlestick
description: A brass candlestick holder.
examine_text: This brass candlestick holder gives an illusion of antiquity. The golden gleam, slightly tarnished by time, dances and reflects soft, warm light during dinner parties.

name: Broken Wooden Wagon
description: An old wooden wagon, left in ruins
examine_text: The wood, brittle and weathered, has signs of degradation. It's been lying here for a while, shell of a wagon abandoned after probably being attacked by the bandits. Perhaps you might find something useful if you search carefully.

name: Walking Stick
description: A rough cut walking stick
examine_text: A sturdy wooden walking stick that a traveler must have lost. It's slightly taller than your waist and quite sturdy, indicating a natural woodcraft. It might be useful for walking or as a self-defense tool.

name: Apple
description: A ripe apple
examine_text: A juicy red apple, probably fallen from a nearby tree. It looks fresh enough to be eaten.

name: Leather Cuirass
description: A tattered leather cuirass
examine_text: Despite its weathered appearance, this leather cuirass holds a certain rustic charm. It might not be the best protection against a steel blade, but it's better than nothing.

name: Wooden Stick
description: A long and sturdy stick from one of the forest trees.
examine_text: The stick is straight and unbroken, with a slightly rough texture. Small notches and scars on its surface indicate it may have been gnawed on by forest critters.

name: Leaf Pile
description: A pile of fallen leaves, resplendent in their autumnal hues.
examine_text: The leaves are crunchy and dry, and their edges have curled up. Their colors are a splendid mix of red, orange, yellow, and brown. It looks like they’ve served as a bed and hiding place for small insects.

name: Mushrooms
description: A cluster of plump mushrooms sprouting from the base of a tree.
examine_text: The mushrooms are a creamy white with a smooth, shiny surface. They're firm to the touch and their earthy aroma fills the air. It's hard to tell if they're edible without proper knowledge.

name: Berry Bush
description: A bush bearing clusters of wild berries.
examine_text: The berries are small, ripe and delightfully coloured. Their sweet-sour aroma is noticeable from some distance. As tempting as it may seem to a wanderer, it's crucial to identify them correctly before consumption.

name: Cobbled Path
description: A robust and ancient pathway leading to the majestic manor.
examine_text: Years of countless feet pounding upon the path have worn the stones smooth. Some stones bear intricate patterns from an age long past.

name: Guardian Sculptures
description: Two immense statues depicting mythical beasts, stands guard at the entrance of the manor.
examine_text: These beasts are carved from stone and show a level of craftsmanship that is hard to fathom. They exude an aura of majesty and protection.

name: Manor Gardens
description: Small, well-kept gardens flanking both sides of the path.
examine_text: Filled with varying species of vibrant flowers, the gardens bloom with colours. The air is fresh and sweet with their fragrance.

name: Carriage
description: A stately carriage parked in front of the path.
examine_text: The carriage is made of polished dark wood, with wheels and fixtures of pristine brass. Its interior is richly furnished, indicating the wealth and status of its owner.

name: Bristly Pig
description: A big, bulbous pig with bristles like needles sticking out of its round body.
examine_text: This pig is huge, probably the biggest in the pen. Its bristles are sharp and thick. It snorts loudly and wobbles around, looking for more food to eat. Its body is caked in a mix of mud and pig droppings.

name: Farmer Bob's Pitchfork
description: A rustic wrought iron pitchfork.
examine_text: The pitchfork is covered in rust and patches of dried mud. The handle is a hand-hewn from a piece of hardwood, though it shows signs of significant wear. It's dirty but sturdy.

name: Feeding Trough
description: A large wooden trough filled with pig feed.
examine_text: The feeding trough is large, and bolted onto the posts of the pig pen. It's filled with a mixture of corn, oats, and other grains.

name: Pig Slop
description: A bowl containing the leftovers that the pigs are fed.
examine_text: The bowl is filled with a bunch of leftovers, ranging from stale bread to moldy vegetables. A very unappetizing, foul smell emanates from it.

name: Ancient Sword
description: An ancient rusty sword, discarded and forgotten.
examine_text: The sword is rusted over, but chants from the past battles it witnessed still echo around it. You feel a strange chill when you get too close.

name: Mystic Flowers
description: A bunch of blue and white flowers, radiating with a mystical energy.
examine_text: The flowers seem out of this world, each petal carrying a separate aura which shimmers in the daylight. You feel a magnetic pull towards them.

name: Glowing Grass
description: The meadow's grass, glowing with a strange phosphorescent light.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, the grass is warm and carrying light. It hums with an unknown energy.

name: Pot
description: A large cooking pot.
examine_text: A large and sooty pot hangs above the centrally positioned fire. It's iron surface blackened from countless meals prepared over an open flame. It seems sizable enough to prepare a meal for a good number of people.

name: Wooden table
description: A long, solid wooden table
examine_text: Worn yet solid, the wooden table spans majority of the room. It has seen years of meals and has numerous dents and marks to prove it.

name: Hay Bed
description: Rough hay-filled bed for sleeping
examine_text: Filled with hay and covered with a simple cloth, the bed offers a simple yet occasionally prickly place of rest.

name: Chest
description: Wooden chest for storing belongings
examine_text: Carved with simple designs, the wooden chest lies at the end of the bed. The lock seems to be crudely fashioned but effective in its job. It's likely hiding some valuable belongings

name: Picnic Basket
description: A charming, wicker picnic basket with a blue checked cloth.
examine_text: The picnic basket is a classic wicker style, with a blue checked cloth peaking out from under the lid. A small lock secures the contents from nosy critters.

name: Pink Flowers
description: Dazzling, pink wildflowers sway in the gentle breeze.
examine_text: The pink wildflowers, sprawling across the field, bloom vibrantly under the warm sun. Their sweet aroma rides on the breeze, enchanting any passersby.

name: Butterfly Net
description: A lightweight net for catching small creatures.
examine_text: The butterfly net has a long, wooden handle and a deep, carefully woven net at the end, perfect for snagging fluttering butterflies on sunny days.

name: Old Fence
description: An age-worn wooden fence lining the eastern side of the road.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you notice the wood has worn thin and some sections rotting. Inscriptions in an old language are carved into some of the planks, possibly warnings or charms.

name: Dirt Road
description: Well-worn passageway that cuts through the countryside.
examine_text: You feel the crunch of dirt and small pebbles beneath your feet. The road has countless signs of passage: shoe prints of travelers, wheel tracks of merchant carts, and perhaps even the faint trace of an old battle.

name: Merchant Cart
description: Merchant cart filled with goods for trading.
examine_text: The cart is big and sturdy, filled with goods of different kinds: fruits, spices, woven cloths, pottery.

name: Spectral Orb
description: A floating spectral orb, a sign of the spirits that haunt the area.
examine_text: The ghostly orb floats above the ground, casting an eerie glow. Despite its supernatural appearance, it seems benign, perhaps even guiding lost travelers.

name: Riding Crop
description: A tool used to control horses
examine_text: This short, stout crop looks like it was made for a horse jockey. It is made of leather and has a small loop at the end.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large block of dried grass
examine_text: The hay bale is large and smells of summer. It's rough to touch, but animals would find this lush.

name: Horse Trough
description: A container for horse feed or water
examine_text: This long wooden trough is filled with water. It's large enough to accommodate multiple horses.

name: Training Sword
description: A wooden sword used for training
examine_text: This sword is of good length and weight but is clearly only for training. It's tipped with a blunt point.

name: Picnic Blanket
description: A large, plaid patterned picnic blanket spread out on the green turf
examine_text: A well worn and comfortable blanket with a red and black checkered pattern. It's large enough to accommodate a small group of people.

name: Woven Picnic Basket
description: A sturdy, woven picnic basket with a cluster of delicious food inside
examine_text: This picnic basket seems to have been made from cherry wood. It contains variety of food including bread, cheeses, fruits and a bottle of vintage wine.

name: Apple
description: A shiny, red apple is in the picnic basket
examine_text: A bright red apple, freshly picked. So shiny you could almost see your reflection in it.

name: Vintage Wine Bottle
description: A bottle of vintage wine from 1967
examine_text: This wine comes from an old vineyard. The label suggests it was bottled in 1967; it must have been a good year.

name: Washed Wooden Table
description: A sturdy table made from white-washed oak.
examine_text: The table bears the signs of many meals and much activity, with several small scratches and stains marring the otherwise well kept surface. There's a warm, welcoming feel to it.

name: Ceramic Mug
description: A locally crafted ceramic mug.
examine_text: The mug is well used, chipped on the rim but still perfectly functional. There's the slight residue of a drink at the bottom.

name: Sheep Wool Sweater
description: A thick sweater made from the wool of the sheep.
examine_text: The sweater is thick and warm. It's been hand-knit, and you can see the love that went into every stitch.

name: Woven Basket
description: A handmade basket woven with the branches of the oak trees.
examine_text: The basket is large and sturdy. It's been carefully woven, and the branches still retain some of their natural bend.

name: Tall Gate
description: A towering gate made of wood and steel.
examine_text: The gate stands tall and mighty, offering a formidable first line of defense. The edges of the gate are reinforced with steel, making it nearly impossible to breach. It shows signs of weathering, but still holds strong.

name: Watch Tower
description: Stone towers located either side of the gate.
examine_text: The stone towers are packed with gravel and show signs of aging. Iron bars protect the windows, and the towers serve as the watchman's lookout point. You spot a few instruments for signaling.

name: Watchman's Horn
description: A horn used by the watchmen for signaling.
examine_text: A long, brass horn with a flared opening. It's used by the watchmen for signaling any signs of danger. It’s well polished and the light bounces off it.

name: Iron Lantern
description: A lantern hanging by the gate.
examine_text: The lantern is rusty and old. It takes up residence on a hook by the gate, casting a dim light around the area. It looks like it could be removed from its hook.

name: Wire cages
description: Three-tier cages built from wires.
examine_text: Wire cages, stacked in three levels, a well thought design allowing eggs to fall through for easy collection. Each has hay at the bottom for the chickens to sit comfortably.

name: Hay
description: Dry, fluffy, yellow hay.
examine_text: Dry hay, usually found at the bottom of the cages meant for the chickens to nest in. Adds a rustic smell in the air.

name: Chicken eggs
description: Fresh, round chicken eggs.
examine_text: White to pale, brown eggs laid by the resident chickens. A staple for the family's diet and means of income.

name: Old wooden walls
description: Deteriorated wooden walls
examine_text: The pen's wooden walls have seen better days. Weather and age had worn them down, but they still serve their purpose of enclosing the chickens.

name: Old Liquor Bottle
description: An old bottle of liquor, left unattended.
examine_text: An aged bottle of expensive brandy. It appears to have been opened but left mostly full. There are scuff-marks on the base suggesting it's been slid across the table frequently.

name: Leather-bound Book
description: A worn leather-bound book, left open on the table.
examine_text: An intricately decorated book, bound in soft leather. It's well-read and the gold leaf along the edge of the pages have been slightly scratched off from multiple readings. The book is written in archaic language, possibly Latin.

name: Hand-knitted Shawl
description: A delicate, hand-knitted shawl, draped over the back of the couch.
examine_text: The shawl is soft and stitched with precision. It radiates warmth when held, despite being so thin and fine. It is clearly handmade and there's a small tag that reads 'Made by Mommy for Lily'.

name: Large Oak Table
description: A large oak table that dominates the room.
examine_text: A grand table made from a single piece of oak, polished to a high shine. It provides an imposing presence in the room, decorated ominously with numerous nicks and scratches indicating the many years of dinners and discussions it has borne witness to.

name: Old wooden barrel
description: An old weathered wooden barrel looks like it has been here for a while.
examine_text: Looking closer, you can see the barrel is made of oak. To your surprise, it is also half filled with murky water.

name: Fisherman's net
description: A discarded fisherman's net lying by the side of the dock.
examine_text: The net seems neglected and abandoned but still appears sturdy and functional. It's made of durable hemp ropes and intertwined with floats and weights.

name: Bottle of rum
description: A bottle of high-quality rum left on a wooden table.
examine_text: The bottle is half-full and still sealed. The vintage-looking label claims it to be an exotic rum brewed in a distant island.

name: Seagull
description: A fearless seagull is perched on a dock post, eyeing you suspiciously.
examine_text: Upon closer look, this opportunistic bird looks well-fed and healthy. It seems to be accustomed to humans and waits patiently for scraps of food.

name: Sailor's Hat
description: A pure white sailor's hat lays discarded on the dock.
examine_text: The hat is a bit worn, but still seems to be in good shape. It has the name 'Captain R. Jones' inscribed on the inside.

name: Old Fishing Net
description: A weather-beaten fishing net with traces of sea salt and algae.
examine_text: Upon a closer look, you can see the faded color and fraying threads of the old fishing net. It has seen better days, worn by countless fishing trips and seasoned by the relentless ocean winds.

name: Sailor's Hat
description: A sturdy, white sailor hat with blue rimming.
examine_text: Gazing at the sailor's hat, you can feel the culture behind it. There are salt stains and a clear sign of sun fading on it. The fabric is thick and made to last in the harsh marine environment.

name: Fresh Fish
description: A recently caught and cleaned fish, ready for cooking.
examine_text: Examining the fish, it's glistening and healthy, with eyes clear and bulging. The scent is relatively mild and the flesh firm, clear signs it was recently caught and cleaned.

name: Fishing Rod
description: A long, flexible rod used for fishing.
examine_text: As you examine the fishing rod, you can see the well-worn handle from years of use. The line seems sturdy and the hook sharp enough to snag any fish.

name: Shipping Crate
description: A large wooden crate used for shipping goods.
examine_text: Taking a closer look at the shipping crate, you can see the tough wooden panels and hefty iron clasps that hold it together. The crate is filled with an assortment of goods, ready for transport.

name: Crates
description: Wooden crates stacked haphazardly.
examine_text: The crates, weathered and beaten, hold an array of goods. You can see some marked with symbols and labels in different languages, revealing their diverse origins.

name: Hook
description: A large iron hook used for lifting heavy cargo.
examine_text: The hook is big and heavy with a sharp point, it's chunky chain links attached to a large pulley system.

name: Barrel
description: Large wooden barrel.
examine_text: This barrel looks like it has been there for a while. It's wooden slates are beginning to warp, and it's tightly secured with rusty iron bands.

name: Pirate Hat
description: A distinctive, triangular hat.
examine_text: The hat, made of worn leather and adorned with faded gold braiding, has seen better days. The feather that was probably once grand now looks bedraggled.

name: Sack of Grain
description: A heavy sack filled with grain.
examine_text: The sack, made of rough, brown burlap, is full to the brim with golden grains. It's tied tightly with a piece of old, frayed rope.

name: Fish Box
description: A sturdy wooden box filled with ice and fresh fishes.
examine_text: This is a solidly built wooden box. It's half filled with small iceberg like pieces of ice and below that, a variety of freshly caught fishes, some still flapping.

name: Fisherman's Net
description: A strong net with rope handles, used by fishermen to catch fish.
examine_text: This is a large meshed net with sturdy rope handles. You see bits of seaweed caught in it and some shiny fish scales reflecting the sun.

name: Fisherman's Hat
description: A broad-brimmed hat, typically worn by fishermen to protect them from the sun.
examine_text: This hat is made of canvas and has a wide brim to keep the sun off the face. Its well worn, with salt stains and a few fish scales stuck to it.

name: Seashells
description: Various types of seashells scattered on the ground.
examine_text: There are dozens of different types of seashells scattered across the ground. Some are small and delicate, while others are large and rough.

name: Bottle of Water
description: A clear plastic bottle full of water.
examine_text: It's a clear, plastic water bottle. It's sweating a little from the heat, but the water inside looks refreshingly cool.

name: Wooden Cranes
description: Massive wooden cranes used for lifting heavy objects.
examine_text: These enormous wooden cranes tower above you, their gears and ropes looking old yet sturdy. They're used for lifting the massive beams of wood that go into constructing the royal ships.

name: Stone Dry Docks
description: Immense stone structures where ships are built and repaired.
examine_text: The dry docks are magnificent structures, each one carved from stone and filled with equipment and partially constructed ships. This is where the kingdom's marine arts come to life.

name: Hardened Wood Water Gate
description: A large gate made of hardened wood that controls the water entry and exit.
examine_text: The water gate is a massive wooden barrier designed to control the water level in the dry docks. It's made of hardened wood, and you can see the grooves and marks left by countless tide cycles.

name: Shipwrights Tools
description: Assorted tools used by the royal shipwrights
examine_text: Clutters of hammers, chisels, adzes, saws, and drills, all made with stunning craftsmanship. These tools are used by the skilled shipwrights to create the finest ships in the kingdom.

name: Old Wooden Crate
description: A weathered wooden crate. It appears to have been here for some time.
examine_text: This crate is considerably damaged by the environmental elements. The wood is rotting, and you can see faded letters. You notice it is sealed with an ancient seal.

name: Guard's Shield
description: The shiny shield of the sorceress' guard. It appears to be robust and heavy.
examine_text: It's an impressively sturdy piece of work with its metallic surface gleaming. There's a symbol engraved on it - probably a symbol of the sorceress.

name: Mysterious Parcel
description: A small, unopened parcel. It's bound tightly with twine.
examine_text: This package is not big, but it's very intriguing. Dark, thick paper is slightly shiny. It's incredibly neat, and the edges are sealed securely.

name: Baskets of Fish
description: A variety of freshly-caught fish, glistening in the heat.
examine_text: The fish have been tossed unceremoniously into well-worn wicker baskets. Their scales glint in the sunlight, and their dead eyes stare unfocused at passersby. Despite the heat, the fish smell fresh and salty, a testament to their recent arrival from the sea.

name: Wooden Troughs of Water
description: Sturdy wooden troughs filled with clear sea water, in which various seafood creatures are kept alive.
examine_text: The troughs are crafted from solid oak wood, weathered and stained by salt and time. Inside, water sloshes gently with the movement of the living creatures, refracting the sunlight into bright flashes. Several crabs and bivalves scuttle across the sandy bottom, while eels lurk in shadowy corners.

name: Aggressive-Looking Dog
description: A wiry, scrappy dog, chained to a table leg and looking for all the world like he would like to bite the nearest hand.
examine_text: The dog’s coat is a ragged blend of gray and brown, its fur missing in places from a life of hard living. Despite his small size, his eyes are defiant, and he bears his teeth at anyone who comes too close. He has a bristled tail which he holds erect, a clear sign of his unfriendly intentions.

name: Pint of Ale
description: A frothy pint of local ale, served in a weathered glass mug.
examine_text: A first glance at a pint of ale would reveal a dark amber color brew with light, effervescent foam bubbling at the top. The glass mug looks faded and weary, having been filled and emptied more times than anyone could count. A faint aroma of hops wafts up from the liquid.

name: Life Buoy
description: A circular life preserver, typically bright orange or red in color.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice that the life buoy is slightly deflated and frayed around the edges. Despite its worn appearance, the buoy is still a vivid color which would contrast sharply against the water.

name: Old Fishing Rod
description: An old, weathered fishing rod that looks like it has seen better days.
examine_text: Upon carefully examining the fishing rod, you notice its wooden handle is heavily worn and smoothed by countless hands. The reel mechanism is stiff and creaky but still functional. Despite its age, the line still has strength and the hook seems sharp.

name: Oak Bar Table
description: A sturdy, weathered oak bar table stained with countless beer rings.
examine_text: Looking closely at the table, you see the grain of the wood worn smooth from years of use and abuse. The oak bar table is filled with etchings, burn marks, and countless beer rings - each telling a different story.

name: Old Rope
description: A worn out rope lying on the dock
examine_text: The rope is frayed and stained but is still sturdy. There are signs of saltwater damage and its original color is barely recognizable.

name: Wooden Crate
description: A wooden crate is sitting near one of the buildings.
examine_text: The crate is well-constructed and sturdily shut. It's clearly been used for transporting some sort of goods.

name: Fisherman's Hat
description: An old, weather-beaten fisherman's hat has been left on a bench.
examine_text: The hat is faded to a pale shade of its original color. There's a hook stuck on the brim, presumably for holding fishing bait.

name: Broken Bottle
description: Pieces of a broken bottle lie scattered on the dock.
examine_text: The bottle must have shattered on impact, leaving a sharp and potentially dangerous mess.

name: Torn Sail
description: A sail is lying on the dock, ripped and tattered
examine_text: The sail is torn beyond repair. It looks like it's seen many storms and has become threadbare from intense usage.

name: Ferry Ticket
description: A small and thin piece of paper indicating passage on the ferry.
examine_text: On closer examination, the paper is durable and water-resistant, with journey details and bar-coding.

name: Traveler's Backpack
description: A traveler's backpack sits forgotten on a bench.
examine_text: The backpack, although worn and dirty, is clearly made of sturdy material. It's bulging with goods and equipment needed for long journeys.

name: Lunchbox
description: A bright red lunchbox left sitting on a seat.
examine_text: The lunchbox is plastic, with various food items visible through its transparent lid. The contents appear fresh.

name: Bench
description: A long wooden bench where travelers wait for their ferries.
examine_text: The bench is well polished with a few scratches and carvings. It looks sturdy enough to sit on.

name: Old Newspaper
description: An old newspaper discarded on the floor.
examine_text: The newspaper is dated a few days back. It contains news from across the land.

name: Fishing Pole
description: A sturdy fishing pole with a simple manual reel.
examine_text: This fishing pole is well worn, indicating it's been used for a considerable amount of time. The grip is wrapped in worn leather and the hook is sharp.

name: Wooden Bucket
description: An old wooden bucket filled with dirt and bait.
examine_text: On closer inspection, you can see the bucket is filled with earth and crawling with live worms - perfect bait for fishing.

name: Mounted Trophies
description: Stunning trophies of large fishes, displayed with pride
examine_text: These trophies are impressive to behold. The mounts hold various types of fish, frozen in a moment of victory.

name: Fisherman Tales
description: A collection of outrageous and fascinating stories exchanged by fisherman.
examine_text: As you listen to the tales, you're struck by the wild imagination of seafarers; stories of vicious battles with sea monsters, mermaids serenading sailors, and hidden treasures at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Spices
description: Small bags of fragrant spices.
examine_text: Each bag contains spices imported from various corners of the world. Each spice has a unique scent and color, ranging from the vibrant red of cayenne pepper to the muted brown of cinnamon.

name: Tapestries
description: Vividly colored tapestries with intricate designs.
examine_text: The tapestries depict various scenes, such as ships sailing the open seas and mythical creatures battling brave heroes. They are carefully woven from delicate threads, and display a wide palette of vibrant colors.

name: Blacksmith tools
description: An assortment of blacksmithing tools
examine_text: The tools on display are well-crafted and sturdy, from hammers and tongs to a variety of chisels. Each tool is black from use but still strong, ready to beat metal into all forms of useful merchandise.

name: Merchant clothes
description: Colorful attire typical of a merchant.
examine_text: The clothes, while not overly luxurious, are richly colored and well-kept. It is a mix of vest and breeches, topped with a wide-brimmed hat, the wear of it indicates a merchant of some successful business.

name: Old Barrel
description: A large weathered barrel stands in the corner.
examine_text: The wooden staves of the barrel are darkened by years of moisture and salt, with few barnacles clinging on. It smells faintly of vinegar and ale.

name: Rusty Cutlass
description: An old rusty cutlass hangs on the wall.
examine_text: A single edge curved sword with a pitted and rust-covered blade. The hilt is tarnished brass, wrapped in frayed and discolored leather. Someone clearly hasn't cared for this weapon.

name: Worn-out Stool
description: A stool that's seen better days sits porously by the counter.
examine_text: The stool's dented cushion and scratched wooden legs tell a story of countless patrons who've shared stories and drinks upon it.

name: Bartender's Apron
description: An apron is hung behind the counter.
examine_text: A leather apron, well-worn and dirty with layers of spilled drinks and food. A few pockets are notable, presumably for extra tips, corks, or small tools.

name: Unmarked Bottle
description: A strange unlabeled bottle sitting on a shelf.
examine_text: A glass bottle, filled with a clear liquid. It doesn't advertise what's inside, leaving you to wonder if it's worth a gamble.

name: Wooden Barrel
description: A large wooden barrel stands near the entrance.
examine_text: The barrel is sleek and polished with metal braces, well constructed and sturdy. The smell of aged wood and the sea fills your senses.

name: Nautical Map
description: A nautical map hangs on the wall behind the counter.
examine_text: A detailed chart, filled with sketches of various coastlines and dotted with extensive notation. It's been well handled and even better loved. The smell of old parchment mixes with the rich aroma of ink.

name: Oil Lamp
description: An antique oil lamp flickers on the front counter.
examine_text: The lamp, carefully crafted of brass, gives off a warm, gentle light. It's half filled with oil, the hint of kerosene barely noticeable.

name: Sailor's Knife
description: There's a sailor's knife displayed in a glass case.
examine_text: The knife has a slightly curved blade honed to a sharp edge. Its handle is carved from whale bone with intricate designs. A true sailor's tool.

name: Fisherman's Net
description: A fisherman's net hangs against the wall with other fishing supplies.
examine_text: The net is large, woven from thick rope. Its knots are tight and its weave is strong, perfect for catching fish.

name: Cannon
description: A menacing, black cannon.
examine_text: This black cannon is mounted on the side of the pirate ship. You can see its massive bore, awaiting a deadly cannonball. It looks heavily used, with dark residue coating the insides.

name: Pirate Hat
description: A hat studded with jewels and gold.
examine_text: This Pirate Hat is quite flashy, with gold brims and a big, white feather stuck in it. It is studded with assorted precious gems and a skull and crossbones emblem fills you with dread.

name: Treasure Chest
description: An old, wooden chest filled with riches.
examine_text: This old chest, battered by time and sea, is overflowing with gold coins, opulent jewelry, and precious gems. It's locked with a hefty metallic lock.

name: Bottle of Rum
description: A bottle filled with intoxicating rum.
examine_text: The bottle exudes a soothing aroma that reminds you of spices and caramel. It is filled with a dark, molasses-colored liquid that has a strong, captivating pull.

name: Pirate Parrot
description: A colorful parrot, possibly the captain’s pet.
examine_text: This is a color riot, with bright red and green feathers, a pointed orange beak, and observant round eyes. The parrot, says 'Arr', squawks loudly, and fluffs up its feathers.

name: Fishing Net
description: A hefty fishing net with thick, tangled ropes.
examine_text: An ordinary but heavy-duty fishing net, it shows signs of regular use. Fish scales are stuck to the rope and it has a distinct, sea-like smell. It's well-knotted and sturdy.

name: Crate
description: A large, wooden crate marked with mysterious symbols.
examine_text: The crate is crudely made, with raw wooden planks haphazardly nailed together. Despite its shabby appearance, it seems to be very strong. The symbols on the surface are foreign and enigmatic.

name: Old Bottle
description: An old bottle, seems to contain some sort of liquid.
examine_text: An ancient-looking blue glass bottle sealed with a worn-out cork. The liquid inside has a murky brown color, and it smells strongly of alcohol.

name: Sea Shell
description: A small, colorful seashell with intricate patterns.
examine_text: This seashell is a rainbow of colors, and it's remarkably smooth to the touch. Its patterns are intricate and they seem to shift as you move the shell under the light.

name: Bunk
description: A cramped, uncomfortable sleeping area.
examine_text: Several rough bunks stacked upon one another, each filled with straw and worn, grimy blankets.

name: Rum Bottle
description: A half-empty bottle of pirate's rum.
examine_text: A glass bottle filled with a dark, amber liquid. The aroma is strong and hints of notes of spice and molasses.

name: Cutlass
description: A worn pirate's cutlass.
examine_text: A long, curved blade with a single edge. Despite its rough appearance, the blade is sharp and rustic. The hilt is wrapped with hardened leather.

name: Dirty Clothes
description: A pile of dirty pirate's clothes.
examine_text: These clothes have seen better days. They are stained with sweat, blood, and grime from countless battles and journeys.

name: Crates
description: Large wooden crates filled with various goods.
examine_text: Crates of sturdy hardwood construction, bearing various different markings and crests denoting their wares and points of origin. Some appear heavy and packed tightly with commodities from distant lands.

name: Warehouse Manager's Ledger
description: A hefty ledger containing records of all transactions and stock.
examine_text: This hefty book is filled with pages of hastily scrawled notes and figures, tracking the contents of the warehouse and the transactions made. The lines under the rum section looks significantly more frayed and marked out than the others.

name: Barrels of Rum
description: Large barrels filled with the finest rum.
examine_text: These massive barrels are made with strong oak, bound by iron hoops. An aromatic smell of strong rum wafts from the bungs. The barrels are marked by intricate carvings, indicating the high quality of the liquid inside.

name: Warehousing tools
description: Tools used for handling goods, including hooks and robust leather gloves.
examine_text: These are standard tools of the trade for a warehouse worker. The gloves are worn but well-maintained, suggesting frequent use. The hooks are sharp and strong, suited to lifting heavy loads.

name: Ship's Wheel
description: A large, well-worn ship's wheel used to steer the galleon.
examine_text: The wheel is large and intimidating, clearly showing signs of age and heavy use. The Redwood wood of which it's made from is polished smooth from years of hands gripping and turning it. It's firmly connected to the bulky steering mechanism below deck.

name: Cannon
description: A large, ominous-looking naval cannon.
examine_text: This black iron cannon is securely fixed to the deck. It's exceedingly heavy and it's obvious that it has been used recently. The cannonball and powder are stored separately, to prevent accidental firing.

name: Rum Barrel
description: A robust barrel filled with rum.
examine_text: The barrel is made from solid oak, sturdily built and designed for transport. The pirate's favorite, rum, sloshes around inside. The smell permeating from the barrel is unmistakably that of spiced rum.

name: Ship's Anchor
description: A heavy, rusted ship's anchor.
examine_text: This anchor is of immense size and heavily encrusted with rust. Though tarnished by the elements, it remains exceedingly sturdy and reliable. It's attached to a thick chain, leading deep into the ship's hull.

name: Old Fishing Net
description: An abandoned net, filled with old fish.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the net seems to have been left for ages. Caught in its web are a few dried up and rotten fish.

name: Pirate's Dagger
description: A small, sharp blade, belonging to a rugged pirate.
examine_text: The hilt of the dagger is decorated with intricate motifs, clearly indicating that it belongs to a pirate of high rank. The blade, although small, looks sharp and deadly.

name: Lantern
description: A rustic lantern that appears to be still burning with a gentle glow.
examine_text: The lantern is hanging from a wooden post, its light flickering gently in the gusts of sea breeze. It looks old yet seems to be well-maintained.

name: Barrel of Rum
description: A barrel full of rum, left unattended.
examine_text: The smell of rum is strong around you and the barrel is bound together with rusty iron rings. It looks like it was left by pirates.

name: Tattered Scarf
description: A ripped scarf, blowing in the breeze.
examine_text: A colourful piece of cloth, torn at both ends, is fluttering in the sea breeze. Possibly a lost item, it has probably seen better days.

name: Desk
description: A worn, mahogany desk, covered with papers and old dusty maps.
examine_text: The desk has seen its fair share of use. Deep grooves mark the places where the captain has struck it in his frustration. Among the clutter, you see a compass, yesterday’s half-eaten lunch, and bottles of rum.

name: Map
description: A pirates' treasure map with cryptic instructions and X marks.
examine_text: It's a worn and faded map with various notes jotted around. You can see multiple X's scattered across the paper, evidently signifying potential treasure locations.

name: Bottle of Rum
description: A half-filled bottle of aged pirate's rum.
examine_text: The rum is the color of amber, and its strong scent fills your nostrils as you take a closer look. A label on the bottle indicates it's been aged for decades.

name: Unmade Bed
description: A messy, unmade bed.
examine_text: The captain's bed looks as weary as the man himself. The sheets are crumpled and askew, the pillow flattened from countless sleepless nights.

name: Old Wood Plank
description: A piece of wood repurposed from a ship's wreckage. Now, it forms part of the port's extensive quay.
examine_text: This old, rugged plank is surprisingly sturdy despite years of tormented weather and harsh sea breeze. Scratches, dents and hints of mossy green patches are a testament to its age and history. It might not look like much, but the planks hold a piece of maritime history.

name: Barrel
description: An aged wooden barrel, heavily grooved and secured with reinforced iron rings.
examine_text: The barrel looks like a sturdy wooden keg, constructed with bands and staves. It has a distinctive smell of seaweed and timber. On closer inspection, one might notice it reeks of rum or other exotic substances it was once used to carry.

name: Coil of Rope
description: A utilitarian coil of rough hemp rope, stiff from salt saturation.
examine_text: This is a thick, harsh, fibers twisted into a massive coil. Its texture feels undeniably rough, stiffened by countless absorbing and drying cycles of the salty sea water. Untying it reveals its length, enough to moor even the largest of vessels.

name: Rat
description: A large, scurrying rat with a gnawed tail and beady eyes.
examine_text: The rat is oversized, possibly due to abundant food from the docking ships. With gnawed tail, sharp claws, twitching whiskers, and beady eyes that reflect the fear of a hunted creature, this rat is a testament to the unsanitary conditions of the port.

name: Old Journals
description: A stack of old, dusty journals
examine_text: The pages of these journals are worn and yellowed, filled with the handwritten notes of the home's previous owner. Flipping through the journal, you discover it chronicles the disturbing activities the owner partook in, within this haunted basement - including acts of violence against his wife.

name: Old Mirror
description: A cracked mirror, a relic from a forgotten time
examine_text: Looking into this cracked mirror, you can see your reflection, but with a cold, spectral woman standing behind you. Barely visible tears stream down her face, as she looks forlornly back at you.

name: Old Crate
description: An old wooden crate, sealed tight and covered in immemorial dust
examine_text: This old crate is sealed and covered in dust. The wood has slightly rotten and is infested with bugs. There seems to be something inside, although what that could be is a mystery.

name: Moldy Bread
description: A piece of bread covered in green-blue mold
examine_text: This bread slice is completely encrusted with green-blue mold. Eating this would almost certainly have dire consequences.

name: Star Shard
description: A shard of a dead star, glowing with a hauntingly beautiful aura.
examine_text: The shard pulses with energy, the remnant of a celestial body now long gone. It emits a soft light, illuminating the astral surroundings. Its surface is smooth and yet infinitely complex, radiating with a silent promise of ancient secrets

name: Void Cloak
description: A cloak woven from threads of pure nothingness, almost invisible to the naked eye.
examine_text: As you look closer at the cloak, it almost appears as if it's made from the void itself. It's surface shifts and moves like an erratic liquid, only barely acknowledging the rules of the physical world

name: Aether Flask
description: A small flask filled with a luminescent liquid, the very essence of the astral plane itself.
examine_text: The liquid inside the flask glows with an ethereal light. It swirls around, changing colours and creating mesmerising patterns. To the touch, it feels colder than the coldest ice and yet warmer than the hottest fire.

name: Spectral Orb
description: An orb that captures the essence of spectral beings in the astral plane.
examine_text: Eyeing the orb, one can see ghostly figures swirling within, trapped but seemingly at peace. The spectral light generated by the orb casts an eerie glow around. Every now and then, a face might emerge, looking outwards, before retreating back into the orb.

name: Ancient Spell Book
description: An old, worn-out spell book with strange inscriptions.
examine_text: The book feels otherworldly. Its pages appear to be torn and yellowed from age, but the text written in an ancient, indecipherable language glows softly with ever changing colors.

name: Wizard's Staff
description: A beautifully crafted wooden staff imbedded with precious stones.
examine_text: The staff is tall and quite heavy. The wood is dark, carved with intricate symbols, and holds a large shining crystal at the top.

name: King's Crown
description: The golden crown that once belonged to a mighty king.
examine_text: The crown is made of pure gold, adorned with large sparkling diamonds. The inside has a soft velvet lining, indicating its luxurious origin.

name: Shattered Mirror
description: A large, cracked mirror with an ornate silver frame.
examine_text: Bits of mirror glass are scattered on the floor. The reflection shows broken images, distorting the environment around you.

name: Ancient Stone Tablet
description: An old, weathered stone tablet covered in mysterious symbols.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, the symbols on the stone appear to be an ancient language, depicting tales of historical events and astronomic phenomena.

name: Druid's Cloak
description: A cloak worn by the ancient druids. It's made from coarse, sturdy fabric and is adorned with mystical symbols.
examine_text: The cloak feels thick and heavy. The embroidered symbols seem to pulse with an otherworldly energy.

name: Chalice of Rituals
description: A golden chalice used in mysterious druidic rituals.
examine_text: The chalice is exquisite. It is decorated with intricate designs of deer and trees. It glows with an eerie light.

name: Uncomfortable Bed
description: A small, dreary looking bed with sparse bedding.
examine_text: The bed is made of rough hewn wood with a lumpy straw mattress. There is a grey blanket and a small, flat pillow. It looks most uncomfortable.

name: Small Table
description: A crudely made wooden table.
examine_text: This small table has been worn from years of use, with many scratches and marks on its surface. A single, flickering candle sits on top.

name: Candle
description: An old, slightly melted candle.
examine_text: The wick of the candle has been burned down to a small point, but it still gives off a soft flickering light. You can smell the faint scent of Elderberries.

name: Illustrated Book
description: A book filled with sketches of strange symbols and writings.
examine_text: The book is filled with sketches of symbols that you don't recognize. Some pages have handwritten notes that appear to be written in a language that you can't understand.

name: Stool
description: A simple wooden stool.
examine_text: This is a plain wooden stool, worn from years of use. Though it doesn't look like the most comfortable seat, it appears sturdy.

name: Baby's Blanket
description: An aged, worn-out piece of fabric.
examine_text: The fabric is a faded blue color, worn thin from age. It appears to be a child's blanket, made from a material that was once soft. There are ancient symbols embroidered into one corner, their exact meaning lost to time.

name: Woodland Spirit Offering
description: A small pile of sticks, flowers, and hand-made crafts.
examine_text: A collection of everything abundant in the forest - sticks and stones, petals from wildflowers, berries, and intricately folded pieces of tree bark. They have been carefully chosen and placed, as if arranged by a loving hand.

name: Ancient Tree Bark
description: A piece of bark from the ancient tree.
examine_text: A dry, cracked piece of bark that looks incredibly old. It fell from the ancient, massive tree that houses the Goddess Hollow and may have properties beyond the mundane.

name: Old Lantern
description: An old, rusted lantern hangs from the post of the bridge.
examine_text: A century-old lantern that's been weathered by countless storms. Despite its age, a low flicker of otherworldly light still pulses from within. It might have some supernatural properties.

name: Ancient Sword
description: An ancient, rusty sword is stuck on the ground near the bridge.
examine_text: A rust-eaten and forgotten weapon of war. Despite the corrosion, it vibrates with an uncanny power, suggesting it was once blessed or cursed.

name: Torn Military Coat
description: A tattered military coat lies draped over the bridge's railing.
examine_text: A tattered and old military coat, likely belonging to one of the long-forgotten soldiers. As you touch it, cold shivers run down your spine.

name: Iron Shield
description: A small, round shield made of iron.
examine_text: The circular shield has a bright iron hue. It is scruffy from many battles, with scratches and dents peppering its surface.

name: Sword
description: A long, sharp sword made from hardened steel.
examine_text: The sword is strong and sharp, with a gleaming steel blade. It's sure to be effective in a combat.

name: Knight's Crest
description: A decorated crest of a famous knight.
examine_text: The crest is ornately designed and wrought with intricate details, depicting a lion and a dragon in combat. It is affixed to a wooden board.

name: Wine Flask
description: A flask filled with sweet red wine.
examine_text: The flask is made out of metal and adorned with crests, its body curved to fit comfortably in a hand. The thick aroma of wine wafts from its spout.

name: Weapon Rack
description: A wooden rack holding various weaponry.
examine_text: The weapon rack is lined with a wide range of weapons, from broadswords to maces. It's sturdily built and is kept in a pristine condition.

name: Glowing Leaves
description: Leaves with an unusual glow.
examine_text: They seem to be lit from within, providing an otherworldly illumination to the surroundings.

name: Mirror-Like Pool
description: A pool with a highly reflective and unnaturally calm surface.
examine_text: The water is incredibly still. When you look into it, you feel a strange sense of seeing not just your own reflection but glimpses of potential futures.

name: Melodious Wind
description: A breeze that seems to carry a ghostly lilt.
examine_text: It's not just a wind but seems to carry fragments of melody. It sounds strangely familiar, though played not quite right.

name: Silver Tree Bark
description: The bark of the glowing trees.
examine_text: The bark is shiny and metallic in color, almost as if it's made of pure silver.

name: Elaborate Broach
description: An ornate broach laying on the path.
examine_text: The broach is made from gold and intricately designed with small gemstones of various colors. There's a small, beautifully cut emerald at its center. It seems like someone important has lost it.

name: Basket of Apples
description: A basket filled with fresh apples on the ground near the apple tree.
examine_text: The basket is brimming with freshly picked apples that are perfectly ripe. Their inviting aroma wafts through the air, and their shiny red skins reflect the sunlight.

name: Garden Bench
description: A wooden bench nestled amongst the roses.
examine_text: The bench is made of solid oak, with carvings of vines and flowers along its back. It has been weathered by the elements but is still in good condition. It's a peaceful spot to sit and enjoy the garden.

name: Fishing Pole
description: A fishing pole leans against the edge of the pond.
examine_text: A sturdy bamboo fishing pole with a thin, strong line and a hook at the end. It's perfect for catching fish in the pond.

name: Bookshelf
description: A large, wooden shelf teetering with a multitude of various books.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the books range in a variety of subjects, from law to alchemy. Some are old and worn while others appear to have been recently bound.

name: Quill Pen
description: A beautifully crafted pen made from a feather.
examine_text: The feather appears to be from a black bird. The end is pointed, perfect for dipping in ink, while the other end fluffs out into a beautiful feather display.

name: Inkwell
description: A tiny, decorative pot filled with black ink.
examine_text: This small pot is filled with a rich black ink, probably used for writing. The exterior is finely engraved with intricate designs.

name: Parchment Sheets
description: Several blank parchment sheets.
examine_text: These parchments are a faded beige color and seem to be crudely cut out rectangles from a larger sheet. Some appear more weathered than others.

name: Golden Cross
description: A golden cross, adorned with precious jewels.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you realize that the Golden Cross is infused with different type of jewels representing each god. It radiates a soft, soothing light.

name: Red Carpet
description: An elegant red carpet that stretches the length of the chapel.
examine_text: The carpet is plush and soft, with intricately woven patterns. It has faded slightly with time, but barely showing any signs of wear.

name: Sculptures
description: A set of eight sculptures, each representing a different god.
examine_text: The sculptures are surprisingly lifelike, with tiny details picked out in sparkling jewels. Each face is different and perfectly preserved.

name: Prayer Book
description: A thick, bound book of prayers and rituals.
examine_text: The Prayer Book is old and weathered. The pages are filled with handwritten notes, prayers, and rituals in different handwritings, generations of people have penned down their prayers.

name: Mounted Lion Head
description: A large lion's head, frozen in a roar, mounted on the wall.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the beast's eyes seem to stare back at you, reflecting a spark of life that was extinguished long ago. The teeth remain sharp and imposing, a reminder of the power this king of the jungle once held.

name: Ivory Floor
description: A smooth polished floor, gleaming white like ivory.
examine_text: Looking closer, the floor shines in the light, reflecting your visage back at you. It's cold underfoot and slippery, as though worn smooth by generations of shoes.

name: Mural Ceiling
description: A grand mural painted on the ceiling, depicting the Duke's conquests.
examine_text: Lifting your gaze to the ceiling, colourful scenes of battle and triumph come to life, all leading to a central figure - the Duke - resplendent in armor. There is an undercurrent of menace in the portrayed scenes, an outline of a story best left untold.

name: Antique Weaponry
description: Ancient weapons, presumably from the Duke's ancestors, hung carefully on the walls.
examine_text: Upon examination, the weapons are well maintained despite their age. Edges still sharp, hilts tightly bound in leather. They carry tales of victory and defeat, depthless history in each piece.

name: Golden toilet
description: A toilet made of the finest porcelain, decorated with gold studs.
examine_text: The toilet is made of white porcelain elaborately decorated with golden studs. It looks incredibly extravagant for a toilet.

name: Luxurious bathtub
description: A bathtub large enough to fit several people.
examine_text: The bathtub is huge, it could easily fit four average-sized adults side by side. It's made from a shiney white marble stone with golden faucet handles.

name: Flower potpourri
description: A pot filled with a mix of dried, naturally fragrant plant materials.
examine_text: You see a small clay pot filled with a mix of dried flowers and leaves. It is giving off a sweet fragrance that fills the entire room.

name: Ancient Sword
description: A rusted, but intricately decorated sword.
examine_text: The sword, while rusted and decades old, still holds an eerie aura of power. The handle is studded with ancient gems, and there's a royal crest carved intricately onto the blade.

name: Royal Crypt
description: One of the countless crypts in the basement.
examine_text: The crypt is decorated with faded carvings and engravings. It's locked tight, and a palpable chill seems to emanate from it.

name: Wall Torch
description: A torch mounted to the wall.
examine_text: The torch is old but well maintained. It provides a meager but steady light, casting flickering shadows on the crypt walls. It could be removed from its sconce.

name: Ancient Painting
description: A painting depicting the royal ancestors.
examine_text: This painting is old and faded but still vaguely depicts a royal figure. There's an air of regal authority emanating from the depicted figure. The art skills from centuries past are astonishing and elegant.

name: Long Dining Table
description: A long, stately hardwood dining table that dominates the room.
examine_text: This table is built for banquets, and could seat over two dozen people. Intricate carvings, older than any living person, are etched into the surface.

name: Royal Tapestry
description: An enormous tapestry depicting various events in the kingdom's history.
examine_text: The threads of the tapestry are a mix of stunning colors. Detailed figures engage in scenes of battle, diplomacy, and celebration, revealing a visual narrative of the castle's past.

name: Performers' Stage
description: A small stage, complete with red curtain, for performers of all kinds.
examine_text: The stage, a bit worn from countless performances held over the years, still retains its grandeur. The red velvet curtains add to its rich ambiance.

name: Golden Goblet
description: A shiny, gold goblet left on the counter.
examine_text: This goblet is made of pure gold and is adorned with various gemstones. It's surprisingly heavy when you lift it.

name: Long Wooden Spoon
description: A long, oak-made spoon used for stirring.
examine_text: The spoon has been worn down from years of use but it's still sturdy. The end is carved into a circular shape, perfect for stirring large pots.

name: Royal Apron
description: A clean, white apron hanging from a hook.
examine_text: The apron is made from fine linen and embroidered with the royal crest. It looks to be in pristine condition.

name: Food Counter
description: A large wooden counter used for preparing food.
examine_text: The counter is made from a single piece of rich, dark wood. It's been well-used but well-cared for. Chopping marks texture its surface decorating it with a history of meals.

name: Iron Chestplate
description: A sturdy piece of chest armor made from iron
examine_text: The Iron Chestplate looks heavy and protective. It has scratches and dings from previous skirmishes

name: Longsword
description: A long, sharp sword made for both cutting and thrusting
examine_text: The Longsword shines with a metallic glimmer. It looks to be well balanced with a point sharp enough to pierce armor

name: Heavy Trunk
description: A heavy wooden trunk used for storing equipment
examine_text: The Heavy Trunk is made of sturdy old oak. It has an antique metal lock on the front and is full with a variety of equipments

name: Plain Clothing
description: A set of plain clothes worn often under the armor
examine_text: This Plain Clothing looks run-of-the-mill, but is in fact carefully made to be comfortable and durable under heavier armor

name: Rocking Chair
description: A stunningly carved wooden rocking chair.
examine_text: Richly carved wood has been shaped into a sturdy and comfortable rocking chair. The armrests are polished smooth by use and the seat feels surprisingly soft.

name: Window
description: A small framed window overlooking the castle's moat and meadows.
examine_text: It's a small square-shaped window, looking through it offers an excellent view of the castle's surrounding lands. Its glass is clear with an elegant wooden frame.

name: Book
description: A well-worn book left on the chair.
examine_text: The covers of the book are worn, showing that it is well-read, and it falls open to a page with a favourite passage of the King. The book is full of tales about knights and heroic deeds.

name: Spyglass
description: A brass spyglass left near the window.
examine_text: The spyglass is rather long and has a polished brass body with a retractable lens section. It's used for magnifying the distant views.

name: Candle
description: A half burnt candle sits in a small holder on the wall.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the wax drippings layered on the holder. The flame flickers gently, casting shadows across the walls.

name: Wooden Table
description: A rough wooden table is situated on the left side of the room.
examine_text: It's a solid structure, made of dark wood. There are signs of wear and use, including various scratches and marks.

name: Window
description: A narrow window opens up to the view of the castle's courtyard.
examine_text: Peering through, you notice the intricate detailing of the stone fortifications, the lush courtyard, and the hustle and bustle of daily castle life.

name: Large Door
description: A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway.
examine_text: It's massive and carved out of a fine, dark wood. You can see the markings of years of use and the royal crest etched onto its very center.

name: Framed Pictures
description: Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty hung at the walls.
examine_text: The wooden frames protect portraits of past kings, queens, and distinct personalities revered in history. Each portrait captures the distinct features of each individual, immortalizing them on the castle walls.

name: Red Carpet
description: A luxurious red carpet covering the floor.
examine_text: The carpet is bright and velvety, a sign of opulence and refinement. It has intricate patterns woven with gold threads, and walking on it feels like treading on clouds.

name: Guards
description: Many guards at the exit door.
examine_text: The guards are highly trained, groomed, and extremely alert. They scan the area for any signs of danger, their hands hovering over the hilts of their swords. You'd better be wary around them.

name: Feather Duster
description: A standard maid's cleaning tool
examine_text: Looking closer, you notice that the feathers of the duster are more fine and delicate than normal. The handle is adorned with intricate carvings, a personal touch from its user.

name: Secret Painting
description: A suspicious painting hanging on the wall
examine_text: The painting seems out of place. It is a beautiful landscape, a stark contrast from the dreariness of the room. On closer inspection, you notice that the painting is movable.

name: Plain Wooden Chest
description: A simple, unadorned chest at the foot of the bed
examine_text: Upon examination, the chest is well made but with no decoration or emblem. It is just a plain wooden chest probably used for storing personal items. Upon closer inspection, there is a small, hidden lock.

name: Maid's Uniform
description: A maid's uniform, neatly folded
examine_text: A simple grey and black maid's uniform. The uniform is made of hard-wearing fabric, and the dress proudly carries the coat of arms of the Duke's family.

name: Bed
description: A simple bed with a straw mattress
examine_text: It's a rough looking bed, not at all comfortable by the looks of it. The straw underneath the thin mattress pokes out in places.

name: Longsword
description: A long, sharp, and reliable sword.
examine_text: The iron blade is still strong and sharp, despite the signs of wear and tear. The hilt has a symbol of the kingdom, signifying its royal craftsmanship. The sword is quite weighty, suggesting great power when wielded.

name: Shield
description: A strong sturdy wooden shield.
examine_text: You can see the hand-painted symbol of the kingdom, announcing the cruiser's loyalty. The wooden frame has minor scrapes from past battles, creating a mosaic of old clashes.

name: Iron Cuirass
description: A solid chest piece made of iron.
examine_text: The hand-hammered iron has the same marks and dents that show its experiences in battle. Each dent, scratch and mark telling a story of a once heroic feat.
