name: Helmet
description: A sturdy helmet forged with iron.
examine_text: The helmet is well-crafted with engravings of ancient folk. This headgear offers robust protection and a narrow eye opening for minimal exposure.

name: Quiver
description: A leather container for holding arrows.
examine_text: The quiver is made of strong leather, dyed dark for stealth. It has an adjustable strap to make it easy to carry across the back.

name: Painted Portrait
description: A portrait of a famous historical king.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the portrait seems incredibly realistic. You almost feel as if the king's noble gaze is following you.

name: Banquet Table
description: A long, cherry wood table situated directly in the center of the hall.
examine_text: The table bears marks of feasts past – tiny scratches and stains that give character to the smooth, polished cherry wood.

name: Candle Sticks
description: A set of five candle sticks lit and placed several feet apart on the table.
examine_text: Candle light flickers from the group of tall, slender candle sticks, casting warm, flickering shadows on the table.

name: Banquet Chair
description: One of the many chairs lining the banquet table.
examine_text: Well-cushioned and lined with velvet, it's designed for the comfort of guests during long meal discussions.

name: Tapestries
description: Colorful tapestries depicting the faces of past kings.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see that each tapestry is delicately woven with threads of gold and silk. The intricate patterns speak of rich history and regal lineage.

name: Stone Fireplace
description: A grand stone fireplace, large enough to keep the room warm on the chilliest nights.
examine_text: The fireplace is constructed from beautifully-decorated stones. Its intricately carved mantle lifts up off the ground, housing a forever burning flame. It's truly a sight to behold.

name: Wooden Door
description: An imposing double thick wooden door with large locks.
examine_text: The door is seemingly weather-proof and almost impenetrable. The locks are intricate, seeming to demand a key of a unique and complex design.

name: Golden table
description: A magnificent table made of pure gold.
examine_text: The table is shining with a beautiful glow. The gold is inlaid with numerous precious gems, making it valuable beyond compare.

name: Diamond plate
description: An exquisitely crafted plate made of pure diamonds.
examine_text: This plate glistens with a sparkling brilliance that is truly one of a kind. Its edges are intricately etched with a stunning design.

name: Embroidered tapestries
description: Exquisite tapestries with beautiful embroidered designs.
examine_text: Each tapestry is a masterpiece, depicting various historical and mythical scenes with intricate detail and beautiful color.

name: Fairy lights
description: Small, elusive lights that hover around the hall.
examine_text: The delicate lights flicker with an ethereal glow. They're believed to be tiny fairies, yet no one has been able to catch one.

name: Cast Iron Pot
description: A large, heavy pot made of cast iron.
examine_text: The hefty pot is well seasoned and bears the marks of being used often. It's ideal for cooking large quantities of food.

name: Copper Pot
description: A shiny pot made of copper.
examine_text: The copper pot sparkles in the light. It's lightweight compared to the cast iron pot and would be perfect for cooking small meals.

name: Fire Burning Stove
description: A large stove with a fire burning inside.
examine_text: This is where the magic happens. The stove is always burning and ready for the chef to create the royal meals. It's made of black metal and is quite warm to the touch.

name: Wood Pile
description: A pile of chopped wood.
examine_text: The wood is of different sizes, all ready to be tossed into the stove to feed the fire. The scent of the wood fills the room.

name: Long Sword
description: A polished steel sword, about 35 inches in length.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see that the blade is exquisite, it shines under the light revealing complex patterns etched onto its surface. The leather-wrapped hilt shows signs of usage, but the sword is well maintained.

name: Morning Star Mace
description: A vicious looking mace with sharp spikes protruding.
examine_text: Taking a closer look, you can see that the spikes on the mace are slightly rusted, indicating that it has not been recently used. The handle is wrapped in an old leather that provides an excellent grip.

name: Longbow
description: A sturdy longbow made of fine yew wood.
examine_text: At a closer glance, the longbow's yew wood is finely grained, showing evidence of excellent craftsmanship. It's strung with a taut string, and looks ready to loose an arrow with immense force.

name: Shield
description: A large round shield made of oak and iron.
examine_text: Close up, you notice that the shield's front is slapped with several layers of iron and the edges are rimmed with the same material, giving it added strength and durability.

name: Grand Staircase
description: A grand and opulent staircase leading to the upper floors.
examine_text: The staircase is made of rich, polished mahogany and is wide enough for four people to ascend side by side. The balustrades are speckled with gold leaf, and the stair carpet is a lavish red with golden trim.

name: Bearskin Rug
description: A luxuriously thick bearskin rug.
examine_text: The rug is soft and its fur is remarkably preserved. The bear's mouth is open in a perpetual snarl, showing off its sharp teeth.

name: Portraits
description: Portraits of the King and his lineage.
examine_text: The portraits show a long, uninterrupted line of royals. Each one is individually identifiable, but they all carry a similar noble aura. The latest portrait shows the current King in his regalia.

name: Throne
description: A large, ornate chair in the center of the room.
examine_text: You see a large throne, made from beaten gold. It's embedded with precious stones that gleam and sparkle. The seat is padded with red velvet cushions.

name: Silver Carpet
description: A long, silver carpet leading up to the throne.
examine_text: You see a plush carpet underfoot, woven from strands of silver reflecting the light.

name: Chandeliers
description: Several imposing chandeliers hang from the ceiling.
examine_text: You look up to see chandeliers, delicately crafted from gold and glass, reflecting the light and illuminating the room.

name: Royal Portraits
description: Pictures of past royalty adorning the walls.
examine_text: You look around and see pictures of past royalty. Each portrait is meticulously painted and framed in ornate gold.

name: Jewelry
description: Various pieces of jewelry lying on the throne.
examine_text: You take a closer look at the jewelry on the throne. There are multiple items made from gold and precious stones, including a crown, a scepter, and a ring.

name: Golden Cup
description: A shiny golden cup studded with precious stones
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the golden cup appears to be made of pure gold and embeded with an array of precious gems. It is carefully crafted with intricate designs.

name: Silver Plate
description: A polished silver plate
examine_text: The silver plate shines bright under the dim light. It is extremely clean and reflects the light beautifully.

name: Candlestick
description: A brass candlestick holder with a half-burnt candle
examine_text: The candlestick is constructed of brass and bears ornate patterns. The wax of the candle has dripped along the sides of the sticks giving it a rustic look.

name: Royal Robe
description: A stunning, velvet royal robe
examine_text: The royal robe is adorned with embroidered gold trims and decorated with tiny pearls. The velvet fabric feels rich and plush.

name: Golden Candle
description: A dimly lit golden candle at the center of the table.
examine_text: The candle has a heavy gold casing. The flame flickers dimly, creating dancing shadows across the room. Despite being long abandoned, the candle still seems to have a lot of wax left.

name: Old Books
description: Various old books placed randomly on the shelves.
examine_text: Books of different sizes and thickness. The contents are about ancient cults and magic, some with handwritten annotations on the margins.

name: Oak Table
description: A dark oak-like wooden round table.
examine_text: The table is old and sturdy, made of solid dark oak. It is covered in scratches and stains from centuries of use.

name: Red Drapes
description: Long red drapes hanging from the arches.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the drapes are a rich velvet and are dust covered. They drape down from the arches to the floor elegantly, adding an eerie atmosphere to the room.

name: Treasure Chest
description: A sturdy wooden chest gleaming with golden ornaments.
examine_text: This chest has been decorated with intricate carvings and brilliant gold detailing. The chest is locked by some unseen mechanism.

name: Legendary Sword
description: An impossibly sharp sword made by a renowned blacksmith.
examine_text: The blade glows faintly with an otherworldly aura, and a faint hum seems to fill the air around it. However, it's held firmly in place by a magical force.

name: Warrior's Armor
description: A set of ancient, silvery armor that belonged to a mighty warrior.
examine_text: The armor exudes an aura of might and bravery. Despite its age, it doesn't have a single dent, testifying to the skills of its previous owner. But, it's affixed securely to the wall.

name: Ancient Magical Crystal
description: A radiant crystal of immense energy and power.
examine_text: This crystal pulses with magical energy. Its unearthly lights cast a surreal glow onto its surroundings. You can feel a strong force field around it making it immovable.

name: Antique Wine Barrel
description: A large wooden barrel filled with wine from a bygone era.
examine_text: The barrel is made from aged oak, stained dark by countless years of holding wine. You can smell the rich aroma of wine seeping through the wood.

name: Bottled Wine
description: A bottle of fine, aged wine, sealed with a cork.
examine_text: The liquid inside is a deep red, and seems to give off a soft glow. The label declares it to be a wine of a particularly good year.

name: Cobweb
description: A dusty, old cobweb spun by a long-gone spider.
examine_text: The cobweb is spun with a masterful intricacy, glistening faintly in whatever light it catches. It's delicate, and looks as though it could tear apart at the slightest touch.

name: Old Torch
description: An old torch shedding flickering light.
examine_text: The torch is fixed to the blackstone wall, its flames dancing on the stones. Its crude wooden handle looks ancient and the slow burn of the tinder proves that it's been burning for quite some time.

name: Iron Lock
description: A rusty lock that securers the prison cell.
examine_text: The lock is old and made entirely out of iron with a rusty patina making it almost blend into the bars of the cell. Its keyhole suggests that the key must be somewhere in the castle.

name: Cheese Rind
description: A mouldy piece of discarded cheese rind.
examine_text: The cheese rind looks old and moldy, likely discarded by a guard or prisoner. It's difficult to tell what kind of cheese this might have been, but the strong smell suggests it was quite ripe.

name: Bone Shards
description: Broken pieces of bone, long abandoned.
examine_text: These are fragments of bone; the brittle remnants of a prior resident of this cell. The bone pieces are bleached white with age and exposure.

name: Ruby Necklace
description: An ornate ruby necklace found on the bony remains of a prisoner.
examine_text: The necklace is exquisite; the gem is a deep blood-red ruby set in a carefully crafted gold setting. Despite being in a dungeon for an unknown number of years, it somehow managed to retain its splendor.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword likely belonging to a knight.
examine_text: The sword appears well-used and aged. The hilt is wrapped with worn leather, and the blade, although dull and rusty, seems sturdy.

name: Knight's Trunk
description: A large, aging wooden trunk. It's likely to hold a knight's personal belongings.
examine_text: The trunk is well-built but bears marks of age and use. A strong lock secures it, suggesting there are items of value inside.

name: Knight's Cot
description: A narrow, single bed where a knight sleeps.
examine_text: The cot is narrowly built, with a thin mattress and a blanket that has seen better days. It's not comfortable, but appears serviceable for a life of duty.

name: Hidden Tunnel
description: A secret passage hidden in the base of a cot.
examine_text: The opening to the tunnel is small and hidden in the corner of a disused cot. It's dark and the destination is unclear.

name: Large Wooden Table
description: A long and grand wooden table, capable of accommodating a hundred guests.
examine_text: The table is massive with intricate designs and carvings. It spans the length of the room, telling stories of grand feasts and engagements.

name: Gilded Chair
description: An elegantly carved chair with gold detailing.
examine_text: The chair possesses exquisite craftsmanship, decorated with gold, the symbol of royalty. Its ornate decorations feature mythical creatures.

name: Candelabra
description: A large candelabra with many candles providing illumination to the room.
examine_text: This grand candelabra stands tall with numerous candles, each emitting a warm, enchanting glow that dance around the room.

name: Tapestry
description: Wall hangings depicting angels, adding a sacred touch to the room.
examine_text: These wall hangings are finely woven with great detail, showing scenes of angels. They provide a solemn yet comforting atmosphere.

name: Four Poster Bed
description: A giant bed with cerulean silk curtains.
examine_text: The massive bed is oversized even for the opulent room it's in. It can easily hold several people. The cerulean silk curtains are smooth to the touch. The bed is warm, inviting, and reeks of royalty.

name: Mahogany Writing Desk
description: An ancient mahogany writing desk with important looking papers and scrolls spread atop it.
examine_text: The desk is made of heavy, old mahogany which has darkened from age. It looks immovable. Important looking papers, sealed with wax seals, and scrolls are spread in a seemingly orderly fashion atop of it.

name: Fur Carpet
description: A thick fur carpet that lies in front of the bed.
examine_text: Exceptionally plush and warm underfoot, the fur carpet lends a sense of luxurious comfort to the room. Its light color contrasts strikingly with the dark, wood floor.

name: Exotic Flower
description: A flower you've never seen before. It displays a vibrant array of colors.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the Exotic Flower doesn't appear to be of this world. The color scheme is outlandishly vibrant. The petals seem surreal and alien, yet beautiful. The flower has a mild, distinct fragrance that's overwhelmingly enchanting.

name: Shimmering Pond
description: A small, crystal-clear pond glimmers in the sunlight.
examine_text: As you look closer, the Shimmering Pond provides a detailed reflection of the vibrant garden landscape. Peculiarly, the pond also houses a number of exotic aquatic plants, possibly carried over by birds from various parts of the kingdom. The water is cool and refreshing to the touch.

name: Insect-sized Bud
description: A bud so small it could be mistaken for an insect.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the tiny bud seems to be a minuscule version of a larger plant species. Intricate patterns decorate its surface, visible only upon the closest inspection. It's a feat of natural perfection.

name: Grand Tree
description: A grand, towering tree, reaching for the sky.
examine_text: A close examination reveals the tree's bark to be rough to the touch, while the branches are home to many species of birds. The tree's roots spread wide and far, strong and firm. Its presence is humbling and reflects  the enduring might of nature.

name: Torch
description: A torch fastened to the wall.
examine_text: An old, smoke-blackened torch. The fire burns steadily though it gives off a lot of smoke.

name: Pillar
description: Large sturdy pillar.
examine_text: The pillars are huge, carved from solid stone. They are cold to the touch and covered with a thin layer of dust.

name: Rug
description: Small rug.
examine_text: The rug is surprisingly soft and has intricate patterns. It looks out of place in the otherwise damp and cold basement.

name: Table
description: Old wooden table.
examine_text: An old, rickety wooden table. It's not very stable, but it's good enough to hold some parchment scrolls.

name: Cleaning Supplies
description: Various cleaning supplies.
examine_text: An assortment of brooms, mops, dusters, buckets, and soaps. Everything one needs to keep a castle clean.

name: Old Stone Tablet
description: An ancient stone slab with inscriptions.
examine_text: Upon examining, the tablet seems to have some kind of old scripture or story carved onto it. The text seems to be from a lost language, and the pictures are somewhat faded. There's a depiction of what looks like a castle under attack.

name: Oak Bow
description: An old but sturdy looking bow made of oak wood.
examine_text: The bow is perfectly preserved and seems to be in working condition even after all these years. There are carvings on it that resemble the sigils and crests of generations-old noble families.

name: Watchtower Stool
description: A rudimentary stool made from scraps of wood.
examine_text: The years have taken a toll on the stool, weathered with what looks like deep gashes and scratches. The top of the stool is worn down from generations of soldiers sitting vigilantly.

name: Rusted Iron Helmet
description: A helmet made of rusted iron, probably abandoned by a previous guard.
examine_text: The helmet is heavy and cold to touch. Despite the rust, it retains its strength and solid crafting. Inside is a layer of dried, cracked leather padding.

name: King's Bed
description: A large, royal bed with a fancy wooden roof.
examine_text: The bed is grand, fit for a king. The wooden posts are carved intricately, the roof has painted murals of battles and victories. The mattress is woven with silk and goose feathers for added comfort.

name: King's Wardrobe
description: A large, red and gold painted wardrobe.
examine_text: The wardrobe is made of fine mahogany, with gold leaf decorations and painted in royal red. It is filled with royal robes, crowns and personal items of the king.

name: Bear Rug
description: A large, rough bear rug
examine_text: The rug is made from a large black bear. It brings warmth and grandeur to the king's bedroom. The bear's face is surprisingly intact with its sharp teeth and empty eyes.

name: Kingdom Tapestry
description: A detailed tapestry depicting a map of the kingdom.
examine_text: The tapestry is woven from fine threads of silver and gold. It depicts the kingdom in all its glory, with topographical details that could only have come from a royal cartographer.

name: Tapestry
description: A colorful tapestry depicting a rural landscape.
examine_text: Taking a closer look, you can see the fine workmanship that went into the tapestry. The bright colors and intricate patterns are a testament to the tailoring skills of the craftsperson.

name: King's wooden bench
description: A long and sturdy wooden bench, well-polished and maintained.
examine_text: The bench is solidly built, with a few signs of wear and tear. It's been polished to a shiny finish, reflecting the torch light.

name: Stone privy
description: A stone hole inside the bathroom for human waste disposal.
examine_text: It's not the most inviting sight, but it's a crucial part of the castle's infrastructure - a functional privy with a rough stone finish.

name: Chandelier
description: An oversized chandelier made of crystal and gold, elegantly hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the chandelier is covered in a thick layer of dust and cobwebs, showing age and lack of use. The gold is tarnished but still shines in the light that filters in from the tall windows, and the crystals are dirty but still beautifully catch the light.

name: Marble Table
description: A large, round marble table, standing in the center of the room.
examine_text: The table is carved from a single piece of marble and inlaid with gold along the edges. Age and negligence have left it chipped and stained in places, but it still speaks of a grandeur that once filled this room.

name: Silk Gown
description: A faded silk gown, discarded on a dusty chair.
examine_text: On closer inspection, stitches and embroidery of intricate designs are still visible. Although the colours have faded and the fabric is covered in dust, it's clear it boasted grandeur fit for a queen once.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A derelict, old corroded sword discarded casually on a pile of bodies.
examine_text: The sword is old and heavily corroded. It seems like it was discarded a long time ago. Despite its condition, it could still be used as a weapon.

name: Bone
description: A human bone on the grisly floor of the disposal area.
examine_text: This bone belonged to one of the many victims of this castle. It's picked clean now and seems super polished.

name: Rat
description: A large rat, gnawing on something that was once a part of a human body.
examine_text: The rat is large, fat, and seemingly unafraid of humans. It eyes you with suspicion as it continues its grim meal.

name: Fresh Loaf of Bread
description: A crusty, warm loaf of bread.
examine_text: The bread, fresh from the oven, is crackling still. Golden brown and crusty on the outside, it wafts the tantalising scent of freshly baked wheat.

name: Chef's Knife
description: A well-sharpened knife used by the chefs.
examine_text: The knife has a well-polished handle of oak, stained dark, and a blade that gleams sharply in the light. It's well balanced, extremely sharp, and has been meticulously maintained.

name: Fire-burning Stove
description: A grand stove, fuelled by flickering, crackling logs.
examine_text: This grand stove dominates the kitchen, its fire casting a warm, golden glow. It's filled with carefully stacked logs, the white-hot flames licking up and around them.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A large, heavy pot used for cooking.
examine_text: On the stone shelves of the kitchen, this pot stands out. It's large and heavy, with two sturdy handles on the sides. It's clearly well used, but scrupulously clean.

name: Wooden Chest
description: A large, old wooden chest secured with a chain and lock.
examine_text: The chest is made of worn down wood, blotched with patches of dampness. Despite its age and wear, the lock and chain around it look exceptionally robust and sturdy, untouched by time.

name: Rat
description: A standard nuisance rat. Apparently quite common here.
examine_text: It's a rat and it is dirty, clearly having made a home in this grimy basement. It pauses to nibble on something, whiskers twitching.

name: Rat Poison
description: A small box of rat poison. Potentially lethal.
examine_text: It's a small box of rat poison with a skull and crossbones printed on the front. The toxins contained within are surely enough to take out a small rat infestation.

name: Broken Chair
description: A wooden chair with a missing leg.
examine_text: Battered and broken, this wooden chair has seen better days. One of its legs is missing and it's covered in a thick layer of dust.

name: Rat Trap
description: A classic spring-loaded rat trap.
examine_text: This is a standard spring-loaded rat trap. Its metal treadle is cocked back, ready to snap on any unsuspecting rodents.

name: Iron Sword
description: A common guard's weapon resting against the wall.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the sword seems to be well-made with a sharp edge. Its simple design suggests it's meant for function over form.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A sturdy wooden chair next to the table.
examine_text: At a closer look, the chair appears to be made of thick, durable oak. Years of use have worn out the seat, giving it a smooth finish.

name: Foot Locker
description: A small cuboidal storage unit kept at the foot of the bed.
examine_text: The foot locker looks worn but serviceable, with metal bindings at the corners. It is used for storing personal effects and can be locked for security.

name: Drinking Mug
description: A crude earthenware mug sitting on the table.
examine_text: It's a bulky, glazed earthenware mug, fit to hold a good portion of drink. Stout and sturdy, it is designed to survive the rough treatment of a barracks.

name: Chandelier
description: A big chandelier lighting up the main room.
examine_text: The chandelier is grand and glistening, adorned with brilliant crystals refracting light across the chamber.

name: Throne
description: The king's throne located in the castle.
examine_text: The throne is an imposing structure made of gold and upholstered with lavish blue velvet, with intricate carvings depicting unknown kingdoms and mythical creatures.

name: Paint bucket
description: A bucket of purple paint.
examine_text: The paint is of a royal purple colour. The bucket is fairly new, a sign of the castle’s monthly repainting routine.

name: Red brick
description: Bricks from construction of the castle.
examine_text: The bricks are deep red and somewhat chipped at the edges, revealing the long history and endurance of the castle.

name: Gold trim
description: Gold trim along the castle walls.
examine_text: The trim is made of real gold, polished to a bright shine. It forms intricate patterns along the painted walls.

name: Candle
description: A small wax candle, flickering dimly.
examine_text: This simple candle illuminates the room with a warm, soft glow. It's been left here to make the space less dark, more comforting in its own way.

name: Toilet Scrubber
description: A sturdy, long-handled brush with coarse bristles.
examine_text: It's definitely been used for the grueling task of cleaning the communal toilets, yet appears to be in a surprisingly good state. Must be well taken care of.

name: Stone Trough
description: A long, shallow, stone trough.
examine_text: The trough looks incredibly solid and heavy, fitting for this castle. It shows the wear of constant use but surprisingly doesn’t seem too weathered.

name: Crude Toilet
description: A simple hole in the ground, it's function all too apparent.
examine_text: It's just a hole carved into the stone floor, far from the modern toilets you're accustomed to. Despite this, it appears to be cleaned regularly and is faintly less gross than you'd guess.

name: Torch
description: A small handheld torch that is secured on the wall
examine_text: A useful tool to navigate through the tunnels, it is flickering dimly casting an eery light down the tunnel. The flame dances on its pitch-soaked wrapping.

name: Kings Crest
description: The crest of the king, a symbol of his power and rule
examine_text: The crest is intricately designed, displaying a dragon wrapping around a sword. The dragon's eyes are embedded with rubies, creating a mesmerising depth to the crest.

name: Old Parchment
description: A parchment with markings that can decipher the layout of the secret tunnels
examine_text: The parchment is old and crumbled, with lines indicating pathways through the tunnel. One path shows a secret exit that leads outside of the castle. It's written in a secretive code, known only by king's council members.

name: Cauldron
description: A large, black iron cauldron filled with boiling vegetable soup.
examine_text: The cauldron is enormous and suspended over a roaring fire. It's full of deliciously smelling soup with chunky boiled vegetables and rabbit meat. The savory scent of freshly cooked rabbit and mixed herbs wafts from the simmering broth.

name: Kitchen Knife
description: A knife with a sharp, shiny iron blade.
examine_text: The knife is strong and sharp, excellent for cutting meat or vegetables. It's handle is crafted from hickory and bears slight wear, showing of its frequent use.

name: Pot
description: A large pot, filled with simmering stew.
examine_text: The pot is filled with simmering meat and vegetable stew slowly cooking on an open flame. It emanates an aroma of a fine blend of cooked rabbit meat and choicest vegetables seasoned with herbs.

name: Apron
description: A soiled white apron used by the kitchen staff.
examine_text: The apron is well worn, stained with a years of spills, splashes and fingerprints of ingredients. It still carries the aroma of countless meals prepared.

name: Cage Key
description: A small, ornate silver key presumably for one of the pet cages.
examine_text: The silver key is engraved with intricate designs, suggesting it might be used for the cages in this room. A tiny image of a bird is etched into one side.

name: Crystal Cage
description: An ornate cage made entirely of crystal bars.
examine_text: The cage's clean, clear-crystal bars exhibit a lonely beauty, as if yearning for interaction.

name: Feather Toy
description: Colourful, engaging toy made of feathers intended for pet amusement.
examine_text: The toy is made of bright feathers tied to a string. It looks like something the pets in this room would enjoy playing with.

name: Pet Food
description: A small sealed bag containing premium pet food.
examine_text: The bag is filled with pet food, colored in various shapes and sizes. It looks and smells top-quality, perfect for these royal pets.

name: Iron Chains
description: Cold and rusty iron chains hanging from the cell walls.
examine_text: The heavy chains are made of thick iron links, their dull gleam lit dimly by torchlight. They're hung sturdily from the stone walls, a reminder of the grim reality of this place.

name: Torch
description: A burning torch shedding some light in the gloomy dungeon.
examine_text: The torch is simple - made of a heavy wooden handle wrapped in oil-soaked cloth. The flames flicker, casting long dancing shadows on the dreary stone walls.

name: Hay pile
description: A messy pile of hay for sleeping.
examine_text: The hay is dry and prickly, scattered haphazardly in the cell's corner. It's hardly comfortable, but it's better than cold stone.

name: Ancity Sword
description: A finely forged steel sword that probably belongs to a high-ranking knight.
examine_text: The sword is well-balanced crafted intricately with elven symbols scroll worked into the hilt.

name: Rusty Helmet
description: This old, rusty helmet has clearly seen better days.
examine_text: The helmet has a large dent on one side, and rust has formed around the edges.

name: Armorer's Forge
description: The forge filled with fire looks ominous.
examine_text: The forge burns brightly in the corner, surrounded by all the tools of the armorer's trade.

name: Plate Armor
description: A full set of plate armor, gleaming brightly.
examine_text: Crafted from hardened and polished steel, this suit of armor offers excellent protection.

name: Gilded Table
description: A large, gleaming gilded table that can seat 100 people.
examine_text: The table is constructed of sturdy oak and beautifully gilded with intricate designs and patterns. Despite its size, it is a masterpiece of craftsmanship.

name: Gilded Mirror
description: A large, ornate mirror adorned with gilt edging.
examine_text: The reflection in the mirror is crystal clear. The gold frame is detailed with intricate craftsmanship and glows softly in the candlelight.

name: Handmade Rug
description: A large, plush rug adorning the floor of the dining hall.
examine_text: This rug is made from the softest wool and intricately dyed with vibrant colors in a complex pattern. The craftsmanship that went into this piece is truly admirable.

name: Tapestries
description: Large, exquisite tapestries depicting past royalty.
examine_text: Each tapestry is massive, reaching from the ceiling to the floor. The images woven into each piece depict courageous deeds and momentous events in the castle's history.

name: Rusty Pickaxe
description: An old, discarded pickaxe with a rusty head and a rotten wooden handle.
examine_text: The pickaxe has seen better days. The head is rusted and the wooden handle is rotten and almost falling apart. Despite its condition, it's heavy and could potentially be used as a weapon.

name: Old Mining Helmet
description: A discarded helmet with a broken headlamp.
examine_text: This old, dusty helmet must have belonged to a miner. The lamp is cracked but the helmet itself still looks sturdy.

name: Abandoned Machinery
description: Old, rusted mining machinery left to decay.
examine_text: The machinery is a combination of belts, gears, and pulleys, now rusted and silent. Perhaps once it was used to haul ore from the depths of the mine.

name: Old Pocket Knife
description: An old rusty pocket knife sits on the floor of the shack.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the pocket knife is rather old with a few spots of rust. Despite its age, the blade still appears sharp. The handle is made of aged wood and is worn smooth from use.

name: Worn Work Boots
description: A pair of worn out work boots are propped up against the wall.
examine_text: The boots are well worn, with the soles nearly worn through and the leather faded. Despite their beaten appearance, they seem to have been well made and could probably still be worn.

name: Tin Cup
description: A rusty old tin cup sits on a makeshift wooden table.
examine_text: The tin cup has a small iron handle, and is slightly dented on one side. It could probably still hold liquid, though you wouldn't want to drink from it.

name: Wooden Table
description: A small, roughly-made wooden table stands in the shack.
examine_text: The homemade table is wobbly, constructed from rough-hewn boards and with nails sticking out in places. The surface is uneven, but it could serve as a work surface or a place to set down items.

name: Rusty Shovel
description: An old, rusted shovel sticking out of the ground.
examine_text: This is an old shovel with a splintered wooden handle. The steel is rusted and worn down, almost making it look like an antique.

name: Broken Lantern
description: A broken oil lantern abandoned near the entrance.
examine_text: It's a vintage lantern made out of iron with glass panes. The glass is broken and the wick looks charred.

name: Loose Stones
description: A few loose stones from the collapsed mine.
examine_text: A handful of loose, dirty stones that have fallen from the mine over time. They feel heavy and extremely cold to touch.

name: Dead Ivy
description: Some dead ivy creeping along the edge of the mine entrance.
examine_text: This is a dried up ivy vine with dead, brittle leaves still clinging onto it. It has a dark green, almost black color.

name: Old Castle Sword
description: A ancient, rusty sword that used to belong to the knights
examine_text: The sword is heavy and rusted from many years of disuse. It still carries the coat of arms of the forgotten kingdom.

name: Dusty Throne
description: An large, ornate chair covered in dust and cobwebs
examine_text: The throne is made out of stone, intricately engraved, but hasn't been sat upon in centuries.

name: Rotting Food
description: A wooden bowl filled with food that is long past it's prime
examine_text: A mix of rotten fruits and bread, not at all appetizing.

name: Torn Banner
description: A faded banner featuring the emblem of the kingdom
examine_text: The once vibrant colors have mostly faded away, and the fabric is torn and tattered.

name: Broken Sword
description: A sword left from the battle, now broken and rusty.
examine_text: The once mighty steel sword is now nothing more than a rusty hilt attached to a shard of metal. You can see the intricate design on the hilt that denotes it belonged to one of the King's Guard.

name: Rotten Food Pouch
description: A pouch left behind from the fateful day, its food contents long rotted.
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the pouch is made of quality leather but has been exposed to the elements for too long. The pouch's string is still tied tightly preserving the rot inside.

name: Charred Armor
description: Pieces of a once sturdy battle armor, now charred and useless.
examine_text: The armor is completely burnt and discolored due to the extreme heat. Even the metal joints and rivets are warped beyond repair. It must have belonged to a fallen warrior during the battle.

name: Old Family Portrait
description: A faded portrait of a noble family, covered in dust and cobwebs.
examine_text: The portrait depicts a noble family dressed in exquisite outfits. You barely make out their features as age and exposure to elements have faded the colors. Despite this, a hint of their opulence still shines through.

name: Cracked Teacup
description: An old teacup with a large crack down the side.
examine_text: This porcelain teacup must have been a part of a grand tea set at one point. Its delicate design is still visible through the grime that now decorates it. A large crack mars its once elegant form.

name: Old Compass
description: An antique brass compass, slightly tarnished with age.
examine_text: The glass on this compass is shattered, but the arrow still swings freely. Despite its age and the elements, the brass has not rusted over, a testament to its quality.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusty sword with a chipped blade.
examine_text: The hilt of this sword is adorned with a faded family crest. Its once-sharp blade is corroded and chipped from disuse. Still, it feels solid and surprisingly well-balanced in hand.

name: Crushed Cradle
description: A small, wooden cradle, crushed under the weight of the fallen rocks.
examine_text: The cradle seems to have been quite beautiful before the collapse. Its intricate carvings are marred by scratches and chunks of missing wood. There's a faint lullaby playing when you're near it, it's almost haunting.

name: Mossy Rocks
description: Large chunks of green, moss-covered rocks.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the mossy rocks possess an unusual, almost fluorescent glow. They are cool and slick to the touch. You can spot some small creatures moving around hidden within the moss.

name: Faded Photograph
description: An old, faded photograph of a noble lady holding a baby.
examine_text: The edges of the photograph are worn, and the image is almost hard to make out. The lady shows a tender smile and the baby looks content in her arms. The date at the back of the photograph suggests it was taken around the time when the wing collapsed.

name: Coconut
description: A mature coconut hanging from the lone tree
examine_text: The coconut is green-brown, quite large and heavy for its size. Could be useful

name: Gold Pieces
description: A pile of gold pieces abandoned by the pirates
examine_text: The gold pieces are shining as they were recently polished, the markings suggest they are from a royal treasury

name: Skeleton
description: A skeletal remains from previous victims
examine_text: The skeleton is very old and covered in dust and sand, clothings suggest that this was a sailor or a pirate

name: Boat Parts
description: Parts of a wooden boat scattered across the beach
examine_text: The parts are worn but could possibly be used to make a raft with enough of them

name: Old Rusty Key
description: An old, rusty key, seemingly dropped or forgotten.
examine_text: The key is covered in a thick layer of rust, indicative of its age and long exposure to the salty air. It has a symbol you do not recognize etched into it.

name: Battered Shield
description: A tattered and torn shield, relic of some forgotten battle.
examine_text: The shield is dotted with rust and crisscrossed with sword marks, a silent testament to the sieges the castle must have endured. Its metal is old and brittle, with pieces flaking off at the edges.

name: Ancient Map
description: An old, fragile map, possibly detailing the surrounding terrains.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the map reveals the extent of the former noble's lands, the village, the castle grounds, and possibly even treasure markers. Its edges are tattered and scorched, with some areas faded beyond comprehension due to the ravages of time.

name: Wooden Throne
description: A wooden throne, its lacquer peeling off after years of neglect.
examine_text: It must have been grand once - ornate carvings hint at a former majesty now lost to time. There's a worn-down cushion on the seat, fraying at the edges.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A beaten-down, rusty sword.
examine_text: This sword has seen a lot of use. The edge is dull and the whole length is covered in rust. There are some dried bloodstains on the blade.

name: Animal Bones
description: A pile of small animal bones.
examine_text: Countless small bones, picked clean and gnawed on by something with sharp teeth. Some of them have been cracked open, probably to get at the marrow.

name: Old Campfire
description: An old, extinguished campfire.
examine_text: There's not much left of the fire - just some old ashes and half-burned logs. It smells faintly of smoke and cooked meat.

name: Leaf Bed
description: A surprisingly soft bed made of leaves.
examine_text: It's a simple bed made of a pile of leaves. It smells musty, and there's a surprised depression in the middle – like someone or something has been sleeping here.

name: Mouse Carcass
description: A small decaying corpse of a rodent
examine_text: A small, vile smelling carcass of what used to be a field mouse. The decomposition process seems to have started, indicated by the leaking viscera and gathering cloud of flies.

name: Bats
description: Several bats roosting overhead
examine_text: Looking upwards, you spot a mass of chittering, squirming shapes latched onto the roof of the cave. Upon closer observation, you realize these creatures are bats, their bodies cloaked in darkness, only the eerie red glow of their eyes visible in the scant light.

name: Claw Marks
description: Disturbingly large gashes in the wall
examine_text: Upon closer inspection of the cave walls, you notice disturbing large gashes which seem to have been clawed into the stone by some beast. The deep grooves are fresh, indicating the monster may still be nearby.

name: Golden Chalice
description: A beautifully crafted chalice made of pure gold, shimmering under the light of the magical fountain.
examine_text: The golden chalice has an intricate design carved delicately on it. The voluptuous rubies embedded on the cup radiate a mesmerizing glow when it is filled with the enchanted water.

name: Ancient Armor
description: A worn-out iron suit, remnants of a brave knight who sought eternal youth.
examine_text: On closer look, the armor is covered with dents and scratches, a witness of countless battles. Its rust-ridden surface and faded insignia tell the tale of a forgotten kingdom.

name: Eternal Flowers
description: Blooming strongly amidst the skeleton bones, these flowers possess an otherworldly charm.
examine_text: The Eternal Flowers glow radiantly as if reflecting the fountain's magic energy. They seem to have nectar-like drops which can heal minor wounds upon touch.

name: Round Magical Table
description: An ancient round table made of solid oak wood with mysterious runes carved around its edges.
examine_text: The table possesses an ancient aura. Runes carved around the edges glow intermittently, leaving a trail of warm, sparkling dust. The table surface, though obviously used for centuries, remains flawlessly smooth.

name: Magelight Chandelier
description: A chandelier hanging from the top of Echo Hall, filled with hovering balls of soft-glowing magelight.
examine_text: The chandelier, intricately crafted from silver and decorated with numerous magical gems, holds countless hovering balls of soft-glowing magelight. It lights up the entire room with a warm, welcoming glow.

name: Wizard's Robe
description: A dark blue robe embellished with sparkling stars and cosmic nebulas.
examine_text: The dark blue robe is made from a silky material that feels like cool water when touched. It is adorned with stars that seem to twinkle in the dim light and cosmic nebula patterns that shift fluidly.

name: Spellbook
description: A thick tome containing all known wizard spells since the founding of Echo Hall.
examine_text: All the notorious spells inked on crisp, parchment paper. Its cover has a majestic embroidery of prominent elements and is bound by spine of dragon's scale. It hums a faint, magical aura when touched.

name: Elven bed
description: A very small bed made out of leaves and twigs
examine_text: The bed is magically warm and inviting. There are delicate patterns inlaid into the twigs with threads of gold. It's so small, you're afraid you might crush it by accident.

name: Oak bark table
description: A rough table made from oak bark
examine_text: The table, though tiny, has been polished to a high shine and is surprisingly sturdy. Rings from the oak's tree life can be seen in its surface.

name: Elven lantern
description: A tiny illuminated lantern
examine_text: A flame no bigger than a teardrop floats in the center of this lantern, casting a soft light. It seems to be filled with luminescent moss.

name: Elven family photos
description: Tiny frames with photos of an elf family
examine_text: Each photo captures moments of joy. Some showcase an elven couple, others depict a small elf child. The subjects glow with a soft warmth, just like the environment around them.

name: Magical Elixir
description: A glowing bottle filled with swirling liquid of various hues.
examine_text: The bottle glows with a soft radiance, the colors inside it swirling and moving as though alive. The cork sealing the top is adorned with archaic markings possibly suggesting potent magical properties.

name: Sacred Stone
description: This small, black stone is incredibly smooth and surprisingly heavy. It pulsates with a strong energy.
examine_text: The stone appears to be solid obsidian, its obsidian blackness seems to drink in all the light around. Holding it, you feel a sense of gravity, as if it's somehow significant.

name: Cursed Sword
description: An ancient, eerily glowing sword.
examine_text: The hilt of the sword is wrapped in decaying leather. The blade, despite its countless nicks and scratches, glows with a mysterious energy.

name: Healing Herbs
description: A bunch of bright, fragrant herbs.
examine_text: The herbs have a refreshing aroma that suggests health and vitality. They are filled with a magical properties reputed to cure diseases and heal injuries.

name: Magic Crystals
description: Many shaped crystals are shimmering on the shelves.
examine_text: As you draw closer, you see that these are not ordinary crystals. They are a deep, translucent purple, glowing with an inner light. It pulses, like a heartbeat. Especially one of the larger crystals, almost as big as your hand, catches your eye.

name: Faery Wand
description: A slender, intricate wand is resting on a velvet pillow.
examine_text: The wand appears to be made of some kind of beautiful silver material that you can't identify. It swirls with artful, elegant spirals and is topped with a radiant crystal. You can feel a pulsating hum of magic when you get near it.

name: Faery Crown
description: A delicate golden crown is displayed under a glass dome.
examine_text: The crown is small and appears to be wrought from pure gold, forming the shapes of intricate flowers and vines. In the center of the crown is a glimmering, heart-shaped gem. It seems imbued with an ethereal glow.

name: Royal Bed
description: A bed made of shimmering, warm cloth hanging in a corner.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the bed seems to have been grown from the tent walls themselves. It shimmers with a soft golden light and seems exceptionally comforting and inviting.

name: Vibrant Rugs
description: Carpets of unknown material that radiate an otherworldly vibrance.
examine_text: The rugs are intricately woven with threads of countless colors. None of the patterns are random; they tell stories of the royal family's history.

name: Golden Teapot
description: An ornate teapot, glowing softly above a brazier.
examine_text: Teapot is made of pure gold, adorned with engravings of mythical creatures. It releases a scent of cinnamon and spices.

name: Luminous Pearl
description: A large, softly glowing pearl used as a flagstone.
examine_text: The pearl emits a soft glow and has a tranquilizing effect, filling its surroundings with peace and harmony.

name: Wizard's Robes
description: Beautiful, dark blue robes with celestial symbols etched into the fabric.
examine_text: The dark blue fabric of the robes is surprisingly light, but also very warm. The sparkling celestial symbols stitched into the fabric appear to move and twirl under your stare, as if they are being guided by magic. A large hood and wide sleeves simply add to the mystical look.

name: Mystical Grimoire
description: An ancient book filled with spells and enchantments.
examine_text: The grimoire is filled with pages upon pages of cryptic symbols and carefully drawn diagrams. Some of the pages are so filled with notes and annotations that the original text is barely visible. There is a sense of raw power from these pages, a whispering promise of magic and knowledge.

name: Glowing Potion
description: A spellbinding potion that shines with a tranquil, yet potent, magical radiance.
examine_text: When the potion is closely inspected, its light coats everything in a peaceful glow. It is as tranquil as it is potent, filling you with a sense of calm and warmth that even fear cannot penetrate. You can't help but feel that taking this potion would yield a very powerful effect.

name: Magician's Hat
description: A pointy hat that Mordak, the powerful magician, wears.
examine_text: The hat is a classic pointy magician's hat. The velvet fabric is dark and soft, dotted with tiny, sparkling stars. The hat is big and floppy, dropping slightly to one side.

name: Ornate Wand
description: A beautiful wand with mysterious carvings.
examine_text: This wand is made of black ash with myriad iridescent lines inlaid within its smooth surface. The tip is embedded with a single, radiant crystal that pulses gently. The carvings which adorn it appear to tell a story if you look long enough.

name: Caged Phoenix Feather
description: A vibrant, glowing feather enclosed in a cage.
examine_text: The feather is a bright, shining contrast to its austere cage. The caged phoenix feather is large, almost as long as your arm, and every color imaginable dances in its glow. The bars of the cage are surprisingly cool to the touch.

name: Wizard's Robe
description: A dark, thick, enchanted cloth robe.
examine_text: The robe smells of herbs and magic. It is adorned with celestial symbols and feels heavy with enchantment. The soft inner lining feels like it could keep you warm in the coldest of winters.

name: Splintered Table
description: A rugged, decrepit wooden table standing on three legs.
examine_text: The table seems to have seen better days. Its surface is scarred with scratches, stains, and grooves, hinting at years of abuse from an ogre's heavy hand.

name: Lantern
description: A rusty old lantern dimly lit
examine_text: The lantern is old with rusty metal surrounding the glass. The flame inside flickers lazily, emanating a weak, yet steady glow.

name: Green Ooze
description: A sticky green substance trickling down the cabin's walls.
examine_text: The ooze is sticky, thick and disgusting. It emanates a peculiar odour, indicating it might not be entirely natural.

name: Dusty Rug
description: A large, faded rug with multiple holes.
examine_text: The rug, probably once beautifully woven, is old and neglected, covered in grime and dust. Its intricate pattern barely visible under the ages of filth.

name: Farm Table
description: A roughly hewn wooden table
examine_text: Bears all the signs of long use, the surface worn smooth, stained by many meals and scarred from endless tasks completed upon it.

name: Stove
description: A wood-fired stove
examine_text: Heavy and blackened from smoke, there's enough heat radiating from it to warm the whole house.

name: Bed Pallet
description: A straw-filled sack used as a bed
examine_text: A pauper's bed, full of itchy straw, but the only place to rest in this modest house.

name: Window
description: A small square hole with a hinged wooden shutter
examine_text: Through the dirty, scratched glass you can just make out the fields outside.

name: Hay Bale
description: A compact, rectangular stack of dried grasses.
examine_text: It's a large straw-coloured, compact stack of dried and tied grasses, used mainly as animal feed. It has a dry, earthy aroma.

name: Plow
description: A medieval farming tool used for preparing the soil for planting.
examine_text: This heavy, wooden tool is designed to cut, lift, and turn over soil, especially to prepare it for planting. Its age and wear attest to the hard work of the peasants.

name: Chicken Coop
description: A small shelter where chickens are kept.
examine_text: A roughly structured wooden shelter, stacked with hay and occupied by clucking and pecking chickens. The coop's small door is slightly ajar.

name: Watering Can
description: A tin can used for watering plants.
examine_text: It's a slightly rusty, but sturdy, tin can with a handle and a nozzle. It is used to sprinkle water on thirsty crops. It seems to be recently filled with cool, fresh water.

name: Herbal Scroll
description: A parchment of old knowledge describing the use and properties of various herbs.
examine_text: The scroll is elderly, filled with handwritten notations of different herbs, their properties, and uses. You notice diagrams and drawings as well as methods of preparation.

name: Herbalist's Robe
description: A simple robe, stained with Earth's colors, worn by the herbalist.
examine_text: The robe is simple, loose fitting and smeared with various dirt and herb streaks. It bears the faint scent of earth and various herbs, predicting the herbalist's frequent engagements with them.

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: A stone tool used by the herbalist for grinding herbs.
examine_text: Solid and somewhat heavy, this mortar and pestle bears the marks of frequent use. Small bits of dried herbs remain in the mortar, indicating recent use.

name: Garden Herbs
description: A mixture of herbs growing healthily in the herbalist's rear garden.
examine_text: Lush and green, the garden is a peaceful sight. You see a variety of herbs, some familiar to you, others completely alien. The fragrance of the herbs is refreshing and invigorating.

name: Chicken Feed
description: A bag of mixed grains for the chickens.
examine_text: The chicken feed is a mix of corn and other grains designed to provide all the nutrients a chicken needs.

name: Feeding Trough
description: A long, shallow wooden trough for the chickens to eat from.
examine_text: The feeding trough is filled with grains and seeds. You can see bits of corn, wheat, and other grains.

name: Chicken Wire
description: A roll of chicken wire fencing.
examine_text: Upon examining the chicken wire you notice it is sturdy, with small hexagonal gaps. It's sharp on the edges.

name: Nesting Box
description: A wooden box filled with straw, where hens can lay their eggs in peace.
examine_text: The nesting box is cozy and soft with plenty of straw. It appears to be frequently used by the hens.

name: Farm Overalls
description: A pair of durable, dirt-streaked overalls.
examine_text: The overalls are made from a tough fabric and have various pockets, many of them containing layers of lingering dust. They're designed to withstand heavy use.

name: Sack Of Wheat
description: A heavy sack filled with mature, dry wheat.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see that the wheat is golden and heavy, full of potential energy just waiting to be released in the form of flour.

name: Wooden Shovel
description: A sturdy wooden shovel used for digging the soil.
examine_text: The shovel is worn but still strong. Its handle is smooth from years of use.

name: Bucket Of Water
description: A large bucket filled to the brim with clear, cool water.
examine_text: The water is refreshingly cool to the touch, and clear enough that you can see your reflection.

name: Straw Hat
description: A wide-brimmed hat made from woven straw.
examine_text: The hat is simple but well-made, offering excellent protection from the sun.

name: Barn Hay
description: An old pile of golden hay in the corner
examine_text: Upon closer examination, the hay is dry and scratchy. It crinkles under the weight of your hand. It appears to have been used for bedding for some animal recently.

name: Milk Bucket
description: A tin milk bucket placed beside milking stool
examine_text: The bucket is full of fresh, frothy milk. It looks freshly collected.

name: Milking Stool
description: A small wooden stool located next to the cows
examine_text: This stool, constructed of sturdy but worn wood, shows signs of heavy use. It is small and low, perfect for sitting at the side of a cow and milking.

name: Egg Basket
description: A woven basket containing chicken eggs
examine_text: The basket is full of smooth, oval-shaped, chicken eggs. You need to be careful carrying this around, those eggs look delicate.

name: Bronze Poles
description: Tall sturdy bronze poles supporting the tent
examine_text: The bronze poles are hard, cold, and tower above you. They serve as the structure to hold the large tent up.

name: Trough
description: A wooden trough filled with water
examine_text: The trough is made of thick, raw wood. The water inside is clear and cool, filled to the brim for the horses to drink.

name: Fresh Hay
description: Crisp, clean hay in horse's stalls
examine_text: The hay is still fresh, golden and soft. It makes for comfortable bedding for the horses

name: Stable Boy's Rake
description: A tool used by the stable boys for cleaning
examine_text: It's a long tool with wooden handle and metal prongs, shows sign of constant use.

name: Rusty Scissors
description: A pair of old rusted shears with a chipped blade.
examine_text: These scissors once used to trim the orchard are now rusted and have an almost unusable, chipped blade. One of the handles is broken. Legacy of more fertile times seem to haunt you.

name: Old Ladder
description: A wooden ladder resting against a tree trunk.
examine_text: The ladder has an unstable appearance. The paint is flaking off and it's splintered in many places. Long deserted, it poses a hazard to anyone who might attempt to climb it.

name: Broken Trunk
description: A rotten fruit tree trunk, hollowed out by age and neglect.
examine_text: The trunk is broken, its bark peeling off. Inside you see a hollow space, like a black gaping wound. It exudes a smell of rotten soil and fungi.

name: Old Plow
description: A rusty, abandoned plow.
examine_text: This old plow has been left to rust, forgotten in the field. It was once a vital tool for the farmers who lived here.

name: Brigand Armor
description: Pieces of discarded brigand armor.
examine_text: This armor was left by the brigands who raided this farm. It's a bit beaten up, but it could still provide some protection.

name: Farmhouse Door
description: The old, warped door to the farmhouse.
examine_text: This once sturdy door now hangs off its hinges, the wood scorched from the brigands' fire. It's not much of a barrier anymore.

name: Ghostly Well
description: An old well, said to be haunted by a ghost.
examine_text: This well, once a source of clean water for the farm, now stands as a haunting reminder of its past. The water inside is murky and undrinkable.

name: Abandoned Tools
description: Old farming tools scattered around the yard.
examine_text: These farming implements were once the lifeblood of the farm. Now they are nothing more than remnants of a bygone era.

name: Pitchfork
description: A standard farm tool.
examine_text: A tool with a long handle and sharp metal prongs, used mainly for pitching hay.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large bundled-up stack of hay.
examine_text: A tightly packed bale of straw, used for animal feed, bedding or as a makeshift seat in the field.

name: Water Trough
description: A container of water for the livestock.
examine_text: It’s a shallow, wide container filled with water, usually for farm animals to drink.

name: Fresh Vegetables
description: Basket filled with ripe vegetables.
examine_text: A basket overflowing with various fresh vegetables from the farm. You see tomatoes, potatoes, carrots and more. The vegetables look ripe and ready to eat.

name: Farm Overalls
description: A pair of durable overalls.
examine_text: This is a pair of heavy-duty overalls, stained with dirt. The rugged fabric looks durable and is designed to protect the wearer from grime and sun.

name: Wooden Fence
description: A sturdy wooden fence stretching around the farm.
examine_text: The fence is tall, strong, and made from thick oak wood. It's apparent its purpose is to keep the horses from straying off the farm.

name: Red Barn
description: A large red barn, the heart of the farm.
examine_text: The barn is painted a vibrant shade of red, and is faded in certain areas, hinting at years of historical relevance.

name: Horse
description: A majestic creature of the farm.
examine_text: The horses are strong and beautiful, their coats shiny from careful grooming.

name: Desk
description: A weathered wooden desk cluttered with papers and writing tools.
examine_text: The desk is old and covered in scratches and stains. There are papers all over the desk - decrees, reports, and notes. There's also a quill and ink pot for writing.

name: Sword
description: A sword hangs on the wall amid a few similar weapons.
examine_text: It's a standard steel short sword, well maintained and still sharp. It seems like it's mostly for show, but it could be used in a fight if necessary.

name: Book
description: There are various books strewn about.
examine_text: Most of the books seem to be about laws, history, and the duties of a sheriff. They are worn out from heavy usage.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large, square bundle of dried grass, perfect for the horses' diet.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see this is a perfectly tied bundle of dried, yellow-straw.  The grass is tightly bound and ready to be distributed to the horses.

name: Shovel
description: A long-handled shovel used for cleaning and maintenance.
examine_text: This is an old, well-used shovel. The wooden handle is smooth from years of use and the metal blade is showing signs of rust.

name: Horse Harness
description: A leather harness used to control the horses.
examine_text: The harness is made of strong, well-crafted leather. It's sturdily built, with strong buckles and rings for reins.

name: Barrel of Water
description: A large wooden barrel filled with water for the horses.
examine_text: Splintered wood bound together by rusty bands. It's filled nearly to the brim with clear, cool water.

name: Bale of Hay
description: A stack of hay, neatly tied and ready for feeding.
examine_text: The bale of hay, tied tightly with twine, has a sweet, earthy scent to it. It's dry and scratchy to the touch, but the animals on this farm seem to love it.

name: Milk Bucket
description: A round, metal bucket used for collecting milk.
examine_text: This bucket is large and sturdy, with a heavy-duty handle for carrying. The inside is clean and shiny, perfect for gathering fresh milk.

name: Old Pitchfork
description: A rusty, old pitchfork leaning against the wall.
examine_text: The wooden handle of this tool is worn and splintered. The metal prongs are rusty but still very sharp. It seems like it has been used a lot.

name: Farmer's Cap
description: A simple cap, well worn from the elements.
examine_text: The cap is weathered, with sweat stains marking the brim. A farm logo is embroidered on the front, proving an authenticity to the farming tale.

name: Corn Stalk
description: A tall stalk of corn, thick and sturdy.
examine_text: Upon a closer look, you find this is a prime corn stalk, verdant and strong. Ears of corn hang heavily from it, ripe and ready for harvesting. Every leaf and cell is bursting with life and vigour.

name: Harvest Sack
description: A large burlap sack for carrying harvested corn.
examine_text: The sack is made from burlap, coarse and scratchy, but sturdy. It's large, capable of fitting a good amount of corn. It's currently empty, waiting to be filled.

name: Scarecrow
description: A scarecrow stands sentinel in the field.
examine_text: The scarecrow is a simple construction of straw and old clothes, its purpose to keep the birds away from the precious crops. It has a crude, painted face that is more charming than scary.

name: Farmers Hat
description: A wide-brimmed hat, perfect for blocking out the sun.
examine_text: The hat looks old, well used, and loved. It's made of a rough fabric, stained by sweat and sun, and seems to have a long history of hard work.

name: Water Bottle
description: A reusable water bottle.
examine_text: The water bottle is large, meant to hold enough water for a full day's work in the field. Its exterior is scratched and worn, the plastic casing showing signs of repeated use.

name: Wooden Chair
description: A sturdy, hand-crafted delight made from quality farm-grown timber
examine_text: The chair looks weathered but it is a testament to workmanship. It has a few carvings on its armrests

name: Farmers Painting
description: A canvas painting depicting the history of the farm and its previous owners.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the painting shows the farm in its different stages, noting each era and major event.

name: Pelt Rug
description: An animal pelt rug which adds a cozy feel to the room and feels soft under foot.
examine_text: The rug is made from the pelts of multiple animals, a patina of interesting patterns.

name: Ladder
description: A sturdy, wooden ladder
examine_text: It's a tall ladder, constructed of strong wood with a worn finish. Leading up to the loft, it's the only way to get up there

name: Hay
description: Baled hay, piled high
examine_text: This is a large pile of hay bales, neatly stacked. The hay is dry and has a freshly cut grass smell. You can imagine the animals enjoy eating this.

name: Paint
description: A can of fresh, red paint
examine_text: A can of red paint sits here, lightly covered in dust. A brush with dried paint on it sits on the lid. It's the same color as the barn.

name: Wooden Table
description: An old sturdy wooden table littered with traces of rural living.
examine_text: The table is rough to the touch, with wear and tear marks on its surface. It's laden with plates and mugs from breakfast, a few farming magazines, some playing cards and a dusty old lantern.

name: Lantern
description: An old dusty lantern sits in disuse.
examine_text: The lantern is made of rusted metal and glass. Although it's dusty, it looks like it's still operational and might come handy after dusk.

name: Casserole Dish
description: A large ceramic casserole dish with some leftover food.
examine_text: Looking closer, the casserole dish holds some remains of what seemed to be a hearty meal, probably made with farm fresh ingredients.

name: Old Chair
description: A worn-out wooden chair with a straw seat.
examine_text: It's an old chair creaking under its own weight. Its straw seat holds imprinted shapes of the people who've occupied it over the years.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large, golden bundle of dried grass.
examine_text: The bale is comprised of dry, coarse grass, bound together in a neat cube shape. It's quite heavy and provides an eatable surface for any barn animals.

name: Pitchfork
description: A large, intimidating farming tool with three sharpe spikes.
examine_text: This is a long, wooden handled tool, with a steel three-pronged forkhead. It's used for handling hay, but could presumably be used as a weapon in a pinch.

name: Milk Pail
description: A shiny, steel bucket used for collecting milk.
examine_text: The pail is a round and deep container with a flat bottom and a semicircular bail handle. It's often used by the farmer to milk cows.

name: A Bag of Seeds
description: A burlap bag filled with various plant seeds.
examine_text: A rough, robust bag full of countless small, round seeds that are intended to be sown on the farmland.

name: Ancient Tombstone
description: An old stone marker, partially covered in moss and lichen, worn away by countless years of weather.
examine_text: Closer examination reveals intricate carvings, though now almost completely eroded away. A faint inscription can hardly be read: 'Here lies the valiant prince, forever to rest'.

name: Mossy Lantern
description: A rusty old lantern laying off to the side of a grave, its light long extinguished.
examine_text: The lantern is decrepit and old, filled with moss growing due to the damp surroundings. However, if fixed and lit, it may be usable.

name: Royal Insignia Ring
description: A ring with the royal emblem on it, discarded or lost on a cobblestones near a tomb.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the ring's condition reveals that it was not lost recently. The red ruby centerpiece glows eerily under the pale moonlight.

name: Ghostly Apparition
description: A vapor-like spectre that appears and disappears at random, haunting the graveyard.
examine_text: Looking closer, the ghostly figure appears to glisten in different colors under the flickering moonlight. It seems indifferent to your presence but emits a chilling air that numbs your skin.

name: Old Tombstone
description: A weathered, crumbling stone, etched with unintelligible inscriptions.
examine_text: The tombstone appears to be some centuries old. The inscriptions are badly weathered and you can hardly make anything out. It might symbolise some forgotten soul.

name: Mausoleum Door
description: A large, rusted iron doom with intricate designs. It appears to be locked.
examine_text: The door is ornate with depictions of faces that seem to subtly shift under the moonlight. There is no handle or keyhole, but you can feel a cold gust of wind seeping from small cracks.

name: Old Shovel
description: A rusted shovel with a wooden handle. Looks like it has seen better days.
examine_text: The shovel handle shows signs of wear and splintering, the metal rusted but still rigid. It could be used to dig... or to fend off an attacker.

name: Old Desk
description: A sturdy, but worn wooden desk.
examine_text: The desk is covered in scratched and stained by years of use. You notice a number of ancient quill and ink stains. A solitary candle sits in a brass holder. There's a single drawer that looks like it could be opened.

name: Old Quill
description: A centuries old quill pen.
examine_text: It is an old, somewhat ragged, but still usable quill pen. Some ink remains at the tip, marking whoever touches it.

name: Parchment Scrolls
description: Numerous old scrolls, maybe records of people buried here.
examine_text: Dusty and fragile, the scrolls are piled up in shambles. Some have broken seals, their contents fluttering in the wind.

name: Ancient Candle
description: An old, hardly used wax candle.
examine_text: It's a long, thick waxen candle that's old but still has some usefulness left. The flame dances at the top, creating flickering shadows.

name: Old Gravestone
description: A worn out gravestone, covered in moss.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can just about make out the faint inscriptions. The name is no longer legible, eroded over what must be many long years. A melancholy feeling surrounds it.

name: Abandoned Tomb
description: A deceptively sturdy-looking tomb that seems to have been forgotten by time.
examine_text: The tomb, cracked and worn, has an eeriness to it. The door is slightly ajar, luring in those brave enough with the temptation of the unknown.

name: Mossy Lantern
description: An old lantern, covered with moss, still dimly lit.
examine_text: This lantern, though covered in a thick layer of green moss, gives out a warm, comforting glow. It seems to have been abandoned but hasn't given up its job of cutting through the graveyard's gloom just yet.

name: Rotten Wood
description: A chunk of decayed wood torn off from the dead tree.
examine_text: You see the dark brown, nearly black chunk of wood. Fungus is living on it. It's crumbled at the edges and leaves a powdery residue on your glove.

name: Squirrel Nest
description: A small nest made by the squirrels residing inside the tree.
examine_text: You see a meticulously constructed nest with small twigs, leaves and fur. It feels fragile yet comfortable, betraying the squirrels' skills in making a home.

name: Old Storybook
description: A weather-beaten storybook likely left behind by the village children.
examine_text: You see an old, weathered book. The pages are crumbled, and the title is barely visible. It seems like a collection of ghost stories.

name: Mushrooms
description: Some fungi that's grown on the damp, decaying wood of the tree.
examine_text: You see a cluster of bulbous, green mushrooms thriving on the rotting tree bark. They give off a pungent, earthy smell.

name: Gravestone
description: A primitive gravestone, covered in moss and worn by time.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the gravestone appears to be several hundred years old. The name is long faded and barely legible. You can make out a symbol of family crest etched into the stone.

name: Cross
description: A wooden cross, weather-worn and frail-looking.
examine_text: The cross, worn from the effects of the weather, still stands strong. Someone had lovingly carved the initials of their deceased family member on it.

name: Angel Statue
description: A beautiful alabaster statue of an angel, watching over the dead.
examine_text: The statue is beautifully carved from marble, a silent testament to the wealth of the family it watches over. It holds a half-smoothed, round stone in its hand.

name: Thief's Dagger
description: A sharp, cruel-looking dagger, left behind by a reckless thief.
examine_text: The dagger glints cruelly under the moonlight. Its handle is inlaid with dark, polished bone and its blade is notched and razor-sharp.

name: Golden Crown
description: An ornate golden crown, encrusted with jewels.
examine_text: The crown glistens in the moonlight, the gemstones adorning it glimmers enticingly. Each jewel must have been handpicked for their brilliance and perfection. The skill of the artisan who designed this crown is commendable.

name: Silver Sword
description: A sword made from fine silver.
examine_text: The sword hangs on the tombstone, it is truly a work of art. The silver blade reflects the moonlight in a dazzling play of light and shadow while the hilt is encrusted with precious gems.

name: Marble Tombstone
description: A tombstone made of fine marble.
examine_text: The epitaphs on the tombstones honor the soul of the king here. The marble looks expensive and high-quality with artfully designed patterns.

name: Pile of Gold
description: A pile of golden coins, nuggets and other adornments.
examine_text: The gold pile sparkles enticingly. There could be worth of kingdoms in just this small mound. The coins are of different sizes denoting their era of minting.

name: Silver Chalice
description: An intricate silver chalice.
examine_text: The chalice looks like it was crafted by a master artisan. It is beautifully decorated with symbols and artworks of a bygone era.

name: Rusty Iron Gate
description: An old, almost falling down, iron gate closing the entrance of the crypt.
examine_text: The gate's rusted iron bars are cold to the touch, making a creaking sound when slightly pushed. It's locked solid, and looks like it will not budge without the correct key.

name: Broken Stones
description: Bunch of small and large broken stones scattered near the crypt's entrance.
examine_text: The stones are eroded and worn out, each possesses a unique shape. They might be remnants of the crypt's structure or gravestones that used to surround it.

name: Dried Vines
description: Old dried vines entangled around the crypt.
examine_text: The vines are completely dry and crackle under your touch. Though lifeless, they've twisted into complex patterns over time, creating an intricate web-like structure.

name: Rusty Shovel
description: A shovel with a long, wooden handle. The metal part is rusting.
examine_text: The handle of the shovel is splintered and the rusting metal is chipping away. It seems like whoever used this shovel last left it here many years ago.

name: Old Thermos
description: An old, dented thermos laying on its side.
examine_text: The thermos is quite old and its once shiny surface is now covered in scratches and rust. It's slightly dented and very tarnished. The cap is still tightly screwed on.

name: Weathered Work Gloves
description: A pair of weathered work gloves with holes at the fingertips.
examine_text: The gloves are made of thick leather, now faded and fraying at the edges. The fingertips are worn through, revealing small holes. They once belonged to a hardworking groundskeeper.

name: Wooden Toolbox
description: A simple wooden toolbox, termite-eaten but still sturdy.
examine_text: The wooden toolbox has clearly seen better days. Termites have eaten small holes throughout, but it is still sturdy and useable.

name: Old Tombstone
description: An ancient, crumbling tombstone covered in moss.
examine_text: The inscription on the tombstone is mostly faded, but with a keen eye you can make out the date '1734'.

name: Shovel
description: A dirty, old shovel left lying near the grave.
examine_text: The wooden handle of the shovel is worn and splintered, and the metal spade at the end is rusted and covered in fresh soil.

name: Pile Of Soil
description: A pile of loose, upturned soil.
examine_text: The soil is damp and dark, full of earthworms and tiny roots. It seems to have been disturbed recently. There are fresh specks of dirt all around, suggesting the grave was recently dug up.

name: Weathered Stone Wall
description: A half-built wall of white stone.
examine_text: The wall is relatively high and seems sturdy despite its unfinished state. It's lined with detailed carvings, but weathering has made the designs difficult to discern.

name: Abandoned Tools
description: A set of ancient, rusted tools lay scattered on the ground.
examine_text: On closer look, the tools consist of a cracked hammer, a blunt chisel, and a half-rusted trowel. Archaic designs are faintly visible on the handles.

name: Gravedigger's Flask
description: An old, worn leather flask sits beside the Gravedigger. It reeks of cheap spirits.
examine_text: The flask is made of hardened leather. It's been well used, the alcohol stained the surface a dark brown. The pungent smell indicates it's filled with a rather potent brew.

name: Old Stone Bench
description: An aged stone bench, weathered by time and elements.
examine_text: You see the bench made from porous stone. Some parts of the bench have moss growing on them and few inscriptions can be seen, possibly from a lover or a bored passerby.
