name: Silver Archway
description: A grand archway forged from marble and silver.
examine_text: The archway stands tall protecting entrance of the church. It's filled with ornate carvings of saints, and angels that shimmer in any wave of light. Each corner of the arch hides tiny but magnificent carvings of complex symbology.

name: Holy Idols
description: Statues of sacred figures flanking the shackled path.
examine_text: The Idols stand about half the height of a normal man, meticulously carved from a bright, gleaming marble. Their features are sharp and eyes seem to follow you wherever you move. They are holding books, crosses, and in some cases weapons, depending upon who they represent.

name: Moss-covered gate
description: An old wooden gate, overgrown with moss
examine_text: The gate is made of sturdy oak, now worn with age. Green moss covers most of its surface, a testament to the abandon and decay. It creaks ominously when pushed.

name: Stone steps
description: Aged stone steps leading up to the church entrance
examine_text: The stone steps are worn down by countless footsteps over the years. They are cold to the touch, witnessing to untold stories and forgotten prayers.

name: Weather-worn cross
description: A wooden cross, battered by weather
examine_text: The wooden cross stands silent and solemn, its once defined features now made smooth and almost unrecognisable by the weather, testifying of the faith of the once vibrant parish.

name: Weeds
description: A bunch of unruly weeds
examine_text: These resilient weeds have claimed the church entrance as their own, intertwining with the stone and wood, setting a wild, almost hostile atmosphere.

name: Wooden Cross
description: An old wooden cross placed on the ground near the main entrance.
examine_text: This cross has been well-worn by the weather and appears to be quite old. There are intricately carved symbols upon it.

name: Stained Glass Window
description: A large, vibrant stained glass window depicting different scenes from the Bible.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the impressive attention to detail and craftsmanship.

name: Headstone
description: An old headstone marked with the dates and names of the deceased.
examine_text: The stone is weathered but you can still make out the name and dates. The epitaph reads something poetic and thoughtful.

name: Church Door
description: A large double door made of heavy oak with wrought iron handles.
examine_text: The door is sturdy and ornate. Wrought iron hinges creak when you push against it.

name: Pathway
description: A paved path leading to the church.
examine_text: Stones of various shapes and sizes make up this pathway leading to and from the church's entrance.

name: Iron Gate
description: An old, rusty iron gate
examine_text: This is the imposing iron gate in front of the church. It has a creepy, gothic style design. It squeaks when it moves, showing signs of disrepair and neglect. Despite its age, the iron gate remains sturdy.

name: Loose Cobblestones
description: Loose cobblestones from the pavement
examine_text: These cobblestones are remnants from the olden days, irregularly shaped and sized. They're quite heavy and rough around the edges.

name: Lantern Post
description: An old lantern post without a lantern
examine_text: The post, made from iron, was once a gleaming beacon, guiding travellers. Now, it stands desolate, stripped of its lantern. It's covered with a patina of rust, bearing witness to many years of abandonment.

name: Large Metal Door
description: An enormous door made of sturdy metal with a large knocker.
examine_text: Upon closer look, the door's structure reveals it to be several hundred years old. The colossal knocker is decorated with meticulous carvings of religious scenes.

name: Door Knocker
description: A large, intricately carved door knocker.
examine_text: A meticulously designed knocker etched with intricate religious scenes. It appears heavy to lift, and rings a deep, resonating sound when thumped against the door.

name: Sliding Window
description: A small metal-covered window.
examine_text: This sliding window provides a thin view outside when required. Completely covered in metal, it guarantees security without compromising the peephole's functionality.

name: Gravestone
description: An ornate granite gravestone with engraved writing.
examine_text: A beautiful, albeit weathered, granite stone rises from the ground. There's a name and dates inscribed, but it's hard to read through the moss and lichen.

name: Candle
description: A beautiful, pillar candle, possibly left by a mourner.
examine_text: A pillar candle with a warm, ivory wax exterior. Judging by its burn, it hasn’t been long since it was last lit. It’s scentless.

name: Garden Bench
description: A wooden bench near an ancient oak tree.
examine_text: A solid wooden bench beneath an old tree. Handsome in its simplicity, made from teak that has aged to a soft silver color. Despite the weather and years, it still stands firm.

name: Flower Bouquet
description: A bouquet of colorful wildflowers left on a grave.
examine_text: A beautiful mix of flowers tied together with a soft pink ribbon. Some are fresh, while others have wilted slightly, indicating they’ve been here for some time.

name: Church Garden Bench
description: An old wooden bench situated under the shades of the fruit-bearing trees.
examine_text: This bench has witnessed countless stories, from people sharing their tales of joy to those shedding tears of pain. It's in decent condition, with some wear and tear signs showing on it.

name: Garden Carrots
description: Freshly picked carrots from the church garden.
examine_text: These carrots are fresh and bright orange. They're perfectly shaped, and the leafy tops are still attached to them.

name: Church Tomatoes
description: Juicy tomatoes from the church's vegetable garden.
examine_text: These tomatoes have a rich red color and a sheen that reflects the sunlight. They are ripe and ready to be used.

name: Garden Flowers
description: Beautiful garden flowers of different species.
examine_text: The flowers are blooming in a rainbow of colors, their sweet fragrance fills the air. There are roses, daisies, and lilies among other species.

name: Golden Roses
description: Glistening in the sunlight, these golden roses decorate the iconostasis.
examine_text: Despite their metallic appearance, these golden roses are soft to touch. They are delicately crafted, each petal gleaming under the sun. The roses are not real, key note of craftmanship of the old priest, Nicolas.

name: Handmade Icons
description: Five beautiful, handmade icons, each one unique in its design.
examine_text: The icons are carefully detailed, featuring images of different saints. Each one is framed in a delicate gold and possesses a certain mystical aura around it. They show the intricate work of an unknown artist from another kingdom.

name: White Linen
description: A fine piece of white linen that adorns the iconostasis.
examine_text: The white linen is smooth and soft to touch. Pure white in color, it gives off a sense of serenity and purity. There are subtle patterns and flowing lines embroidered onto the fabric.

name: Stone Bench
description: A grey, worn-out stone bench designed with angel motifs.
examine_text: The bench seems older than time itself, well worn and weathered. Delicate angels are carved at each end of the bench, providing a support for the sturdy stone seat.

name: Rose Bushes
description: A row of vibrant rose bushes. Each bush is thick with blooms, ranging in color from pure white to deep red.
examine_text: The roses are so bold and fragrant, their scent filling the air. Their petals are incredibly soft to the touch, but beware of the thorns hidden among the leaves.

name: Religious Statue
description: A statue of an unknown saint, worn by time and weather but still standing tall.
examine_text: The features of the statue are worn, making it hard to identify the figure it represents. Still, the figure emanates an aura of tranquility and divinity, inviting anyone to stay and pray.

name: Ancient Tree
description: A tall tree that seems to have withstood time.
examine_text: Looking closer, you can see the bark is thick and rough. It's branches extend in all directions serving as a natural shield for the church.

name: Narrow Door
description: The door to the church, longer than it is wide
examine_text: The door seems to be made of a very dark, possibly aged, wood with intricate carvings depicting a religious tale.

name: Silent Monk
description: A monk observing a vow of silence
examine_text: This monk is dressed in plain, simple robes coloured in earthy tones. In his hand, he holds a set of prayer beads, which he's silently counting.

name: Stone Carving
description: There is a stone carving on the church wall
examine_text: Upon examination, the carvings seem to depict various scenes from the monks' daily life.

name: Wooden Platform
description: A large, worn wooden platform in the center of the courtyard.
examine_text: The platform is stained with spots of dried blood. Its wooden planks are cracked and worn from repeated use. There are two tall wooden poles with attached chains and cuffs built at one end for attaching offenders.

name: Old King's Law Scroll
description: A weather-beaten scroll holding the old king's laws.
examine_text: The parchment is yellowed with age. Harsh and draconian laws are written in bold, faded ink, with numerous addendums crammed along the margins. It is the rulebook of the church.

name: Priest's Robe
description: A heavily embroidered purple robe worn by the priests.
examine_text: The robe is decorated with intricate patterns and religious symbols. It is too large for a normal sized man, signifying its origin for the church's stout priests.

name: Old Tombstone
description: An ancient and weathered tombstone.
examine_text: No family name can be deciphered from the eroded stone. Just a faint decade and a single word - 'Beloved'.

name: Shutters
description: Shutters hanging off the old neglected church.
examine_text: From up close, you can see that the shutters were once painted white, but now are flaking and peeling, showing the bare wood beneath.

name: Fallen Cross
description: The cross that once adorned the church now lay fallen on the ground.
examine_text: The rusting iron cross is almost as tall as you are. It was once a symbol of refuge and peace, now a desolate reminder of abandoned faith.

name: Bible
description: A tattered Bible lies abandoned near the entrance of the church.
examine_text: Opening the Bible, you can see that someone has scribbled notes in the margins. Passages about forgiveness and mercy are underlined extensively.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A simple wooden bench, enough for three people to sit comfortably
examine_text: The wood appears old yet sturdy, subtly polished to prevent splinters. There are slight indentations along the seat that evoke the echoes of past church-goers.

name: Pastor Table
description: A small wooden table covered in a white cloth, used by the pastor during services
examine_text: The table is small in size, large enough for a single bible and other items used during a service. The white cloth over it shows signs of weathering, yet its sanctity is unmistakable.

name: Church Flower
description: A beautiful flower blooming amidst the grass
examine_text: The flower is a vibrant cerise hue, stark against the green backdrop. It has a light, delicate aroma that enhances the tranquility of the location.

name: Wooden fence
description: A white wooden fence surrounding the church field
examine_text: The fence is coated in white paint, with the grain of the wood subtly peeking through. It runs around the church area, a physical symbol of the sanctity within.

name: Cookpot
description: A small, sturdy pot used for cooking.
examine_text: The cookpot is small but well-used. It's currently hanging over a gently simmering fire, emitting warm, comforting smells.

name: Fire
description: A small, contained fire.
examine_text: The fire is burning steadily, providing heat for the cookpot above. It's well managed and appears to be under control.

name: Books
description: A small collection of books on a shelf.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the books appear to be various cookbooks and hand-written journals. They're well worn and frequently referenced.

name: Candle
description: A single candle sitting in the middle of the table.
examine_text: The candle is half-melted down, indicating it's been used quite a bit. The wax has dripped down the sides in an interesting pattern.

name: Tableware
description: A set of rudimentary plates and silverware.
examine_text: The plates are a simple white, and the silverware is unadorned but functional.

name: Grand Chandelier
description: A magnificent chandelier hanging from the high ceiling.
examine_text: Looking up, you see a grand chandelier made of countless intricate pieces of crystal. It glimmers in the light, casting colorful reflections across the room.

name: Tall Windows
description: Tall windows that extend nearly to the height of the room.
examine_text: The tall windows are made of clear glass panes that allow a lot of natural light into the room. A closer look reveals they are actually stained glass windows, with a beautiful, intricate design.

name: Intricate Ceiling
description: A highly carved and decorated ceiling.
examine_text: Looking up, you notice the ceiling is not just carved, but painted in gold and daring colors. The patterns depict stories from history and mythology, so detailed they almost seem to come alive.

name: Queen's Crown
description: A beautiful golden crown adorned with precious jewels.
examine_text: The crown is a magnificent piece of craftsmanship. Each gemstone is meticulously placed into a bed of gold. Rubies, emeralds, and diamonds catch the light magnificently, causing the crown to sparkle and shimmer in the light.

name: Golden Dresser
description: A large, finely crafted dresser made of gold.
examine_text: The dresser is of remarkable craftsmanship from solid gold. Every corner, every edge and every handle of the dresser is ornately designed with intricate patterns. The surface is polished to perfection, gleaming in the light.

name: Silk Drapes
description: The beautiful drapes are made of the highest quality silk, in shades of pink and purple.
examine_text: Up close, the drapes feel smooth and soft to the touch, with a slight sheen that only the most expensive silk could have. The colors are vibrant and rich, and whoever dyed them had an expert eye for colour.

name: Royal Cup
description: A delicate cup made of crystal, rimmed with gold, and studded with small rubies.
examine_text: The cup sparkles in the light revealing its crystalline structure, which is decorated with intricate carvings. The rubies set around the rim give it an air of royal elegance.

name: Comfortable Bed
description: An unadorned but cozy sleeping place.
examine_text: The bed is well made, clean, and enticing to turn in for the night. The sheets are smooth and cool to the touch, and the pillows look soft and fluffy.

name: Dresser
description: A multi-drawer wooden piece of furniture for storing clothing.
examine_text: The mahogany dresser has seen better days, yet holds a charm of its own. It has seven drawers of various sizes and appears to be empty.

name: Bearskin Rug
description: A large rug made of bearskin.
examine_text: The rug is quite large, sprawled in front of the fireplace. It's very soft and plush. The bear's face, with glass eyes replacing the real ones, adds a touch of fear.

name: FirePlace
description: A warmth-generating usual fixture in old rooms.
examine_text: The fireplace is currently unlit, but charred wood and ash hint at its regular use. The mantel is clean and polished.

name: Mirror
description: A wall-mounted looking glass.
examine_text: The mirror has an ornately carved wooden frame. The glass is pristinely clean and offers a clear and undistorted reflection.

name: Four Poster Bed
description: A large, majestic bed adorned with fine European linens and gold tassels.
examine_text: This grand four poster bed is the centerpiece of the room. The linens are soft, intricately woven with threads of gold. The posts of the bed are thick and as you look closer, you can see intricate carvings of scenes from the kingdom's history.

name: Large Wooden Chest
description: A large chest of drawers holding a wealth of the King's clothing.
examine_text: Made from fine oak, the chest of drawers is a formidable piece of furniture. Each pull reveals a different set of clothes, from ceremonial robes to casual wears, all embroidered with the royal crest.

name: Gauzy Purple Fabric
description: Soft, gauzy purple fabric hung from the bed posts.
examine_text: The fabric is soft to the touch, semi-translucent and adds a soft, regal hue to the room. As it wafts gently in the breeze, you notice that it is embroidered with delicate, silver threads.

name: Wooden Window Shutters
description: Large wooden planks that shutter the window.
examine_text: The shutters are heavy and provide a strong line of defense against any potential attacks. They can be thrown open to let the light in, revealing the beautiful view of the kingdom below.

name: tapestry
description: A large, intricate tapestry depicting knights in battle.
examine_text: The tapestry is incredibly detailed, showing a battle scene filled with knights and dragons. Some spots appear worn and faded with age, but the craftsmanship is still evident.

name: runner carpet
description: A long plush carpet with a deep red color and gold trim.
examine_text: The carpet feels soft and plush underfoot, with a deep red hue that exudes luxury. The gold trim adds an extra touch of elegance.

name: golden chandelier
description: A giant chandelier, made from gold and beautiful crystals.
examine_text: The chandelier catches the light in a spectacular display, its gold structure glimmers while the crystals refract light in all directions. It illuminates the entire palace hall.

name: grandfather clock
description: An Old standing clock made of polished wood and gold.
examine_text: The clock stands taller than you. It boasts a walnut casing, opulent gold detailing, and a glass-covered face with roman numerals. A pendulum swings steadily behind the glass in the base.

name: Golden Chalice
description: An ornately decorated, gold chalice, studded with rare gems.
examine_text: The chalice is intricately crafted from yellow gold, with a hefty weight that signifies its value and substance. Jewel-encrusted, it sparkles under the dim light, reflecting an array of colors across the room. The gems represent different corners of the realm, meticulously collected and embedded by the royalty as a symbol of supremacy and wealth.

name: Marble Statuette
description: A small marble statuette of a mythical creature.
examine_text: The soft, white marble of the statuette is expertly chiseled by an adept artist's hand. It's a portrayal of a creature from legend - a synthesis of a lion and an eagle - appearing poised for flight with its elegant wings expanded and claws spread. It's a piece that radiates grandeur from its every curve and line.

name: Royal Tapestry
description: A large, splendidly woven tapestry depicting a grand ceremony.
examine_text: The tapestry is a grand, highly detailed representation of a royal ceremony. Its vibrant colors and textile threads weave a testament of valiant knights, ceremonious processions, beautiful queens, and an epoch of time. The craftsmanship is so intricate and detailed that it seems as if it's not woven sewn, but painted by a master artist.

name: Golden Throne
description: A grand, majestic throne made of gold, adorned with precious stones.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see intricate carvings revealing stories of legendary battles and heroic warriors. You also notice an array of glinting swords and weapons embedded at the rear of the throne. It's both a piece of art and a symbol of authority.

name: Royal Swords
description: Swords taken from the fallen enemies of the kingdom.
examine_text: The blades are remarkably sharp and still glint menacingly. They are embedded into the throne as a symbol of the king's triumphs and might.

name: Precious Stones
description: Exquisite, multi-colored gemstones embedded in the throne.
examine_text: You can see diamonds, rubies, sapphires, and emeralds intricately placed to form royal insignias and patterns. They are dazzlingly beautiful.

name: Unicorn Statue
description: An elegant statue of unicorn made from white marble
examine_text: This statue is majestic, featuring a unicorn in mid-trot with its head held high. The unicorn's horn is gilded, and the detailed engravings make it look breathtakingly lifelike.

name: Rainbow carpet
description: A luxuriously soft carpet with vibrant rainbow colors
examine_text: This carpet is plush under your feet, emitting a soft glow. As you look closer, you realize that tiny crystals have been woven into it, reflecting light to create a rainbow effect.

name: Magical grass
description: A glimmering patch of grass that unicorns feed on
examine_text: The grass is silver and shimmers like glitter. The blades are thin and delicate. It pulses with a strange, otherworldly energy.

name: Unicorn Crown
description: A beautifully crafted crown adorned with different colored gems
examine_text: The crown is radiant with a series of gems that seem to move and ripple with a life of their own. This crown is designed in a way that only unicorns can wear it.

name: Queen's bed
description: A large, lavishly decorated bed.
examine_text: The bed is impressively large and extravagantly decorated. It is piled high with plush velvet pillows and a silken duvet. The bedpost is a work of art, intricately carved and dusted with gold.

name: Golden statues
description: Statues made of pure gold, representing Greek art.
examine_text: The statues are truly a work of excellent craftsmanship. They are delicately carved with intricate details that represent the Greek mythology. The golden light they reflect is blinding if looked at directly.

name: Ancient ritual objects
description: Objects with unknown purpose.
examine_text: These objects carry a mysterious aura. They are ancient, made of an unidentified metal and adorned with gems and vague symbols.

name: Golden Throne
description: A golden throne adorned with 12 carat diamonds.
examine_text: This throne is a spectacle. Its details in 12 carat gold are dazzling in the candlelight. The cushion is made from rich velvet fabric and seems very comfortable.

name: Royal Portrait
description: A large painting of the royal family, framed in gold.
examine_text: The painting is large and captivating. The king, queen and their children have been painted in vivid colors. The frame, made of gold, adds an extra aura of wealth and power to the beautiful family portrait.

name: Golden Goblet
description: A luxurious goblet studded with gems
examine_text: An extravagant goblet made of pure gold, studded with gleaming gems of various colors. It is clearly a sign of the immense wealth and power of the palace inhabitants.

name: Cooking Pot
description: A big pot used for cooking meals
examine_text: A large, heavy pot, blackened from constant use over the hot fires of the kitchen. Despite its worn appearance, it is still in perfect working condition.

name: Kitchen Knife
description: A sharp knife used for cutting ingredients
examine_text: A shiny kitchen knife with a perfectly balanced weight. The blade is sharp enough to cut through anything, making it a handy tool in the kitchen, and potentially a formidable weapon in the right hands.

name: Royal Apron
description: A pristine white apron worn by the palace cooks
examine_text: A neatly pressed white apron, worn by the palace cooks. Its spotless appearance testifies to the immaculate cleanliness of the palace kitchen.

name: Chandelier
description: A grand, china-made chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: Upon close examination, the chandelier has intricate patterns adorned with gemstones. Gilded where the light bulbs are located, the china that it is made from, as white as snow, glistens beautifully.

name: Kings Dining Table
description: An enormous table in the center of the room that could accommodate thirty guests.
examine_text: The glossy surface of the carved wooden table is spotless, decorated with plates and cutlery laid for the guests. There are elegant carvings on its legs and sides, showing signs of high craftsmanship.

name: Hand Woven Rug
description: An exquisite rug decorates the floor beneath the table.
examine_text: The rug, a true testament of time and craft, displays an intricate kaleidoscope of colors and patterns. It has a soft and dense texture, and is surprisingly resistant to any stain.

name: Gold Plated Dome
description: A magnificent, gold plated dome decorates the ceiling of the room.
examine_text: As your eyes wander up, the gold plating sparkles brilliantly, casting a warm glow over the room. Detailed mosaics depict scenes of ancient royalty and mythology.

name: Map of the Castle
description: An intricately detailed map showing the castle and surrounding town.
examine_text: The map is marked with strategic locations and possible secret entrances to the castle.

name: List of Grievances
description: A long parchment filled with complaints against the King.
examine_text: The list contains both trivial and grave injustices, some written passionately and others dryly.

name: Crate of Weapons
description: A large crate filled with various types of weapons.
examine_text: Inside you see swords, daggers, and crossbows, all carefully selected for their lethal proficiency.

name: Poison Vial
description: A small, glass vial filled with a deadly poison.
examine_text: The poison is a clear, viscous liquid that is deadly if ingested.

name: Armor
description: A suit of sturdy, protective armor.
examine_text: The armor is well-made, with a polished steel finish and a padded interior for maximum comfort and protection.

name: Bronze Throne
description: It's a king's seat, made entirely out of bronze.
examine_text: This very antique yet sturdy bronze throne shows the work of generations of skilled blacksmiths. It is heavily decorated with gems and has intricate carvings of warriors and beasts.

name: Iron Guardsmen Statues
description: Iron statues of the palace's guardsmen.
examine_text: The sturdy and lifelike statues of the guardsmen are all unique, engraved with the likeness of the king’s most trusted protectors. They are each poised as if ready to spring into action.

name: Red Silk Carpet
description: A luxurious carpet that spans across the throne room floor.
examine_text: The thick red carpet is a sign of the king’s wealth, woven from silk by the finest craftspeople of the kingdom. It's soft, elegantly patterned, and immaculately clean.

name: Crossed Swords
description: Two swords crossed at the entrance of the throne room.
examine_text: The swords bear the royal crest, delicate yet lethal. Their steel reflects the sunlight entering through the gates.

name: Four-Poster Bed
description: A royal bed with ornate carvings on its tall four posts.
examine_text: The bed is made up of plush velvet drapes hanging from the tall sturdy posts. The mattress, made of soft feathers, guarantees a night of peaceful sleep.

name: Chifforobe
description: A large, valuable piece of furniture for storing clothes.
examine_text: The chifforobe is meticulously crafted from fine oak wood. There are multiple compartments for storing garments, shoes, and other personal items.

name: Servant Bell
description: A bell to summon servants.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, the bell is ornate and made of brass. A simple shake is enough to ring it, and it would call servants to attend to the Queen’s needs.

name: Ancient Map
description: A large, slightly tattered but well-preserved map pinned up on the wall.
examine_text: As you take a closer look, you see that the map has been meticulously crafted with great detail. The countries, marked in exquisite calligraphy, are colored in different hues. The map looks so realistic it seems as if it can guide you real time.

name: Pile of Books
description: A stack of hardbound, leather-spine books lay on a table.
examine_text: When you examine the pile, you notice that the books cover an array of topics ranging from astrology, history, to mythology. The smell of the aged pages and ink fills your senses.

name: Lush Tapestry
description: A beautiful tapestry hangs on the wall.
examine_text: When you examine the tapestry closely, you notice fine threads of silver and gold woven with silk in a depiction of great sea voyage. The artistry is breathtaking and narrow as it is, the weaving tells a story that could fill a book.

name: Large Chandelier
description: A magnificent chandelier adorned with crystals and gold accents.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the multitude of finely crafted crystals forming the chandelier. It twinkles in the light reflecting myriad colors.

name: Silver Tableware
description: Fine sterling silverware laid upon a pure white napkin.
examine_text: A beautifully detailed set of silverware, possibly made by the kingdom's finest silver smith.

name: Silk Tablecloth
description: A beautifully woven silk table cloth.
examine_text: A pristine silk tablecloth, woven with intricate pattern, possibly made by the kingdom's best weavers.

name: Royal Throne
description: A magnificent throne set upon the stage.
examine_text: A throne fit for a king, adorned with gold and silver, encrusted with precious stones. It exhibits the power and wealth of the kingdom.

name: Elaborate Carpet
description: A large, colourful carpet rich with intricate designs.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you can see the grandeur in every thread and pattern that tell the story of famed battles and victories of the palace's past. The details are exquisite.

name: Suit of Armor
description: A full plate suit of armor, standing at the ready.
examine_text: The armor is made of sturdy, shining steel with a level of craftsmanship that speaks volumes of the skilled blacksmiths of yore. You can see the intricate details in its design, symbolising courage and valour.

name: Historical Painting
description: A large, ornate painting of a past ruler.
examine_text: The painting portrays a previous ruler seated on a throne, displaying an array of emotions. The brush strokes and color palette used evoke an aura of grandeur and power. In the background, there are slight, almost imperceptible, details that refer to the ruler's achievements.

name: Golden Statue
description: A majestic golden statue displays the power and glory of the king.
examine_text: The statue is crafted to perfection and plated in gold. It exudes an aura of royalty and power as it stands guard at the entrance of the palace.

name: Royal Rug
description: A plush royal rug laying on the floor.
examine_text: The rug, dyed in vivid colors with golden threads woven into it, is soft to touch. The pattern is intricate and pale in contrast to the vibrant background.

name: Chandelier
description: An exquisitely crafted chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: Hangs from the ceiling, adorned with countless glass crystals and tiny golden sculptures. The light it gives off is warm and inviting, a stark contrast to its sharp aesthetics.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A sturdy wooden bench sits beside the entrance.
examine_text: The bench, made from dark oak wood, is carved with intricate patterns. Despite its ornate look, the bench seems solid and reliable.

name: Royal Bed
description: An extravagant bed fit for a prince, adorned with royal blue sheets.
examine_text: The royal bed is large and opulent, with a gold frame and royal blue silk sheets. The pillows and blanket are pure white, giving the whole bed a very luxurious feel.

name: Display Swords
description: Ornately crafted swords hanging on the wall
examine_text: Each sword is intricately detailed, with a slightly curved blade and an ornate handle. They look quite sharp, but are firmly secured to the decorative mounts.

name: Display Shields
description: Colorfully painted shields adorning the wall
examine_text: Each shield has a unique design, ranging from simple geometric patterns to complex heraldic symbols. The craftsmanship is exquisite, with near-perfect symmetry and brilliant colors.

name: Granite Floor
description: A splendid floor made of granite, polished to perfection.
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see small sparkles embedded within the stone that gives off a gentle shimmer. The granite looks incredibly solid and feels cold under your bare feet.

name: Gold Chair
description: A magnificent gold chair for the king and queen.
examine_text: The chair is ornately decorated with gemstones of various colors. The seat cushion is an opulent red velvet and includes a gold fringe along its border. The armrests end in intricately detailed lion heads.

name: Gold Table
description: A small ornate table made of solid gold.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you can see the table is carved with beautiful designs of the kingdom's history, depicting important events. The table top is flat and perfect for setting things upon.

name: Iron Railing
description: An majestic iron railing, crafted by a master craftsman.
examine_text: Detailed images of dragons, eagles, and lion heads run the length of the railing. It feels cold and unyielding to the touch. Each detail appears to have been hand-crafted with exceptional attention to detail.

name: Huge Bed
description: A grand bed, big enough to fit 20 people, covered in red and yellow silks.
examine_text: The bed is gigantic, a sign of royal luxury. The silk spreads, with their vibrant colors, look extremely soft and comfortable. The intricate patterns on the silk tell a story of the palace's regal history.

name: Gold Cup
description: A gold cup filled with red wine.
examine_text: The cup is made of pure gold, with intricate carvings depicting various events from the royal family's past. The red wine inside smells rich and inviting.

name: Silk Cloths
description: Silks in red and yellow spread everywhere.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the silks are extremely fine and delicate to the touch. The red and yellow hues are vibrant and hold your gaze.

name: King's Bed
description: A large, lavish bed draped in royal blue
examine_text: A closer look reveals the detailed craftsmanship in its design, from four tall posters to the exquisite royal blue drapery. The inner curtains of the canopy are made of the finest silk, giving it an air of pure elegance and luxury.

name: Luxurious Desk
description: A desk piled high with various books
examine_text: Made from lustrous oak wood and embellished with intricate details, this desk is a work of art. The array of books piled on top of it showcase the King's varied literary interests, ranging from complex political treatises to enchanting fictional tales.

name: Fireplace
description: A large fireplace lending warmth to the room
examine_text: The crackling flames dance merrily inside the intricately carved stone fireplace. It spreads a comforting warmth throughout the room, transforming the royal bedroom into a cozy refuge from the palace's bustling activities.

name: Reading Chair
description: A comfortable chair placed next to the fireplace
examine_text: Made of rich, supple leather, the chair looks invitingly comfortable. It's positioned optimally close to the fireplace that the King can read his favorite books while enjoying the warmth of burning logs.

name: Rusty Chains
description: Old, heavy chains hanging from the walls.
examine_text: The chains have been here for a very long time, now covered in rust and cobwebs. They were likely used to restrain prisoners, but wouldn't be much use for that now.

name: Old Skeleton
description: Skeleton remains of a long-dead prisoner.
examine_text: You can see the bones are old and fragile. There's a sad, eerie aura around it which tells of its untold stories.

name: Ancient Torch
description: An unlit torch mounted on the dungeon walls.
examine_text: The torch is made of an aged metal, it's been beaten and warped over time. The cloth at the top is coated with an old, dry oil. If you had a spark, you could probably get it to light.

name: Moldy Bread
description: A piece of bread, covered in green mold.
examine_text: It seems to have been there for many years, forgotten by its previous owner, the mold has sprouted uncontrollably over time.

name: Marble Floor
description: An expansive fine marble floor with intricate patterns.
examine_text: This flawless marble floor is opulently hued, polished to a magnificent shine reflecting the grandeur of the palace. The detailed patterns carved on it narrate the nobility's history, an impressive sight to behold.

name: Royal Portraits
description: Oil paintings of the royal family and the king's accomplishments.
examine_text: These masterpieces are works by a prominently famed artist, each stroke brilliantly capturing the essence of the royals and the king's past victories. The portraits exude a vivid, regal aura that's simply breathtaking.

name: Gold and Crystal Chandelier
description: A chandelier hanging from the room's ceiling, adorned with gold and crystals.
examine_text: This magnificent chandelier, an epitome of wealth, is a visual treat. Hundreds of small candles illuminate the room in a warm, inviting glow, the light refracted through the crystals creating a dazzling spectacle.

name: Silk Draping
description: Purple silk draping, dyed in the king's personal color.
examine_text: This lush purple silk draping accentuates the aesthetic of the room, adding a sense of royal prestige. It seemingly flows down the railings and walls, vivid in its sheen and fabric. The king's personal emblem designs are impeccably embroidered onto it.

name: Antique Desk
description: A large, royal desk made of dark wood.
examine_text: The desk at the far end of the room appears to be ancient, possibly ruling alongside the many generations of Kings and Queens. Covered in layers of papers and books, the surface has witnessed innumerable strategic plans and secret conversations. A rustic candle holder with a half-melted candle marks the corner of the desk suggesting the long hours spent by the king.

name: Candle Holder
description: An old antique candle holder.
examine_text: Tabling a half-melted candle, the holder is a stark reminder of the many late-night royal strategies that unfolded here. It is detailed with intricate carvings, evidently the work of a skilled craftsman.

name: Book Shelves
description: Massive shelves covering the walls enclosing numerous books.
examine_text: The shelves carry the weight of countless books, some aged and worn down, others still crisp with fresh binding. The finger-traces on dusted covers can be felt, revealing tales of explorations made by many curious hands excluding the king's.

name: Comfortable Armchairs
description: Stuffy and comfortable brown armchairs.
examine_text: Standing opposite the settee, the armchairs contribute to the sense of comfort the room provides. Sporting a rich brown hue, the armchairs seem to beckon one to sink into them and lose track of time.

name: Cozy Rug
description: A plush, fur-like rug covering the floor.
examine_text: Looking like a giant fur pelt, the rug underneath feels plush and inviting. It brings a sense of warmth and majestic feel to the room, adding to the ambiance.

name: Chandeliers
description: A grand chandelier hanging from the ceiling, lighting up the room.
examine_text: The chandelier is detailed and ornate, its hundreds of candles casting warm light all over the hall. It's adorned with crystals that glimmer in the candlelight.

name: Velvet Seats
description: Rows of velvet seats for guests to rest.
examine_text: The seats are plush and comfortable, with a luxurious velvet upholstery. They're set in neat rows along the side of the room.

name: Paintings
description: Colorful paintings of the royal family hanging on the walls.
examine_text: Every wall is adorned with detailed paintings showcasing past kings and their families. The people in the paintings are depicted in their finest attire, smiling and looking regal.

name: Four Poster Bed
description: A large, luxurious bed made for a king.
examine_text: The mahogany frame is intricately carved with scrolling patterns depicting stories of the king's victories. The bed is covered in beautifully embroidered silk bed linens.

name: Gold Lamp
description: A glittering gold lamp.
examine_text: The lamp is made of pure gold, shaped like a lily, with a dazzlingly bright bulb. The light looks soft and warm.

name: Velvet Chair
description: A plush, velvet chair.
examine_text: Its cushions are overstuffed, and the velvet is worn smooth from use. The armrests are carved with intricate designs.

name: Fireplace
description: A large, crackling fireplace
examine_text: The fireplace is large and well-built, filled with glowing embers and the flickering of a warm fire. On top of it rests various pots and food items being warmed. The warmth of the fire permeates the room, giving it a cozy, comforting feel.

name: Cooking Utensils
description: Several cooking utensils are neatly arranged
examine_text: Upon closer look, you can appreciate the array of utensils: Pots and pans of varying sizes, wooden spoons, whisks, sharp knives, and some specialized tools you're not familiar with, all made of sturdy, high-quality materials.

name: Food Items
description: Fresh food items laid out, ready to be cooked
examine_text: The food items include fresh vegetables, bread, cheese, a variety of meat cuts, and jars full of exotic spices. Everything looks ripe, clean, and thoroughly washed.

name: Wooden Table
description: A small wooden table with two chairs
examine_text: A compact wooden table, with two matching chairs tucked neatly underneath. It's sturdy and well-used, bearing the scuffs and markings of countless meals. It provides a modest but snug area for eating.

name: Silver Cutlery Set
description: A set of shimmering, royal silver utensils.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see delicate inscriptions engraved onto the handles - the royal crest of Fulmer, a horse galloping over a field of stars. Despite their regal appearance, these utensils bear the marks of frequent use.

name: Copper Oven
description: A barren, copper oven with a cranky knob.
examine_text: You see the oven's door covered in soot, residues of many battles fought to cook the tastiest meals. Despite its crude exterior, the oven radiates an alluring warmth. There's an indicator at the top of the stove, its royal-blue background now faded from use and stained with oil splashes.

name: Copper Pots and Pans
description: An assortment of well-worn pots, pans and woks made of copper.
examine_text: Each copper pot and pan has visibly witnessed countless culinary adventures. They are spotted with hot oil burns, scratches of spatulas, and discoloration only age can bestow. Despite their worn-out appearance, they seem to be regularly polished to maintain a certain level of royal sophistication.

name: Long Wooden Table
description: An endlessly long, sturdy wooden table.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the table appears to be made from solid oak. There are signs of wear from years of feasts.

name: Golden Chandelier
description: An elaborate golden chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: The chandelier is a work of art, crafted from gold and studded with a myriad of precious gems that reflect the light beautifully. It's out of reach though.

name: Stained Glass Window
description: A large, colorful stained glass window.
examine_text: The stained glass window portrays a magnificent story with vibrant colors. When light hits it, the room is filled with a beautiful spectrum of colors.

name: Wooden Bench
description: A sturdy wooden bench for seating.
examine_text: The bench, made from the same oak as the table, is worn smooth from years of use. It's very sturdy.

name: Golden Crown
description: A crown studded with precious gems
examine_text: This is a golden crown, adorned with a variety of precious gems, an evidence of the wealth of the royal family. Each gem is carefully placed and arranged in a delicate pattern, making it a prestigious symbol of power.

name: Silk Robe
description: A royal silk robe that is soft to the touch
examine_text: The fabric is a vibrant violet shade, handcrafted by the finest weavers of the kingdom. The touch is so soft, almost like a whisper against skin. Intricate embroidery line the sleeves, displaying royal crests and historical events.

name: Royal Letter
description: A well preserved royal letter sealed with the royal crest
examine_text: The parchment is heavy and cream-colored, filled with firm and imposing handwriting. The royal crest is pressed into the wax seal in precise detail - a symbol of authenticity and majesty.

name: Jewelry Chest
description: A hand carved wood chest filled with sparkling jewelry
examine_text: The chest is a piece of art itself, with the lid adorned with intricate carvings of mythical creatures. Inside, it's a treasure trove of jewels, sparkling under the light, beautifully crafted into necklaces, bracelets, rings and more.

name: Ornate Chandelier
description: A magnificent chandelier hanging from the high ceiling.
examine_text: The chandelier is a work of art, adorned with numerous cut-crystal pendants that gleam brightly when they catch the light.

name: Marble Staircases
description: Two imposing marble staircases lead to the second floor.
examine_text: The staircases are beautifully crafted from white marble. Stately wooden railings, gilded in gold, line the edges.

name: Queen's Paintings
description: Fine paintings the Queen admires.
examine_text: Each painting depicts different aspects of the Queen's life and reign. The colors are vibrant and the detail is remarkable.

name: Toy Block Set
description: A box full of colourful wooden blocks.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you see that each block has a different letter of the alphabet or number on it. They're slightly worn but still in good shape. These blocks were obviously loved by their little owners.

name: Rocking Chair
description: An elegantly carved wooden rocking chair with plush cushions
examine_text: The rocking chair has a sturdy oak frame. Beautiful motifs have been carved into the frame showing scenes of playful children amidst nature. The cushions are soft and comfortable to sit on, ideal for lulling a small child to sleep.

name: Baby Bassinet
description: A plush baby bassinet with fine linen covers
examine_text: A beautiful bassinet made of polished mahogany. It has been fitted with the finest, soft white linens. A dainty lace trimmed canopy hangs over the bassinet, perfect for protecting a slumbering babe from prying eyes.

name: Fireplace
description: A generous stone fireplace that keeps the room warm
examine_text: This well-maintained fireplace is a comforting profile against the wall. It has a wide mantel that's perfect for perching items, and underneath, the slightly sooty bricks flicker with a gentle, warming glow.

name: Cookware Rack
description: A large wooden rack holding various cooking utensils and pots.
examine_text: This wooden rack is worn with time and use, yet still sturdy and reliable. Pots, pans, and various cooking utensils hang from its many hooks, some looking like they've seen more than their fair share of meals. An array of spoons, whisks, and ladles fill the lower racks, all waiting for their next culinary adventure.

name: Kitchen Table
description: A large, sturdy wooden table used for preparing meals.
examine_text: The kitchen table takes up quite a space in the room. It's a solid block of wood, worn from countless meals prepared upon its surface. Small nicks and cuts cover the tabletop, telltale signs of missed knife strokes. But it's still in good shape - a testament to the craft of the one who made it.

name: Oven
description: A large stone oven, perfect for baking large quantities of food.
examine_text: This enormous oven stands against the wall, a giant monolith of baking and roasting. The door is heavy, but swings open smoothly, revealing a cavernous interior blackened by the countless fires within.

name: Grand Table
description: A massive table made from the finest wood
examine_text: The table spans the length of the room and is crafted from gorgeous, dark mahogany wood. It has seen many royal feasts and diplomatic negotiations, the evidence of which can be seen in various scuffs and carvings across its long surface.

name: Ornate Chair
description: A lavishly adorned chair suitable for regality
examine_text: The chair is upholstered in rich, ruby-red velvet, with a high back and finely detailed golden embroidery. It has a stately, rather imposing air about it.

name: Golden Chandelier
description: A grand chandelier hanging from the ceiling
examine_text: A sprawling array of candles are held aloft by delicate golden arms, creating a lavish light display that fills the grand dining room.

name: Marble Sculpture
description: An intricate sculpture carved from a single block of marble
examine_text: The statue depicts an ancient king riding a horse into battle. Unbelievable attention to detail has been carved into every inch, showcasing the craftsmanship of the royal sculptor.

name: Golden Chandelier
description: A sparkling chandelier hanging from the ceiling.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the intricate pattern of the chandelier and the brilliant glitter of the numerous tiny crystals hanging from it. The gold structure supporting these crystals is equally exquisite.

name: Golden Table
description: A shiny golden table laden with food.
examine_text: The table is made of pure gold, with intricate designs etched into its legs and sides. There are a variety of exotic food and drink spread out on it.

name: Gold-Plated Food
description: Food with a thin layer of gold.
examine_text: Each piece of food is carefully plated with a thin layer of gold, making it look like an edible work of art.

name: Golden Garment
description: A piece of clothing completely covered in gold.
examine_text: Upon close examination, you can see the flawless craftsmanship on the clothing. Each thread seems to be covered in a thin layer of gold, which makes the garment heavy yet surprisingly flexible.

name: Ornate Railing
description: A beautiful hand-crafted railing, with roses entwining through it.
examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the intricate details etched into the iron, depicting historical events and royalty. The roses twined around it are in full bloom, adding a touch of beauty and life.

name: Large Cushioned Chair
description: A handcrafted, classy chair with comfortable cushions, perfect for lounging.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the high-quality fabric and firm yet soft cushions suggest it's designed for long periods of comfort. The armrests are delicately crafted, providing the perfect spot to rest a book or a cup.

name: Queen's Lemonade
description: A glass of freshly squeezed lemonade, kept cool by the crisp air.
examine_text: The lemonade glistens in the sunlight, almost making your mouth water at the thought of its sweet and tangy taste.

name: King's Book
description: A book with a worn leather cover, filled with the king's favorite tales.
examine_text: The edges of the pages show signs of frequent use. The book seems to open naturally to a marked page where an exciting adventure unfolds.

name: Crown
description: A gorgeous royal crown, encrusted with gemstones.
examine_text: Engraved into the center is the royal seal, around which swirls of gold and precious gemstones comprise an intricate pattern. The precious stones - diamonds, rubies, emeralds - sparkle with an otherworldly light.

name: Royal Robe
description: A luxurious robe dyed royal blue with gold trim.
examine_text: This is a glorious robe designed with intricate patterns and stitches that depict historical events. The hems are lined with extravagantly woven golden threads.

name: King's Bed
description: A grandiose, ornately carved bed.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the bed is constructed of beautifully carved ornate oak wood. This must be the king’s bed – it’s draped in expensive fabrics and topped with luxurious feather pillows and blankets.

name: Goblet
description: A finely crafted goblet made of gold.
examine_text: The goblet is made entirely of gold and beautifully carved with intricate detailing. It's quite heavy to lift.

name: Royal Dagger
description: A small dagger, used by the king for ceremonial purposes.
examine_text: The dagger is crafted of gold, with an elaborate handle set with jewels and a finely honed blade.

name: Master Bed
description: A grand bed covered in silk sheets and down pillows
examine_text: This enormous bed is made from golden wood covered in intricate carvings. The silken sheets shine under the light, and the thick, plush down pillows invite you to lose yourself in their softness.

name: Ornate Vanity
description: An extensive vanity covered in various bottles and jars
examine_text: The vanity table is a piece of art in its own right. It's tooled from a dark mahogany wood, with ornate gold detailing across its face. Various bottles and jars of perfumes, powders, and creams are neatly arranged on its surface.

name: Golden Chandelier
description: A huge golden chandelier hangs from the ceiling, radiating light and luxury
examine_text: The chandelier is a masterwork of gold and glass, with countless prisms casting vibrant patterns of light around the room. It hangs from a large chain, secured to a ceiling mural of majestic angels and cherubs.

name: Tapestry
description: A detailed tapestry depicting a majestic landscape
examine_text: The tapestry is a detailed piece of woven art, showing a detailed landscape of rolling hills, soaring mountains, glimmering rivers, and charming villages. The colors are vibrant and the workmanship is unparalleled.

name: Mushroom Door
description: A small door that's part of the mushroom hut.
examine_text: The door is small and looks sturdy. There's a small knob made of bone. Can hardly fit a puppy through it.

name: Mushroom Cap
description: The cap of the mushroom-shaped hut.
examine_text: The cap is larger than the stem and has black and white spots all around. It's mushy and damp to touch

name: Mushroom Stem
description: The stem of the mushroom-shaped hut.
examine_text: The stem is thick and beige in color, it offers support to the hut's structure.

name: Iron Gates
description: A set of sturdy, ornamental gates made of iron, topped with spikes.
examine_text: Upon closer examination, you see intricately crafted designs etched into the ironwork and the spikes on top seem rather sharp. A crest with a family insignia is mounted on both the left and right gates.

name: Family Crest
description: A display of heraldry made from metal, hanging on the gates.
examine_text: It's masterfully crafted and shows the family's insignia with great precision. As you peer at it, you can glean some of the family's history and their lineage's standing in society.

name: Cobblestone Pathway
description: A path made of cobblestones leading up to the gates.
examine_text: The cobblestones are weatherworn but solid, leading your gaze to the imposing gates. It's clearly frequently trammeled, judging by the well-worn stones.

name: Rack of furs
description: A rack with various furs hanging out to dry.
examine_text: The furs are mostly from animals commonly found in the nearby woods, like deer and rabbit. They are cleanly skinned, and some have already started to darken from the drying process.

name: Dog
description: The hunter's loyal bloodhound, guarding the entrance to the cottage.
examine_text: The dog is big and muscular, with a long, droopy face. It eyes you warily but doesn't make a move to attack, presumably because it recognizes you as a friend.

name: Herb garden
description: A small patch of various herbs growing on the ground.
examine_text: The garden has several different types of herbs, all of them looking well-tended. Some of them you recognize as medicinal, while others are probably used for cooking. A few are just plain pretty to look at.

name: Grass
description: A covering of fresh, dark green grass.
examine_text: The grass is dense and lush, showing signs of regular care and attention. The blades are a deep, dark green, covering the backyard like a soft carpet.

name: Carrots
description: Freshly grown carrots protruding from the wet soil.
examine_text: The carrots are robust and brightly colored, their tops vibrant against the surrounding earth. They look fresh and healthy.

name: Cows
description: Two healthy black cows grazing in the pasture.
examine_text: The cows are strong and healthy, their black coats gleaming in the sunlight. They seem content as they graze in the grassy backyard.

name: Farmer's Hat
description: A worn hat, likely belonging to the farmer.
examine_text: The hat is well-worn and faded from the sun. It looks like it has seen many long days in the field.

name: Garden Hoe
description: A well-worn garden hoe lays on the ground
examine_text: You see a garden hoe. It has a wooden handle and a metal blade. This tool seems used often for turning soil.

name: Vegetable Patch
description: A thriving vegetable patch busily tended by the local inhabitants
examine_text: You see multiple vegetables growing in the patch. It's a feast for anyone's eyes who appreciate nature's bounties

name: Straw Hat
description: A straw hat is hanging on the fence.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the straw hat is well-woven and had a faded ribbon. It seems like something a farmer might wear.

name: Oak Tree
description: A majestic oak tree stands near the garden.
examine_text: The oak tree is tall and broad with a craggy bark. There are markings possibly made by the local fauna

name: Wooden Fence
description: Rustic wooden fence surrounds the garden.
examine_text: The wooden fence is roughly made but sturdy. There are chips and notches from years of use and weathering.

name: Horse Plough
description: A heavy-duty plough used for tilling the field.
examine_text: The plough is old, its rich brown wood worn thin in places from years of use. The metalwork is blackened with age and use, but still sharp in places.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large compressed stack of dry grass.
examine_text: The hay bale is large and tightly bound, the grasses within are golden and dry. Bits of straw poke out, it's a bit prickly to the touch.

name: Blacksmith's Hammer
description: A hefty tool used by the local blacksmith to shape metal.
examine_text: Handling the hammer, you can feel the wear on the handle of the tool. The metal head appears robust and well-used. It’s surprisingly heavy.

name: Bridle and Saddle
description: Leather gear used for riding horses.
examine_text: The leather bridle and saddle are well-worn but cared for. Bits of horsehair still cling to the saddle, which has intricate designs carved into the side.

name: Wooden Bucket
description: A simple wooden bucket
examine_text: The bucket is made of planks of wood bound together with metal bands. It's old but sturdy, with a curved handle at the top.

name: Scarecrow
description: An old scarecrow that stands solitary in the middle of the field.
examine_text: The scarecrow is large and imposing, with tattered clothes and a painted face designed to scare away any birds. Unfortunately, it doesn't seem to be working very well.

name: Hay Bale
description: A large bale of top quality hay, ready to be shipped off to market.
examine_text: The hay is tightly bound into a rectangular shape, and it smells fresh and clean. It's truly top quality hay.

name: Field Tool
description: A discarded field tool left behind by a hard-working farmer.
examine_text: The tool is a bit rusty but it's still sharp. It's designed to cut and gather hay efficiently.

name: Hay Carriage
description: A large wooden carriage designed to transport bales of hay.
examine_text: The carriage has sturdy wooden wheels and a platform big enough to hold multiple bales of hay. It's clearly built to handle heavy loads.

name: Cauldron
description: A large, black, cast-iron cauldron sitting in the middle of the cottage.
examine_text: The cauldron is old, battered, and stained from many years of use. The scent of herbs and spices lingers around it, a relic of the potions and brews it has held.

name: Glass Jars
description: Shelves packed with glass jars storing various magical ingredients.
examine_text: The jars are filled with peculiar things: spider legs, dragon toe nails, fairy wings. Each jar is labeled with a careful hand, the elegant script a testament to the witch's meticulous nature.

name: Witch's Broom
description: A bristly, worn-out broom leaning against one corner of the cottage.
examine_text: The bristles are worn down from years of sweeping and flying, the wooden handle smoothed by the witch's constant grip. There's something magical about this broom, it tingles with energy when touched.

name: Carrots
description: A bunch of harvested carrots.
examine_text: Bright orange carrots with green tops. They were likely harvested lately as they're still firm and fresh.

name: Hanging Meat
description: Cured meat hung from the ceiling.
examine_text: The meat hung from the ceiling. It's been cured, dried, and seasoned, perfect for long term storage.

name: Wooden Crates
description: Several wooden crates used for storage.
examine_text: The crates are old but well-built, with slats that allow air flow to keep the produce fresh.

name: Rope
description: A long, thin rope used for hanging meat.
examine_text: The rope is thin yet strong, perfect for hanging heavy meats from the ceiling.

name: Wooden Cross 1
description: A homemade wooden cross standing tall in respect to someone's memory.
examine_text: It is a sturdy, weathered cross made from untreated wood. A name is roughly carved on it, though wear and time have made it difficult to read.

name: Wooden Cross 2
description: Another homemade cross, perhaps sharing a story of its own.
examine_text: The wooden cross is a little smaller than the first. A crude name is etched at the foot of it, but it's nearly impossible to read.

name: Large Oak Tree
description: A large oak tree, casting its long shadow over the small graveyard.
examine_text: The tree is tall and strong, with its wide-reaching branches offering shade and shelter. A symbol of endurance and stability, it fittingly overlooks the quiet graves.

name: gardening_hoe
description: A long, wooden handled tool with a flat, metallic blade.
examine_text: The wooden handle is smooth from years of use and the blade is showing signs of rust from exposure to moisture.

name: watering_can
description: An old, metal watering can with a long spout.
examine_text: It is a fairly large size with a large handle for carrying. The body of the can has some dents and the paint is peeling off in certain places.

name: garden_gloves
description: A pair of sturdy leather gloves.
examine_text: The leather is scratched and worn from use, but they still appear to be in good condition. The gloves are lined with a soft material for comfort.

name: shovel
description: A large, heavy-duty shovel with a wooden handle.
examine_text: The handle is a bit worn from use, but is still sturdy. The metal shovel blade is a bit rusty but still sharp.

name: Carrots
description: A bunch of carrots growing in the earth.
examine_text: A bundle of bright orange carrots, topped with vibrant green leaves, poking up from the dark, rich soil. They look ripe for the pulling.

name: Black Cow
description: A large black cow, grazing on the lush green grass.
examine_text: An intimidatingly large farm animal, with smooth, glossy black hide and deep, gentle eyes. It looks well-fed and content, enjoying the grassy bounty of the hill.

name: Pitchfork
description: A weathered pitchfork, discarded nearby.
examine_text: A three-pronged pitchfork, its wooden handle worn smooth by the passage of weather and time. A caring tool, not a threatening weapon, but it could still easily pierce if misused.

name: Farmer Hat
description: A straw hat left by the farmer.
examine_text: A wide-brimmed straw hat, well made and functional. It's definitely seen a lot of sun. You can almost smell the sweat of a long day's work ingrained in the fibers.

name: Enchanted Torch
description: A torch that never runs out of light.
examine_text: This is no ordinary torch, no fuel or flame but yet, it illuminates the whole room. As you look closer, tiny runes etched into the wood blink back at you, emanating a warm, comforting glow.

name: Crate
description: A wooden crate filled with food and clothes.
examine_text: The crate is locked and seems to be reinforced with steel. A symbol of a key is carved on its side. The clothes peeking from one of the spaces seems to be of poor quality.

name: Prisoner Clothes
description: Roughly stitched clothes of the prisoners.
examine_text: These clothes are threadbare and in need of repair. The color is a faded grey and they emit a damp, musty smell.

name: Water Droplet
description: A precious droplet of water from the dungeon ceiling.
examine_text: You catch the water droplet in your hand. It's ice cold - chilling to the bone just as the Dungeon itself.

name: Rusty Cuffs
description: Rusty cuffs hanging from the wall. They look as if they've been used quite a lot.
examine_text: A close examination reveals that the rust on some of the cuffs is mixed with dried blood. The cuffs are cold and heavy to the touch. Small initials are carved into the metal, perhaps a remnant from past prisoners.

name: Wobbly Table
description: A rugged, uneven table stands in the middle of the room.
examine_text: Looking underneath, the reason for its wobble becomes apparent. A leg has partially rotted away and someone has attempted a repair with a crude wooden splint. There are various stains and scratches on the surface of the table, evidence of its long and hard use.

name: Shackles
description: Rusty and cold metal shackles hang from the wall.
examine_text: The metal of the shackles is old and rusty, having been used over many long years. It's cold to the touch, sending a chill down your spine just thinking about the many souls they have confined.

name: Knife
description: A sharp blade lays on the floor.
examine_text: The blade looks incredibly sharp and it's pretty clear this instrument was used for torturing. The handle seems to have a perfect grip, though it's stained with patches of dry blood.

name: Blood Stains
description: Dark stains are scattered across the wooden floor.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the stains are definitely blood. Some are faded, maybe even centuries old, while others are fresh. You can't help but feel a cold shiver down your spine at the sight.

name: Ancient Torch
description: An old, magical torch that provides light.
examine_text: The ancient torch gives off a soft, golden light. There seems to be some sort of enchantment on it as it doesn't appear to have been extinguished in centuries.

name: Creepy Creatures
description: Unknown creatures lurking in the shadows of the cave.
examine_text: Upon close examination, these creatures are unlike anything you have seen. They do not appear aggressive, but their grotesque appearance is unsettling.

name: Ancient Chains
description: Chains presumably used to bind prisoners.
examine_text: Age and rust have eaten away at the chains, leaving them brittle. However, you can still feel the echo of fear and despair of those who once wore them.

name: Old mattress
description: An old matress dumped in the corner of the cell.
examine_text: The mattress is stained, torn, and worn out by years of use. The stuffing is coming out of it and it smells foul.

name: Rusty Shackles
description: Shackles hanging from the wall, used to bind the prisoners.
examine_text: Upon close inspection, this immovable shackles reveal years of use. The chains are cold, rusty and corroded due to the damp surroundings.

name: Stone bowl
description: A rudimentary stone bowl that serves as dining ware for the prisoners.
examine_text: The bowl is carved from stone and is quite rough. It has some residue of what looks like moldy bread.

name: Old tattered clothes
description: The remnants of what used to be cloth, now barely more than rags.
examine_text: The clothes have been worn to the point that they're barely distinguishable as clothes anymore. They're tattered and filled with holes.

name: Scratched Brick
description: A gloomy brick scratched by mysterious figures.
examine_text: The brick seems old, terribly filled with scratch marks. Some are deep, suggesting desperate attempts of escape by previous inhabitants. Touching them, you can sense fear and desperation.

name: Dripping Candle
description: A nearly exhausted candle, barely lighting the room.
examine_text: The candle isn't much. It's a short stub of wax with a rapidly sinking wick. You think it might last a few more minutes at best. But without it, you're lost in an endless sea of darkness.

name: Moss
description: A green moss growing on the wet brick walls.
examine_text: The moss seems to voice the humidity of the dungeon. It's wet and slippery, covering portions of the cold brick walls in patches. You can almost see it growing before your eyes.

name: Dungeon Water
description: A pool of cold, mildly fish-scented water.
examine_text: The water is cold and murky, a place where no light reaches. A faint smell of fish lingers around it, offering an unwelcome hint of the lake it originates from.

name: Iron Maiden
description: An imposing, upright metal contraption, covered in rust
examine_text: This Iron Maiden is an old torture device. The interior is spiked, ensuring a painful experience for anyone unlucky enough to be placed inside. Its rusty exterior adds a chilling sense of age and brutality.

name: Whips
description: Several worn out whips hang from nails on the wall
examine_text: Cracked strips of ancient leather make each whip, the handles stain with sweat and blood of use. They vary in length and thickness but all carry a grim aura of suffering and pain.

name: Thumbscrews
description: Several jars of oddly pristine thumbscrews rest on a nearby shelf
examine_text: Equally troubling for their storied past and lack of rust. The thumbscrews shine ominously in the torchlight. You get an uneasy sense that these devices of pain were used recently.

name: Stretching Ropes
description: A collection of robust ropes attached to a heavy wooden table with a crank
examine_text: The stretching ropes have seen many bodies come and go. They look strong and capable enough to fulfill their dreadful purpose. Strands of threadbare fabric from past victims still cling to some of the harsh knots.

name: Storage Trunk
description: An old, battered trunk, heavy from the items it holds.
examine_text: This trunk is heavy and made of old wood, it has a rusty lock on the front. It's filled with various items that belonged to prisoners who never made it out.

name: Paper Records
description: Stacks of yellowed paper filled with the names of countless prisoners.
examine_text: Rows and rows of names, each recorded meticulously with a sense of dread. Many of these prisoners are no longer alive.

name: Quill Pen
description: A feathered quill pen, ankle-deep in ink.
examine_text: This quill has seen better days, its feather fraying and its point starting to dull. A careful inquiry reveals it to be caked in black ink.

name: Inkwell
description: A small, oak inkwell, full of black ink.
examine_text: Solid and weighty, this inkwell is sturdy enough not to spill easily. A thick pool of black ink resides within.

name: Rusty Chains
description: Old and rusted chains with shackles at the ends.
examine_text: These chains were once silver but are now orange and brown with rust. Each link is large and weighty, binding captives with an unyielding grasp. At the ends of the chains, thick iron shackles hang open, ready to be fastened around wrists or ankles.

name: Torture Table
description: A hauntingly ominous black, iron table with shackles on each corner.
examine_text: Stark and harrowing, the torture table is a grim reminder of the room's purpose. Dark blood stains are splattered across it and its iron shackles echo the cruelty of past events.

name: Bloodied Knife
description: A small, sharp knife covered in dried blood.
examine_text: The knife glistens eerily in the dim light, its blade slick with the remnants of dried blood. Its sharpness implies its role in the infliction of agony.

name: Iron Chair
description: A dark, uninviting iron chair with restraints attached to the armrests.
examine_text: This chilling iron chair is cold and rough. Leather straps, worn and frayed, are fastened to the armrests, a stark reminder of the room's grim purpose.

name: Torture Table
description: A large, dark wooden table with leather straps and metallic devices
examine_text: This table is intimidating and filled with numerous devices designed for the cruel art of torture. You see leather straps designed to hold victims down and a variety of tools laid out neatly across the surface. The table itself is stained with what you can only assume is blood.

name: Manacles
description: Heavy steel shackles affixed to the wall
examine_text: These manacles are intimidating, designed to hold the wrists and ankles of a prisoner. They are heavy and cold to the touch, with a slight rust covering the steel. It's clear that they have seen a fair amount of use.

name: Small Dagger
description: A wickedly sharp blade, used for precise cuts
examine_text: This dagger is perfectly honed for excruciating accuracy. Its blade gleams menacingly under the torchlight, holding a promise of pain in its gleaming edge. It's small, but deadly in its own way.

name: Torturer's Mask
description: A mask made of supple black leather
examine_text: The mask seems crafted to induce fear, obscuring the face of the torturer behind pits of black with no discernible features. It is made of supple black leather meticulously crafted, a terrifying face to behold for the unfortunate victim.

name: Rusty Sword
description: An old, rusted sword discarded on the ground.
examine_text: The sword is wrought of iron, aged and neglected. The blade is tarnished with rust and time, yet there's an inherent sharpness to it.

name: Dank Cell
description: A small, mildew-infested cell.
examine_text: The cell is small, and the air reeks of mildew. A rotting straw pallet lies in one corner, and the cell bars are covered with rust.

name: Guard's Key
description: A small key attached to a sturdy ring.
examine_text: The key is made of hardy steel, though showing signs of wear with its numerous nicks and scratches. It's attached to a heavy-duty ring that signifies its importance.

name: Stale Bread
description: A rock-hard piece of stale bread.
examine_text: The bread, darkened and hardened through the passage of time, was seemingly devoid of any nourishment it might've once held. One could probably break a tooth trying to eat it.

name: Bronze Goddess Statue
description: An 80-foot tall impressive bronze statue of the 8-legged Goddess.
examine_text: The statue is intricately detailed and incredibly lifelike. Each curl in the Goddess's hair, each fold of her clothing, and every segment of her eight legs has been meticulously rendered in bronze. You can almost feel the power emanating from it.

name: Altar
description: A raised structure at the foot of the Goddess statue where pilgrims lay their offerings.
examine_text: The altar is a simple stone slab, worn smooth by the hands of countless worshippers. Votive candles, money, flowers and slips of parchment with prayers and wishes written on them are scattered atop it.

name: Holy Calendar
description: A large stone tablet engraved with the holy days of the Goddess.
examine_text: The calendar is an enormous stone tablet that hangs on one wall of the Hall. It details the holy days in a circle, radiating out from a depiction of the Goddess at the center. The craftsman's skill is evident in the detailed carvings.

name: Hot Tub
description: A large wooden tub filled with warm water and steam.
examine_text: The hot tub is quite large probably capable of housing ten persons at a time. It's filled with warm bubbly water and overflows with steam. The water has a strange but somewhat pleasant herbal scent to it.

name: Towel
description: a fluffy white towel perfectly folded on the side.
examine_text: The towel is incredibly soft and pleasant to touch, seeming almost too luxurious for the setting. It's perfectly folded, indicating someone's meticulousness to maintain tidiness even here.

name: Herbal Soap
description: A bar of soap with an interesting herbal scent.
examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you spot small bits of herbs embedded in the soap. The pleasant fragrance is strong and alluring. It might be used to mask other less pleasing smells.

name: Food Tray
description: A large tray filled with various fruits and cheeses.
examine_text: The tray is abundant with fresh fruits and different kinds of cheeses. Among fruits, there are apples, grapes and other tropical fruits you can't name. The cheese has been sliced into small bite-sized pieces.

name: Iron Maiden
description: A tall metal sarcophagus studded with spiked interior
examine_text: This frightful instrument of torture is made of iron and features a hinged front, embellished with a deathly face. It's studded with numerous spikes on the inside, ready to pierce any unfortunate soul shut within.

name: Manacles
description: A pair of heavy iron shackles.
examine_text: These manacles are made of heavy iron, chilling to the touch. They are designed to bind the hands or feet of prisoners tightly, making escape nearly impossible.

name: Torture Table
description: A dark wooden table with plenty of disturbing tools atop it.
examine_text: The table is marked with old, dried blood and other residues. Various tools of torment are arranged on its surface – knives, pincers, spikes, and other unnameable instruments designed to inflict pain and fear.

name: Golden Goblet
description: A shiny, ornate goblet made of pure gold.
examine_text: The goblet is beautifully designed with intricate patterns etched into its surface, it sparkles in the dim light of the cavern.

name: Silver Coins
description: A stack of ancient, silver coins.
examine_text: On closer inspection, the coins bear the stamp of an old, forgotten empire. They're heavier than you'd expect for their size.

name: Ancient Sword
description: A rusty, ancient sword with a gem-encrusted handle.
examine_text: Despite the flood of time and rust, the sword still holds a sharp edge. The handle is encrusted with various gems, giving it a certain allure.

name: Crown Jewel
description: A large, luminous gem that exudes grandeur.
examine_text: The gem is flawless and translucence captures the beauty of the entire spectrum. Its faceted surface casts rainbow shards of light onto the surroundings.

name: Wooden Table
description: A simple, sturdy wooden table.
